Ato orot on dura ambin asi matanai wat ibi mateteai it sagob mamaba BADA on an bobo iyamai inat obin emamatar ai ambin.
On an werai jeverei camel sareu ites sitoman isawar weie, orot agim gold aburus an urakof an baiyan gagamin ibo ato aburunai iyein a agim gold kwasi tayabaris ruam on asunai iganen.
Namon on itetemai iyau, “Om ekasoneu, om tamam on iyafan a an goai efan fofonin yau au orot mat ari fom wat nan waten?”
On iyafotai iyau, “Yau tamau on Bethuel a wa wau orot jever on Nahor a Milcah.
Wei ai goai on wayo ison kwakwan sen fofonin camel bayu sinam a ai goa amonai on eb efan yen fofonin omi mat wonen.”
Namon orot sindan irou ato BADA ikwafirai.
On iyau, “Yau BADA ani fain, yau au bada Abraham an God, on an kaber a faskikinai an aumatan au bada aurin ibokikin. Ato yau on BADA ibototoriu totor wat anat au bada Abraham an dam warar auris agat.”
Jeverei iyayai inai ayon an goai ato bobo engon tutufin simamatar auris on idudur.
Rebecca robun wabin on Laban. On an werai on robun aburunai urakof a asunai kwasi iten a dura mamaba orot jeverei i yawur on idudur i tatam on, on iyayai inai ato orot igaturai dogu sareuai nan camel sesebisi itatawar,
<range>
ato iyawur iyau, “Om enat rut tanan au go. Om orot on BADA imomoginem. Aibo mes nin kounai etatawar? Yau au goai on efan abo titiwag yen om aurim a am camel mat auris.”
On mes Abraham an bobo orot on Laban rus sinai au go. Ato Laban an bobo orot on camel tefasi emon sawar siyeiren ato asi bayu siboen sinat sites siyam. Namon sareu sibo sinat Abraham an bobo orot a on an orot mat ass sit souen mes.
Namon bayu nanai siyein, baise on iyau, “Yau men gariwat bayu anam mes, ab ainau on dura an kasonem unsagob yau aibo mes anat nin.” Laban iyau, “Basit, ekasonei.”
On mes bobo orot on ibosuruf dura ikakafun iyau, “Yau on Abraham an bobo orot.
BADA on yau au bada Abraham gagaminai bag imomoginai ato sawarotin imatar. On bobaitu engon; sheep, goat, cow, agim silver, agim gold a orot jever agirotis on engon itai.
Yau au bada awan Sarah on ijenekwar an werai fifi orot ituai, ato yau au bada an buder engon natun itai.
Yau au bada iyameu ai faro on an dura ati fonaboai mes. On iyawureu iyau, ‘Om men Canaan tafanam emon jeverei un rubin yau natu awan mes.
Baise om unan tamau an sabu, an dam warar amosi natu awan nan unrubin.
Ato yau au bada aitetemai au, ‘Ato jeverei men in gogoi yau rui wan nanat on arimon mamaba?
On iyafoteu iyau, ‘BADA ato ra fufur abi fonaboai On arimon an anea ini yafarai om rum wonan bainonot aifan on iniyamai weinem. Om arimon tou au sabu emon natu awan unboai, yau tamau an dam warar emon.
Eta on kaitamom wat. Om unan yau au dam warar auris ato osi men sini basitem jeverei unboai unnanat on arimon om baifaro emon on in rufanim.
Yau ari rabirabi anat dogu sareuai nan ato abayoi, ‘Yau au bada Abraham an BADA God, karun, eibaisiu au bobo innat obin inmatar.
Yau atonio dogu sareuai. On an werai jeverei boboun sareu boin mes in gagat on, yau arimon ani fefeyanai an kibub emon sareu initeu an toman.
Ato on jeverei inbi basit sareu initeu an totoman a toun in gogoi camel asi sareu inboai inites sin totoman on, yau asagob jeverei min on urubinai au bada natu awan mes.’
Yau nana ababayoi ato Rebecca abaranai kibub auman inat ato isur dogu sareuai sareu itsun mes. Yau awur au, ‘Karun, sareu eiteu an toman.’
On ra kaita an kibub abaran emon iyeirai isur ato iyau, ‘Etoman a mat am camel sareu anites sin toman.’ On mes yau sareu atoman ato on camel ba asi sareu ites sitoman.
Yau aitetemai au, ‘Om iyafan natun jeverei?’ Ato on iyafoteu iyau, ‘Yau on Bethuel natun jeverei, Bethuel on Nahor a Milcah rus natus.’ Namon yau urakof aburunai ayein a asunai kwasi ai ganen.
Namon yau sindau arou ato BADA akwafirai. Yau BADA anifain, yau bada Abraham an God. On ibo totoriu totor wat anat yau au bada an dam warar auris ato jeverei agaturai on natun awan mes.
Basit omi ari won gogoi ami moa obin a dura bagai wat au bada Abraham aurin wonbi yamai on basit rerebai won kasoneu. O omi men won gogoi mes on eb rerebai won kasoneu ato yau an sagob au bainonot ani yamai.”
Namon Laban a Bethuel rus siyafotai siyau, “Atonio bobo on BADA emon, on mes wei men eta tani yen aifan wanau on.
Rebecca on atonio, om ebo ato enai am bada Abraham natun orot awan mes inmatar, mamaba BADA Toun i yau nanaba.”
On an rai Abraham an bobo orot atonio dura itatam on, on sindan irou ikwafir isur magin motob iruyein ato BADA ikwafirai.
Namon bobo orot on monag sawar agim silver a agim goldai sibi yamen on a beber iyateten ato iboen Rebecca itai. Mat on siwar baiyas gagamis bag on robun a ayon ites.
Namon Abraham an bobo orot an orot mat si nat on bayu siyam sitom ato fom nan mat siyen. Osi fomenei simisir ato Abraham an bobo orot on iyau, “Yau agogoi an matabir men anan au bada aurin.”
Baise Rebecca robun orot a ayon rus siyafotai siyau, “Jeverei on eikirir tafaror kaitamom o ra auyotoat nanaba mat wanama weie on gibui inan.”
Baise Abraham an bobo orot on iyawures iyau, “Men won botaniu mes. BADA on ibaisiu au bib iyamai inat obin imatar; on mes woni yafareu anan au bada Abraham aurin.”
Osi siyafotai siyau, “Basit ot jeverei tayor enat ato tai tetemai tait.”
On mes osi Rebecca siyor inat ato sitetemai siyau, “Om egogoi atonio orot rum wonan i?” On iyafotes iyau, “Eee! yau rui anan.”
On mes osi Rebecca a an fio kaifar jever on sikirires ato Abraham an bobo orot a on an orot fani mat sinai.
Ato osi atonio dura ai on Rebecca simomoginai ato siyawur siyau: “Wei robui. Om arimon sabu babaisonis ayos unmatar! Om wawam agirim arimon asi ragit sin bomerubes ato asi mafam gagamis sin boai!”
Namon Rebecca a an bobo jeverei rus sibotitiwag ato asi camel tefasi sigai simair. Abraham an bobo orot Rebecca ibo ato tafanam sikirir sinai.
Isaac on Dogu Sareu BADA Yayawasin Yau Eiteu On An Dogu Sareu emon inat Canaan tafanam turinai nan imama.
Rabirabi tani Isaac igat inai masauai ibibib ato matan ireben inai on camel si nat on ites.
On an werai Rebecca iyeit Isaac it on an camel emon isur
ato Abraham an bobo orot itetemai iyau, “Orot ato masau ai ibib aurit e nat on iyafan?” Bobo orot iyafotai iyau, “On min yau au bada Isaac.” On mes Rebecca beber ibo ato magin ikukum.
Namon bobo orot ato bobo engon tutufin ifofour on Isaac ikasonai.
Isaac on Rebecca ibo sinai ayon Sarah an guwi ai sirui ato nan iawan sima. Isaac on Rebecca inuaboai ato on emon kubainunub ibo, on an rai ayon irabob gibunai.
Abraham jever tani ba iawan, on wabin min Keturah.
On jever nanatun sirarat wabis on Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak a Shuah.
Sheba a Dedan rus tamas on Jokshan a Dedan wawan agirin on Asshur yangan, Letush yangan a Leumm yangan.
Midian nanatun on Ephah, Epher, Hanoch, Abida a Eldaah. Atonio osi engon on Keturah wawan agirin.
Abraham an buder engon on Isaac aurin ikirir;
baise Abraham on nana yawasin imama an werai on siwar awawan ufuigeg nanatun sibitu on ites. Namon osi fifirig gigiawan on iyafares sinai au wera matan tafanam nan sitama mes, yabin Abraham on men igogoi osi fifirig on Isaac mat sitama.
Abraham iorokwar bag weie irarabob an kwanda on 175.
<range>
On nanatun Isaac a Ishmael, Machpelah agim doguai nan sigarob, Mamre bisinai au wera matan na, on min Ephron an motobai, Ephron min Zohar Hitt orot natun.
Motob ato Abraham Hitt yangan auris itotobon on, on nan Abraham a awan Sarah rus sigarobis.
Abraham irabob gibunai, God on Isaac imomoginai. Isaac on Dogu Sareu wabin BADA Yayawasin Yau Eiteu On An Dogu Sareu bisinai nan ima.
Atonio on Ishmael nanatun wawan agirin an dudur, Ishmael on Abraham natun, Sarah an agir jeverei Egypt emon wabin Hagar on ituai.
Ishmael nanatun mamaba sirat i nan, osi wabis on atonio: Nebaioth, Kedar, Adbeel Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa,
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphish a Kedemah.
Osi on dam auyotoat an yayatan ruam nanatun wawas agiris, ato osi wabis min asi goa mafam siwab seiris.
Ishmael an kwanda on 137 weie irabob.
Ishmael an dam warar on Havilah a Shur tafanam basunai nan sima, Egypt au wera matan na, eta au Assyria i nan on nan. Abraham nanatun wawan agirin fani on ma komasis fasisi on mes osi mabisi nan sima.
Atonio on Abraham natun Isaac an dudur.
Isaac an kwanda orot ruam an rai on Rebecca iawan, on min Bethuel natun jeverei a Laban robun, osi min Aram emon sinat Mesopotamia nan.
Rebecca on arin on mes Isaac on BADA aurin ibayoi awan Rebecca aurin fifi itituai mes. BADA on Isaac an bayoi iyafotai ato on awan Rebecca on inafot.
Fifirig orot sisiru on Rebecca yanai simama ato osi rus on sibi yerarat. On mes Rebecca iyau, “Aibo mes atonio bobo on nanaba emamatar yau auriu?” On mes on inai BADA iti tetemai an baiyafot it boai mes.
BADA on aurin iyau, “Tafanam ruam om yam amonai; om arimon sabu ruam unitu, osi sin kuseb ato tani on arimon in faiwar kwakwan men tani ba. Ainau orot on arimon giya orot ini agirai.”
Rebecca an wera inat itotoub on fifirig orot sisiru sirat.
Fifi orot ainau irarat on usin mururin, ato usin engon on bubunin youbin wat on sitau, on beber usinai i takwakwarai bait, on mes on wabin siyor Esau.
On gibunai fifi giya bairuin ba irarat on imanai Esau ann etun on aumiet bag ibokikin auman irat, on mes on siyor Jacob. Isaac on an kwanda orot wat ton, on an rai Rebecca on osi fifirig sisiru itu.
Fifirig sirat orot simatar, ato Esau on bo am an orot imatar ato on an gogoi on regai inabib, baise Jacob on orot rutanobin ato an gogoi on goai wat imama.
Isaac an nuabo on Esau, yabin Isaac an gogoi on rega masono Esau ibobo wain on i yam, baise Rebecca an nuabo on Jacob.
Ra tani Jacob bayu ibi tab ato Esau regai nan ibibib on bitanan igi kwakwan auman imatabir men inat.
Esau on Jacob aurin iyau, “Yau bayu mes bag ararabob. Gariwat, om bayu a sosof mururin ato ebi tab on turin eiteu.” (On fasinai Esau wabin tani min siyor Edom.)
Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Om ainau on am abou an buder on yau uniteu, weie yau bayu anitem.”
Esau iyau, “Engon basit wat! Yau on kafakakai mom anarab, ato abou an buder on arimon men aifan obin tani ini yamai yau auriu on.”
On mes Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Basit, om ainau on yau auriu unifaro ato am abou an buder on uniteu. On mes Esau baifaro an aumatan Jacob aurin iyamai ato an abou an buder on ibo itai.”
Namon Jacob sarar fani a sosof turin itai. Esau on bayu iyam itom isawar weie imisir inai. Esau atonio bobo nanaba ifour an itinai on abou an buder on aurin on asir yabin wagan wat.
Gomar tani on tafanamai imatar, men ainau Abraham an werai imamatar ba. On mes Isaac inai Gerar nan Philistia asi aiwab orot Abimelech aurin.
BADA on Isaac aurin irobotet ato iyawur iyau, “Om men unan au Egypt mes, om nin tafanamai ema mamaba awurem on nanaba.
Om atonio tafanamai on kafakakai unama ato Yau arimon om bisimui anama ato ani momoginem. Yau arimon tafanam engon tutufin on om a nanatum wawam agirim aurim anitem. Yau aumatan tamam Abraham aurin abi yamai on arimon an bokikin.
Yau arimon ani yamai nanatum wawam agirim sinison ato siribod safamai sen ba a atonio tafanam engon mat anites. Om am fesi fasisi on sabu tafanam au engon arimon ani momogines.
Yau arimon ani momoginem yabin Abraham fonau ibo au baifafaro a au baifofor engon ikaifaren.”
On mes Isaac on Gerar nan ima.
On an werai Gerar tafanam an orot Isaac sitetemai awan aurin. On iyawures iyau, “On on yau robu.” Men fofonin itau on awan, yabin on iber on tafanam matuanis arimon sitasubun ato Rebecca sit boai, yabin on jever on momogin fafa.
Isaac wera weromin nan ima, namon ra tani aiwab orot Abimelech an gigo emon isirir isur ato Isaac a Rebecca rus on sirorout sibi yayan on ites.
On mes Abimelech Isaac iyor inat aurin ato iyawur iyau, “Ari weie asagob ato jever on om awam! Om aibo mes uyau on om robum?” Isaac iyafotai iyau, “Yabin yau ai nonot on ari atau nin on yau awau ato omi arimon wotasubunueu.”
Abimelech iyau, “Om aifan wei auri ufour? Om am komasin emon on fofonin yau au orot tani on awam rus siten ato bit gagamin bag watabar.”
Abimelech sabu engon auris isosoan iyau, “Iyai iyafan atonio orot awan rus auris bobo komasis in fofour on arimon inarab.”
Isaac on motobai fesi ibofefes ato on kwanda kaitamom amonai on bayu gagamin bag ikuwain men ato fesi itatanum ba, yabin BADA imomoginai on mes.
Isaac on sawarotin imatar ato an sawar on nana irat igai asir on inat sawar an aiwab orot imatar.
On an sheep, cow a an bobo orot jever on ison kwakwan on mes Philistia sabu sibi boboarai.
On fasinai osi Philistia yangan simisir dogu sareu ainau Isaac taman Abraham an bobo orot sisasar on engon sitounen men sigai.
Namon Abimelech Isaac iyawur iyau, “Om wei ai tafanam on eikirir egat. Om ari unat orot faiwarim bag umatar men wei ba.”
On mes Isaac igat inai Gerar roubabanai nan an guwi iyon ato nan ima.
Ainau bag Abraham an werai, on dogu sareu on sigaraba isaren ato on irabob gibunai, Philistia sabu motob sibo sitounen men igai. On mes Isaac an bobo orot mat on dogu sareu sisaren men. Isaac taman Abraham dogu sareu wabis ibites on wab kaitamom min Isaac ites men.
Isaac an bobo orot roubabanai nan dogu sareu sisar ato kibubur sareu sigaturai.
Gerar an sheep kaifarotis on Isaac an sheep kaifarotis mat sigam ato siyawures siyau, “Atonio dogu sareu on wei noai.” On mes Isaac dogu sareu on i wabai, “Gamo.”
Namon Isaac an bobo orot dogu sareu tani ba sisar, baise osi on mat aurin sigamo, on mes Isaac on i wabai, “Gigit.”
On efan ikirir inai mabinai nan ato dogu sareu tani ba sisar, on nan motob on an dura ambin. On mes i wabai, “Rurufanin,” ato iyau, “Ari weie BADA atonio motobai efan itet a arimon an obin gagamin tan boai.
Isaac tafanam Gerar ikirir inai au Beersheba.
On fom BADA on Isaac aurin irobotet ato iyawur iyau, “Yau om tamam Abraham an God. Om men unaber mes, Yau on om bisimui. Yau arimon ani momoginem a nanatum wawam agirim babaisonis anitem, yabin Yau au agir orot Abraham aurin aumatan.”
Isaac sirifu agim kema nan iyon ato BADA ikwafirai. Namon an guwi nan iyon ato an bobo sabu dogu sareu sisar.
Abimelech an au baiyaten orot wabin Ahuzzath a bai gagam an bai netewar orot wabin Phicol mat on Gerar tafanam emon sinat Isaac sititai mes.
On mes Isaac itetemis iyau, “Omi on ari aibo mes wonat woniteu mes? Omi ainau on yau woi ragiteu ato woi teteriu ami tafanam ai kirir agat?”
Osi siyafotai siyau, “Ari weie wei wait bunag BADA on om bisimui, on mes wei wainonot wau on dura bag wat dura bo baibasit basuti tani yamai. Wei wagogoi unaumatan,
on om wei auri men bobo komasis uni yamen, mamaba wei om aurim wai yamai tufai wai kirirem unai ba. Ari weie irubunag BADA on om imomoginem.
Namon Isaac osi auris forag ibotitiwag ato osi siyam sitom.
Ra itom fomenei, Isaac Abimelech rus aumatan siyamai ato sifaro bonen. Isaac iyau baitotoris ato tufai ikirires sinai.
On wera kaitamomai Isaac an bobo sabu dogu sareu sisasarai aurin on sinat ato siyawur siyau, “Wei sareu wagaturai.”
On mes Isaac dogu sareu i wabai, “Shibah.” Ato ari on mafam gagamin min wabin seyoyorai Beersheba—“On an yabin min Bai faro an dogu sareu.”
Esau an kwanda orot ruam weie Hitt jeverig ruam iawanis, Beeri natun jeverei Judith a Elon natun jeverei Basemath.
Baise Esau awawan ruam asi yawas sibi yamai on yababan gagamin sibo sinat Isaac a Rebecca rus auris.
Isaac ari on iorokwar ato matan sifot. On natun orot abou iyor inat ato iyawur iyau, “Yau natu!” Esau iyafotai iyau, “Men bab, yau nio.”
Isaac iyau, “Yau on ai orokwar ato men asagob meyan arimon anarab.
Om am fidu an iyo mat eboen ato egat enai regai masono tani unyoai ato un boai unnat weineu.
Yau au gogoi bayu momonin on nanaba eitab ato ebo enat auriu. Yau on bayu anam in sawar gibunai arimon au bai momogin kanfoun anitem weie anarab.”
On an rai Isaac on Esau aurin dura ibi kakafun on Rebecca itatam. On mes on an werai Esau igat inai regai bib mes,
Rebecca natun Jacob iyawur iyau, “Yau ato arimon atatam tamam on Esau iyawur iyau,
‘Om masono tani ebo enat ato eitab weineu. Yau anam in sawar gibunai ato yau arimon BADA matanai au bai momogin anitem weie anarab.’”
Rebecca an dura ibotein iyau, “Ari weie natu, om fonau etatam ato aifan anau on nanaba uni yamai.
Om enai goat unis sigaraba setatawar amosi on goat bobous momos ruam eboen enat ani taben ato on emon tamam an gogoi bayu momonin an botitiwag.
Om un boai unan tamam unitai inam ato arimon an bai momogin initem weie inarab.”
Baise Jacob ayon iyawur iyau, “Om usagob Esau on bubunin youbin ato yau on usiu rumomoyin.
Tamau usiu in bototobon mes on ingatureu yau abi sigoai on, arimon yau tou an au dabiu ato arimon men bai momogin an boai on.”
Fifi ayon iyafotai iyau, “Yau natu, aifan audab on eikirir yau an boai, yau dura aifan au on bobo nanaba eiyamai, om enai goat ruam eboen enat auriu.”
On mes on inai ato goat ruam on iboen inat ayon itai, ato Rebecca bayu momonis itaben ibotitiwagen mamaba Isaac an gogoi i yau nanaba.
Namon Rebecca on Esau usin an bai takwakwaren obis bag goai iya si yen on iboen Jacob itakwakwarai.
Rebecca goat korofis iboen Jacob imanai a anyonai menan usin rumomois on nan ibo babaren.
Namon on bayu momonis a rafi sarar teteren mat on natun Jacob itai.
Namon Jacob inai taman aurin ato iyau, “Bab.” Isaac iyafotai iyau, “Men, yau natu, om iyafan.”
Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Yau on natum ainau orot Esau. Om dura mamaba uyawureu on aiyamai. Karun, emisir emair ato bayu momonis abo titiwag abo anat on unam weie ato am bai momogin uniteu.”
Isaac itetemai iyau, “Yau natu, om mamaba gariwat bag ugaturai? Jacob iyafotai iyau, “BADA am God ibaisiu agaturai.”
Isaac on Jacob iyawur iyau, “Om auriu auriu enat usim an botobon an sagob. Om on dura bag Esau ai ambin?”
Jacob irui taman Isaac bisinai bag ato Isaac on natun usin ibotobon ato iyau, “Om fonam on Jacob fonan, baise imam abotobon on Esau iman.”
Isaac men irubunagai on Jacob, baise on iman on er bubunin tuan Esau iman ba. Isaac on an bai momogin ititai mes,
baise itetemai men iyau, “Om min dura bag yau natu Esau i?” Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Dura bag, yau on Esau.”
Isaac iyau, “Yau natu, au gogoi bayu momonis ubotitiwag on ebo enat anam, on gibunai weie au yau bai momogin anitem.” Jacob bayu iboen inat ato itai iyam a sareu wine mat ibo inat itai itoman.
Namon on taman Isaac iyau, “Yau natu, om auriu auriu enat ato eyaniu.”
On mes on inat bisinai ato iyaan. On an werai Isaac on Esau an bai takwakwaren yanden itatam on imomoginai ato iyau, “Aee, yau natu yanden on motob ato BADA imomoginai on yanden ba.
Yau God abi fefeyanai on safam an turub initem a tafanam an mour ungaturai. On sawareg a sareu wine bobous gagaminai initem.
Mat On ini yamai arimon sabu tafanam engon tutufinai on om sini agirem a sabu engon tutufin arimon om sin kakafem. Om arimon taitaim tutuam engon uni netewaris, a ayom nanatun wawan agirin arimon om sin kakafem. Osi sabu iyabon sau dabim on God arimon inau dabis a osi sabu iyabon sebi momoginem on God arimon arimon ini momomgines.
Isaac on Jacob imomoginai isawar ato Jacob on sasasan wat taman ikirir inai mom on, tuan Esau ba regai ibibib on imatabir inat igat.
On mat bayu momonis itaben ato iboen inai taman aurin. Ato iyau, “Karun tamau, om emisir emair bayu momonis ato aurim abo titiwag abo anat on unam weie am bai momogin uniteu.”
Isaac itetemai iyau, “Om iyafan?” Esau iyafotai iyau, “Yau om natum ainau orot, Esau.”
Isaac on men sunub iror ato ibosuruf usin engon sibiror ato iyau, “Ato nan on iyafan bobaitu iyasubun ibo inat auriu i? Yau ato arimon aam isawar mom ato om unat. Yau au bai momogin kanfoun on engon tutufin on aitai, ato dura bag arimon on ini noanai au wantoan.”
On an werai Esau taman an dura itatam mom on, fonan gagaminai iyoku itou fufuan ato ifefeyan iyau, “Tamau, yau mat am bai momogin eiteu.”
Isaac iyafotai iyau, “Om taim inat isigoweu. Ato om am bai momogin on, on ibo.
Esau iyau, “Atonio on wera bairuin ba yau isigoweu. Men taniyoi on, on mes wabin min Jacob. Yau au abou an buder on, on ibo ato ari on au bai momogin ba ibo.” Namon Esau on taman itetemai iyau, “Om men buder tani ubotan yau auriu i?”
Isaac iyafotai iyau, “Yau on aiyamai inat om am bada mes imatar a mat dam warar on sinnat on an bobo sabu mes simatar, a sawareg a sareu wine boboun gagaminai aitai. Yau natu, men aifan tani yen arimon aurim ani yamai.”
Esau on nana taman idodoai ibi fefeyanai i yau “Tamau om am bai momogin min on wat i? Yau mat eimomogineu.” On ibosuruf itou.
Namon on taman Isaac iyafotai iyau, “Om am ma on tafanam an mour emon mabimui unama uni bitanangi a safam an turub emon mat mabimui unama.
Om arimon baiyo bai gagamai nan bayu un gaturai unamair unama, ato taim uni agirai. Baise on an werai unbi fonaseir on, om arimon on an an baibad emon on toum un kusebim mabimui unama.”
Esau tain Jacob aurin on gigit nana i yen yabin taman on Jacob imomoginai on mes. Esau inonot iyau, “Tamau an rabob an ra on inat iufin nono ato tou yababan insawar gibunai on yau Jacob anasubun.”
Baise on an werai Rebecca itatam Esau aifan iyau. On mes dura iyafar Jacob inat ato iyawur iyau, “Untatam, om tuam Esau on ebi nonotai inasubunuem mes.
On mes natu, yau dura aifan au on nanaba unafour. Om ari bag unan tafanam Haran nan robu Laban aurin.
Ato om nan rum kafakakai wonama weie tuam an yatatab on insibu insur.
On an rai om tuam an yatatab insawar a ato bobo aifan aurin ubiyamai on mat ininosfotai weie, yau dura ani yafar ato un matabir men unnat. Yau men agogoi ra kaitamom amonai on nanatu ruam engon ani siwanim.”
Namon Rebecca on Isaac iyawur iyau, “Yau Hitt jever mat ma on abi suweigan. Ato Jacob ba awan on tafanam emon inbi awan mes on, yau arimon men anama on.”
Isaac on Jacob iyor irui ato imomoginai weie bai sosoan dura iyawur iyau, “Om men Canaan jever uni awan mes.
Ab om rouser unan Mesopotamia tafanamai nan wawam Bethuel aurin, nan on om ayom taman. Ato om on abum Laban natun jeverei tani un iawan.
Yau God Faiwarin Bag abi fefeyanai On arimon am tabin inimomoginai a nanatum babaisonis initem onai om unnat tafanamai on sabu engon tutufin tamas mes un matar.
Yau God abi fefeyanai ini momoginem nanatum wawam agirim mat ato Abraham ibi momoginai ba, ato motob touman mat om ini noanim ato menan emama on min God ibo Abraham itai.
Isaac on Jacob iyafarai inai Mesopotamia tafanam nan Laban aurin, on min Bethuel natun orot Aram emon. Laban on Rebecca robun orot ato Rebecca on Jacob a Esau rus ayos.
Esau isagob Isaac on Jacob imomoginai ato iyafarai inai Mesopotamia tafanamai nan jever in boai ini awan mes. Mat on eb isagob on an werai Isaac on Jacob ibi momoginai on dura wawaninai iyawur men Canaan jever ini awan mes.
Ato on eb isagob Jacob on ayon taman fonas ibo inai au Mesopotamia.
Esau ari weie isagob taman Isaac on Canaan jever on men ebi basites.
Esau min awawan mat ato on inai Abraham natun Ishmael aurin ato natun jeverei Mahalath on iawan, on min Nebaioth robun.
Jacob on Beersheba ikirir ato ibosuruf ibib inai au Haran tafanam.
Wera isofafir ato on inat efan kakafaiinai nan igat ato nan iten mes. On iyeinir unin agimai irubogai iten bubur mes.
On ibomomout on wewen it motob emon itaseb igai inai au safam, on nan anea sigegeg a sisusur.
Ato Jacob on BADA it nan sesebinai itatawar ato iyawur iyau, “Yau on BADA, Abraham a Isaac rus asi God, Yau arimon atonio tafanam menan uyeinir yen on om a om nanatum wawam agirim mat anites.
Om nanatum wawam agirim on sini son ato tafanamai motob an fofou ba, ato osi arimon motob ato semama on sinkutuwe siniratai ingat bag inan au wera matan, au wera sifun, au tanam, au gorof ato om a nanatum wawam agirim fasimui on Yau tafanamai sabu engon tutufin on ani momogines.
Om unsagob on, Yau on arimon om bisimui anama ato an rufafarem menan menan un nanan nan, ato arimon an boem un matabir men unnat atonio tafanamai. Yau arimon nana bisimui anama ato bobo aifan au matanim on engon ani yamen.”
Namon Jacob en bubur emon imisir an bomomout inonotai ato iyau, “Dura bag! BADA on nin, On on atonio efanai ato yau men asagob.”
On iber ato iyau, “Atonio on kakaf gogom an efan! Nin on God an goa a safam an metewan awan.”
Jacob on ra itom fomenei bag imisir, agim unin irubogai i yen on ibo ato matair mes irou. Namon olive an momon kerin tefanai idebur isur God Wabinai imutai.
On efan wabin iyor Bethel. (On mafam gagamin min ainau wabin siyoyorai Luz.)
Namon Jacob baifaro dura iyamai BADA aurin ato iyau: Om yau bisiwui unmama a un rufafareu atonio au eta an bibib amonai a au bayu a usiu an bai takwakwaren uniteu,
ato yau obinai wat an matabir men anan tamau an tafanam aurin on, Om on arimon yau au God mes unama.
Atonio matair agim arou on arimon God an kwafir goa mes, ato yau arimon sawar engon unbi biteu on yau matas auyotoat anaya ato on amonai matan kaitamom on om anitem men.
Jacob nana ibib inai ato inat sabu au wera matan tafanamai nan simama on auris igat.
On matan i yeit on dogu sareu it, ato sheep kuayo matas engon ton on nan siki bubuai si yen. Osi sheep min on dogu sareu emon sareu sitotoman, ato agim gagamin on dogu sareu awan siyayafotai.
On an rai sheep engon si nat sibi kaita weie sheep kaifarotis dogu awan emon agim sirurukou i gat ato sareu sibites sitotoman isasawar weie agim sirurukou irur men an efanai.
Jacob sheep kaifarotis itetemis iyau, “Yau tuturau, omi on men emon?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “Wei on Haran yangan.”
On itetemis iyau, “Omi Nahor wawan Laban min wosagobai i?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “Aee, wei wasagobai.”
Jacob on itetemis iyau, “On min basit emama i?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “On basit emama, ato eit, on natun jeverei Rachel on ato an sheep mat sibib se nat.”
Jacob iyau, “Ari on aiyet ato wera men ibo on sheep un boes unar asi goai, om sareu eites setoman ato eboes ematabir men wayo sinam.”
Osi siyafotai siyau, “Wei men fofonin nanaba wani yamai, ainau on sheep engon sinat nin sini kaita weie dogu awan emon agim wan rukou inan ato sheep sareu wanites sin toman.”
Jacob on nana sheep kaifarotis auris ibi kakafun ato Rachel taman Laban an sheep mat sinat.
On an werai Jacob on Rachel a abun Laban an sheep mat ites on, on totor inai dogu sareu awan agim irukou ato sheep sareu ites sitoman.
Namon Jacob on Rachel ibo yayanin ato aumiet itou.
On iyawur iyau, “Yau on om tamam an tara, Rebecca natun orot.” Ato jeverei iyayai inai taman ikasonai.
On an werai Laban abun Jacob duran itatam, on iyayai inat inefotai, irous iboyayanin ato ibo inat goa amonai sirui. Jacob bobo aifan simamatar on engon abun Laban aurin idudur.
Laban iyau, “Ai, dura bag, om on yau biou au tara turin.” Ato Jacob nan roke kaitamom ima.
Laban imisir Jacob iyawur iyau, “Om men yau au dam warar on mes bobo asir unabo on. Om ekasoneu am baiyan biyam egogoi unboai?”
Laban nanatun jeverig ruam; ainau jeverei on wabin Leah, ato giya jeverei wabin on Rachel.
Leah on matan obis, ato baise Rachel on mamarag.
Jacob on Rachel inuaboai kwakwan, on mes iyau, “Yau arimon kwanda nimtereban ruam aurim anabo ato an garamin on natum giya jeverei Rachel on uniteu ani awan.”
Laban iyafotai iyau, “Iyobin bag, yau om anitem uni awan ato men orot tani abi nonotai on, on mes nana bisiwui ema.”
Jacob on kwanda nimtereban ruam bobo iboen onai Rachel it boai. Ato Jacob ibobo an nanianai on sitau on ra ton o bat nanaba iboen bait, yabin on Rachel inuaboai kwakwan on mes.
Namon Jacob on Laban iyawur iyau, “Wera ato abobo on ai sawarai nono, om natum jeverei eiteu ani awan.”
On mes Laban tabin an forag ibotitiwag ato sabu engon ibebegis sinat.
Baise on fom Laban on rouser Leah on ibo inai Jacob itai rus siyen.
Laban an agir jeverei Zilpah on natun Leah itai an bobo jeverei mes.
Ra itom fomenei weie Jacob it isagob on Leah ato Laban iyawur iyau, “Om aibo mes on nanaba aurim ufour? Yau Rachel aurin on aboen ato aibo mes uisigoweu?”
Laban iyau, “Wei nin ai kik on men nanaba yen gigiawan ainau setatabin weie ainauan on gibui.
Om emousin atonio tabin forag tafaror kaitamom on insawar weie giya jeverei Rachel ba wanitem, on an garamin on kwanda nimtereban ruam ba auriu unabo.”
Jacob ibasit ato tabin an forag yasisir tafaror kaitamom isawar gibunai Laban natun jeverei Rachel ba itai awan mes.
Laban an agir jeverei Bilhah on natun jeverei Rachel itai on an bobo jeverei mes.
Jacob on Rachel ba rus siyen a on inuaboai kwakwan bag men Leah ba. Namon Laban aurin kwanda nimtereban ruam ba iboen.
On an werai BADA it on Jacob an nuabo Leah aurin on kafakakai wat ato Rachel on ibi nuaboai kwakwan, on mes iyamai Leah on fofonin fifirig initu, baise Rachel on fifirig ambin.
Leah inafot ato natun orot irat. On iyau, “BADA au yababan it ato ari weie yau awau arimon ini nuaboiu.” On mes iwabai Reuben.
On inafot men ato natun orot tani ba irat. On iyau, “BADA natu orot iteu men, yabin On itatam Jacob on yau men ebi nuaboiu.” On mes iwabai Simeon.
On min on inafot men ato natun orot tani ba irat. On iyau, “Ari weie awau arimon yau bisiwui wat, yabin nanatun orot ton aitu.” On mes i wabai Levi.
Namon Leah inafot men ato natun orot tani ba irat. On iyau, “Ari weie yau BADA ani fain ani duduranai.” On mes iwabai Judah. Namon on fifirig baitu ibotan.
On an rai Rachel isagob on Jacob natun men tani ituai, on mes on tuan Leah on ibi natutumurai ato Jacob iyawur iyau, “Fifirig uniteu ai yau anarab.”
Jacob iyatatab Rachel aurin ato iyau, “Yau men fofonin God an efan an boai. On Toun iyafotem men fifirig ebitu.”
Namon Rachel iyau, “Au bobo jeverei Bilhah on atonio; om rum wonen ato on fifi inituai weineu, on nanaba on yau annat fifirig ayos an matar.”
On mes Rachel an bobo jeverei Bilhah on awan Jacob itai ato rus siyen.
Ato Bilhah inafot ato Jacob natun orot ituai.
Namon Rachel iyau, “God yau au gogoi fofonin on irubin, au bayoi itatam ato fifi orot iteu,” on mes i wabai Dan.
Bilhah inafot men ato Jacob natun orot bairuin ba ituai.
Rachel iyau, “Yau tuau Leah rui ai yawasai on wai yerarat inat, baise yau asowar.” On mes i wabai Naphtali.
On an rai Leah toun isagobai on an toub iyastin on mes an bobo jeverei Zilpah on Jacob itai awan mes.
Namon Zilpah on Jacob natun orot ituai.
Leah iyau, “Yau au obin agaturai,” on mes i wabai Gad.
Zilpah on Jacob natun orot tani ba ituai.
Namon Leah iyau, “Yau on men sunub abi yasisir! Ari weie jever engon tutufin sin yoreu, Yasisir,” on mes i wabai Asher.
Sawareg kuwain an werai Reuben regai irui ato jor an wengar igaturai ibo inat ayon Leah aurin. Rachel imisir Leah iyawur iyau, “Karun, abi fefeyanim, natum an jor turin eiteu.”
Leah iyafotai iyau, “Awau ubo on men ifofonim i? Ari on egogoi natu an jor turin ba un boai.” Rachel iyawur iyau, “Om natum an jor turin uniteu on arimon fom Jacob rum wonen.”
On an werai Jacob rabirabi bobo emon imatabir inat, Leah igat inefotai ato iyawur iyau, “Om ari fom on rut tanen, yabin min natu an jor ai on atobonim.” On mes fom rus siyen.
God on Leah an bayoi iyafotai ato inafot ato Jacob natun bainimin ba ituai.
Leah iyau, “God au baiyan iteu, yabin au agir jever awau aitai,” on mes i wabai Issachar.
Leah inafot men ato Jacob natun orot nimtereban kaitamom ba ituai.
On iyau, “God au siwar momogin iteu, ari weie awau in kakafeu, yabin nanatun orot wat nimtereban kaitamom aitu.” On mes iwabai Zebulun.
Gibui bag on natun jeverei irat ato iwabai Dinah.
Namon God on ari weie Rachel inos an bayoi iyafotai, ato yan iki tabirai men fifirig initu.
On inafot ato natun orot ituai. On iyau, “God natu orot ibiteu on au mamai engon iboseir.
Rachel fifi iwabai Joseph. On iyau, “Yau ababayoi, BADA on arimon fifi tani ba initeu.”
On an werai Joseph irat gibunai, Jacob imisir Laban iyawur iyau, “Yau agogoi an matabir men anan au go au tafanamai.
Om awawau nanatu mat engon eiteu, yabin osi auris on yau om aurim aboen ato yau anan. Om usagob yau mamaba wawaninai bag ai agirem on.”
Laban iyawur iyau, “Om emon obin an gagaturai mes on, karun, abi fefeyanim, ema. Yau au itinai asagob on, om fasimui on BADA yau imomogineu.”
Laban dura ibotein iyau, “Ekasoneu! om baiyan biyam egogoi ato yau ani baiyanim.”
Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Om usagob yau au bobo obin bag ai yamai am sheep akaifares tiwag on mes om am sheep irat inai sison kwakwan bag.
Om ainau am bobaitu on ruamom mom u botan ato yau anat weie irat gagamin a ison kwakwan bag ato yau au bobo emon on BADA imomoginem. Baise ari on yau tou awau nanatu asi obin aurin anabo.”
Laban itetemai iyau, “Ato aifan ani baiyanim?” Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Yau men agogoi baiyan tani, om atonio dura unbi basitai on yau arimon nana am sheep an kaifares:
Yau ari on am sheep engon aneit an rubin sheep bobous fufufum a goat usis farem mat on an boseseiren. Osi on yau au baiyan.
Namon om ra gibui unanat mes on om sasasan wat uniten un sagob yau on ai dura bag ai ambin. On an werai ato sheep au baiyan mes aboen on uni nateteyen goat tani men faremin a fufufum a sheep tani men gugugurin un gagaturen on, om arimon un sagob yau on om bisimui emon abainauen.”
Laban iyafotai iyau, “Yau abi basitai, aifan uyau on nanaba tani yamai.”
Baise on ra kaitamomai Laban goat tona usis gigirumis a faremis a toub engon usis fufufum a faremis engon iboseseren, sheep guguguris mat engon iboseseiren. On nanatun orot iyeinis sikaifares,
Namon Laban atonio sheep mat iboes ato inai ra ton an bib an weromin fofonin nan. Baise Jacob on Laban an sheep fani on ikakaifares.
Jacob wengar ta ta fafames on iboen ato korofis sanan sanan iseseren a isukakairen ato wengar fous kakakaiis sigat.
Atonio wengar fafames on sheep menan sareu totom asi didiwag yen on nan nasi iya. On nan iya yabin bobaitu sareu toman mes se nat ato on nan sebi yayar.
Ato goat wengar fafames nanai sini yayar ato nanatus arimon usis faremis sinarat.
Jacob an sheep a an goat ikusebis mabis mabis iya weie magis engon Laban an sheep a goat gigirumis a fufufum auris na iya. On eta ai on toun an sheep a goat on sison ato mabisi ikaifaren ato Laban an sheep a goat on eb mabisi.
On an rai sheep usis obis wawanis sibi yayar, Jacob on wengar fames nasi iyaya ato sareu an didiwag efanai ato wengar fafames bisisi nan sibi yayar.
Baise on wengar fames on men sheep usis teinis samisamis nasi iyaya on. On mes Laban an sheep on usis teinis samisamis ato Jacob an sheep on usis obis wawanis wat.
On eta ai Jacob on inat sawarotin orot gagamin imatar, an bobaitu on irat bag, an agir orot, jever a an camel a donkey mat.
Jacob itatam on Laban nanatun si yau, “Jacob on ot tamat an sawar ibi noanai on engon tutufin iboen. Ato ot tamat aifan ibi noanai on emon on sawar an aiwab orot imatar.
A mat Jacob it isagob on Laban an yawas aurin ifofour on men ainau ba.
Namon BADA on Jacob iyawur iyau, “Om ematabir men enai tatamam a am dam warar asi tafanamai. Yau arimon om bisimui anama.”
On mes Jacob dura iyafar Rachel a Leah rus auris sit nat menan an bobaitu ikakaifares on nan.
On iyawures iyau, “Ari aitai on, omi tamam an yawas yau auriu on men ainau ifofour ba; baise tamau an God on yau bisiwui emama.
Omi rum wosagob yau tamam aurin on au faiwar tutufinai aboen.
Baise on isigoeu au baiyan on wera auyotoat nanaba men fofon kaitamomai iteu on. Baise God on yau irufafareu.
On an werai Laban inau, ‘Goat ato usis faremis on om am baiyan,’ bobaitu engon sin totoub on faremis. Ato on an werai inau, ‘Tisasamaris on om am baiyan,’ bobaitu engon sin totoub on nanatus bobous on tisasamaris wat.
On mes God on tamam an bobaitu engon iyabaruai ato yau iteu.
Bobaitu si baiyayar an werai on yau abomomout goat tona usis tisasamaris, faremis a gigirumis on goat toub mat sibi yayar on aites.
God an anea bomomoutai iyawureu iyau, ‘Jacob!’ Yau ai yafotai au, ‘Men, yau nio.’
Ato God an anea iyau, ‘Eit! goat tona usis tisasamaris, faremis a gigirumis on goat toub mat sebiyayar. Yau atonio bobo anafour in matar, yabin Laban abi abi engon aurim ibi yamen on aiten.’
Yau God min on Bethel nan aurim arobotet, menan matair agim Yau auriu ukutetai ato rura momon kerin umutai ato auriu aumatan dura uiyamai. Om ari bag atonio tafanam eikirir ato un matabir men unan am rat baren tafanamai nan.”
Namon Rachel a Leah rus Jacob siyafotai siyau, “Wei tamai an buder on men tani yen wan boai on.”
On wei e boei on nanawan jeverig ba. Om wei utobonei, ato men on wat on, baise on wei ai baiyan an agim on engon ireben isawar.
Sawar a agim an bai aiwab engon ato God wei tamai emon iyabaruai on wei noai a nanatui noas. On mes God mamaba iyawurem on eiyamai.
On mes Jacob ibotitiwag ato imisir awan ruam a nanatun iboes camel tefasi iyagagaiis.
Ato an bobaitu engon iboes ainau iyafares si nan a mat on an sawar engon tutufin ato tafanam Mesopotamia imama ibinoanai on engon iboen imatabir men taman Isaac an tafanam Canaan aurin.
On an werai Laban on inai an sheep bubunis it yaragen mes ato Rachel on ufutai taman an goai irui an bai yuyur god on ibo tawaseiren.
Jacob on Laban isigoai men ikasonai isagob on yai kirir.
On mes on an sawar engon tutufin iboen mat iyayai. On Euphrates sareu irabon weie on ibosuruf inai Gilead oyau oyau tafanam aurin.
Ra ton isawar gibunai weie sabu Laban sikasonai on Jacob iyayai.
Laban an dam warar orot iboes Jacob gibunai sifaitan sinai wera nimtereban ruam weie Gilead oyau oyau tafanamai nan sibotan.
On fom God bomomoutai Laban iyawur iyau, “Om un kaifarai tiwag Jacob men dura ai unau beberuai mes.”
Jacob an guwi on Gilead oyauai iyon imama. Ato Laban an dam warar mat sinat sibotanai ato osi on eb asi guwi on nan Gilead oyauai siyonen.
Ra itom weie rus osi sinofoten ato Laban imisir Jacob iyawur iyau, “Om aibo mes usigoweu ato nanatu jeverig uboes uyayai, an itin on sitau ragitai sebi gagam sefafatumes sai ba?
Om aibo mes usigoweu ato bubuniai uyayai kirireu? Om yau ut kasoneu ato yau arimon dour tatafai, yasisirai a kwarerai nan ati yafarem utan.
Om men wera uteu ato wawau at boyayanis a nanatu jeverig atau baitotoris, om on ojis asi bobo on uiyamai.
Yau on faiwar yen fofonin ati komasim, baise on fom on tamam an God iyawureu men eta tani ai nan dura ai anau beberuem mes.
Yau asagob om am gogoi bag on un matabir men unan am tafanam aurin on mes ukirireu, baise aibo mes au bai yuyur god on ubo tawaseiren?”
Jacob on Laban iyafotai iyau, “Yau aber, yabin yau ai nonot on om arimon nanatum wani ai nan utabarueu on mes.
Baise om nin iyafan un gaturai on om am bai yuyur god ibo tawaseiren, on min unasubun. Nin ati dam warar matasi, nan toum erunanag eiten aifan om noam on eboen.” Jacob on men isagob Rachel on Laban an bai yuyur god ibo tawaseiren.
Laban irui Jacob an guwi ai inuen, weie inai Leah an guwi ai ba, a bobo jever ruam asi guwi ai ba, baise an bai yuyur god men igaturen. Namon on inai Rachel an guwi ai ba irui.
Rachel on goa asi bai yuyur god on iboen camel an sifumama amonai iwanen ato tefanai imair imama. Laban guwi amos engon irunanagen baise osi bai yuyur god men igaturen.
Rachel taman iyawur iyau, “Au bada, auriu abi ebi yatatab, yau men fofonin namui an misir an tawar; yabin yau ari on au roke abo amama.” On mes Laban guwi amonai irunanag wat ato an bai yuyur god men igaturen.
On mes Jacob iyatatab kwakwan ato yatatabai nan Laban iyawur iyau, “Yau abifan komasin wat aurim aiyamai i? Abi sofafar astob on fasinai om faiwar ubo kouwui ufaitaniu unat nin ugat?
Ari on au sawar engon tutufin urunanagen ato am goa sawar aifan wat ugaturai on om noam i? Om nin basunai eyatet egat om am dam warar a yau au dam warar engon matasi sinitai, weie osi sinau iyafan on dura bag.
Yau om rut tamama ari on kwanda orot kaitamom isawar ato am sheep a am goat usis engon obis wat sitotoub sirarat, a mat yau men am bobaitu boboun tani aan on.
On an rai rega kuke tutuenis sheep tani siyasubun on, yau men a boai a nat abi yoboem on, baise yau tou sheep tani a boai abi garaminai. Ato om fom ai rai sheep tani kuke tutuenis siyasubun aurin on dura wawaninai u yawureu ato tani a boai anat abi garaminai.
Ra sigaraba wera forabin i tabiu a fom an nuba sibuin imotobiu, men fofonin aten bubur.
Ato kwanda orot kaitamom bisimui amama on atonio nanaba wat. Kwanda auyotoat an yayatan bat on nanatum jeverig ruam auris aboen, a kwanda nimtereban kaitamom on am bobaitu akaifares. Ato om nana au baiyan on wera auyotoat nanaba men fofon kaitamomai uiteu on.
Ato baise tatamau Abraham a Isaac asi God men yau bisiwui it mama mes on, om arimon erimau bag uti yafareu atan. Baise God au yababan a bobo aifan abi yamai on it, ato on fasinai On rarab fom dura wawaninai iyawurem on om bobo fetag ufour.”
Laban on Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Atonio jeverig on yau nanatu, nanatus min yau nanatu a sawar engon tutufin ato eiten on yau noau a mat atonio bobaitu on yau au bobaitu. Baise men fofonin ari aifan ani yamai nanatu jeverig nanatus mat auris.
Om enat yau rut dura bo baibasit tani yamai, nin agim tanyon inag ato on tanitai on ati not inrurar on om yau rut dura tabi basitai on.
On mes Jacob agim gagamin kaitamom ibo tefanai irou matair mes.
On an dam warar orot iyawures agim siruayo ato siyadodog igai. Namon osi agim ato sibi yadodog on sesebinai simair bayu siyam.
Laban on agim-yadodog iyor Jegar-Sahadutha ato Jacob on iyor Galeed.
Laban imisir Jacob iyawur iyau, “Atonio agim-yadodog on om yau rut ati not in rurar.” On mes on efan wabin iyor Galeed.
Laban on eb iyau, “Om yau rut on mabit mabit tanama, baise BADA on arimon inbi mateteit.” On mes on efan wabin iyor Mizpah.
Laban dura ibotein iyau, “Om nanatu jeverig men un kaifares tiwag ai jever tani unbi awan on men an sagob, baise un sagob on God on ebi mateteit.”
Laban Jacob aurin mat iyau, “Agim atonio yau aya dodog igai, om yau rut sanati a atonio on matair agim.
Atonio agim-yadodog a atonio matair agim on not e rurar. Yau on men ani giserai an rabon om an yowim an rabim mes a om eb men uni giseirai un rabon yau un yowiu un rabiu mes.
Abraham an God a Nahor an God, osi tatamas asi God arimon sanati ini gurubabanit.” On mes Jacob taman Isaac an God ikwakwafirai on Wabinai ifaro.
Namon Jacob bobaitu tani iyasubun ato oyau tefanai sirifu ikutetai, an dam warar ibebegis sinat ato mat bayu siyam sitom isawar weie osi nan oyauai siyen.
Ra itom fomenei fomenei Laban imisir nanatun jeverig a wawan fifirig ibo yayanis a iyau baitotoris weie ikirires imatabir men inai an au go.
Jacob an dam warar mat asi etai sibib si nan men ato God an anea fani sinat sinefotai.
On an werai Jacob on anea ites mom on iyau, “Nin on God an guwi efan,” on mes on efan i wabai Mahanaim.
Jacob dura bo bibotis ainau iyafares sinai Edom tafanamai tuan Esau aurin.
On iyau baiyates iyau, “Omi atoio dura nanaba au bada Esau wonawur: ‘Am agirotin Jacob iyau,’ ‘Yau Laban rui weromin maiau wama inat ari weie amatabir men anat.
Yau on er au cow, donkey, sheep, goat a au agir jever a agir orot. Au bada, yau dura aurim abi yafar, onai om yau auriu on am ya obin ut boai.”
On an werai dura bo bibotis sinat Jacob aurin ato siyawur siyau, “Wei wanai tuam Esau aurin ato ari bag on igat e nat nono om in nefotim mes. On an orot on 400 iboes mat senat.”
Jacob atonio dura itatam on iber kwakwan an not engon ifeu. On an sabu mat simama on ikusebis kuayo matas ruam simatar. On an sheep, goat, cow a camel on eb nanaba ikusebis ruam simatar.
On atonio nanaba inonot, “Esau innat kuayo matan ainauin auris inbi ragit on, kuayo matan bairuin on sinayai sinan.”
Namon Jacob ibayoi iyau, “O yau wawau Abraham an God, a tamau Isaac an God. O BADA Om yau un tatamiu, Om uyawureu uyau, ‘Yau an matabir men au tafanamai a au dam warar auris ato Om uyau mataniu arimon bobo obis uni yamen auriu.
Yau on agirotiu a yau men orot obiu, baise om am kaber a am moa obin auriu ebi yamai. Ainau bag yau Jordan sareu arabon on men aifan tani abo auman arabon on ab au tutuk wat on abo arabon ato ari amamatabir on au kuayo matas ruam mat a nat.
Yau aurim ababayoi tuau Esau iman emon uni yawasiu. Yau abeber, yabin on e nat on yau a jever fifi mat engon ini ragitei.’
Baise om u yawureu uyau, ‘Om arimon un kaifareu tiwag a arimon uni yamai wawau agiriu sini son tore an gasa ba ato men fofonin sini yab.’”
Jacob fom kaitamom nan iyen gibunai on an bobaitu sanasi on tuan Esau an siwar irubinen.
goat toub on 200, goat tona on orot kaitamom, sheep toub on 200, sheep tona on orot kaitamom.
Camel toub nanatus auman on orot kaitamom, orot ta aurin auyotoat, cow toub on orot ruam, cow tona on auyotoat, donkey toub on orot kaitamom a donkey tona on auyotoat.
On an bobo sabu on bobaitu matas ta ta nan iyeinis sin kaifaren, ato an bobo sabu iyawures iyau, “Yau au nau wotawar ato wonitai bobaitu matas ta ta basusi on sanas sinen.”
On an bobo orot ainau in tatawar on iyau baiyatai iyau, “On an werai tuau Esau in nefotem ato ini tetemim inau, ‘Om am bada iyafan? Om aumen enan? Atonio bobaitu engon namui on iyafan ebi noanai?’
Om uni yafotai unau, ‘Om am bobo orot Jacob noan. Osi on siwar an bada Esau aurin ebi yafar. Jacob toun on gibui bag e nat.’”
Jacob on dura kaitamom min iyabonai bobaitu kaifarotis bairuin, baitonin a matas ta ta engon iyawures: “On an werai Esau won nefotai, omi on dura kaitamom on nanaba wonawur.’
Omi won sagob wonau, ‘Aee, am bobo orot Jacob on gibui e nat,’” Jacob inonot, “Siwar ato ainau ai yafar e nan onai arimon nunuan an boai, weie on an werai magin anitai on abi tutum on arimon ini notbureu.
Jacob an siwar on engon iyafaren sinai, ato on ekesin on fom an guwi ai iyen.
On fom kaitamom Jacob imisir awawan ruam, bobo jever ruam a nanatun auyotoat an yayatan kaitamom iboes ato Jabbok sareu menan tefa on nan sirabon.
On iyafares sirabon gibunai on an sawar engon mat iyafaren sirabon.
Ato Jacob on ekesin nan sikirir. Namon orot tani inat iforousai rus siyen sififirur mom inai ra iyabaseb.
On an werai orot it on men fofonin Jacob it bomerubai on mes On Jacob gesagesanai irab ikuseren.
Namon orot iyau, “Ra etotom, om eikirireu Yau anai.” Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Om bai momogin unitai weie yau ani kirirem unan.”
Orot Jacob itetemai iyau, “Om wabim mamaba?” On iyafotai iyau, “Yau wabiu Jacob.”
Namon orot iyau, “Om wabim on men arimon sin yorem Jacob baise sin yorem Israel, yabin om God rum a orot fani mat woi yerarat ato tefasi ukayam.”
Jacob iyau, “Karun, abi fefeyanim, om wabim ekasoneu.” Baise on iyafotai iyau, “Om aibo mes egogoi wabiu un sagob?” Namon on Jacob imomoginai.
On mes Jacob on efan wabin iyor Peniel, on an yabin min yau God rui magi wai ruruai ato yau nana yawasiu amama.
Jacob Peniel ibi kirir auman auman wera igai, ato ibi sait auman, yabin on an fui ikuseiren.
On fasinai inat ari Israel yangan foro touyan an fui matan karukar on men sam on, yabin Jacob min on rarikai nan sirab.
Jacob on iyeit inai Esau an orot 400 mat si nat ites, on mes fifirig ikusebis Leah, Rachel a bobo jever ruam amosi.
Bobo jever ruam nanatus mat ainau iyeinis sitawar weie Leah nanatun mat osi gibusi sitawar ato Rachel Joseph rus on gibui bag sitawar.
Ato Jacob toun on ainau an dam warar nasi itawar inai. Namon on ra nimtereban ruam nanaba uson itur ikwafir isur magin motob iruyein mom inai tuan orot aurin igat.
Baise Esau iyayai Jacob inefotai ato iman anjonai ireben bonai irous iboyayanin ato rus sibotouousis.
Namon Esau iyeit jever a fifirig ites ato itetem, “Atonio sabu on iyabon om mat wonat?” Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Osi on yau nanatu God an kaber emon yau am agirotiu iteu.”
Namon bobo jever ruam nanatus mat sinat Esau nanai sindas siruouen usos situr sikwafirai.
Namon Leah nanatun mat sinat sindas sirouen usos situr sikwafirai ato gibui bag on Rachel natun Joseph rus sinat sindas sirouen usos situr sikwafirai.
Esau on Jacob itetemai iyau, “Ato bobaitu mat ainau abi nofoten on an yabin aifan?” Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Au bada nan on om am ya obin aurin.”
Baise Esau iyau, “Yau taiu, yau au bobaitu on sigaraba, aifan noam on ebotan.”
Jacob iyau, “Ambin, om am ya obin ini dura bag mes on au siwar ei basitai ato ebo. Om magim aitai on God magin aitai ba, on emon om ari uboeu tiwag.
Karun, abi fefeyanim, fofonin atonio siwar om aurim aboen anat on ei basitai eboen; God on yau ikabereu aifan au gogoi on engon iteu.” Jacob nana i dodoai ato Esau ibasitai iboen.
Namon Esau iyau, “Ot tan botitiwag ato tan misir tanan, yau arimon aninau anan.”
Baise Jacob iyawur iyau, “Au bada, om usagob fifirig on usis sisam a yau on sheep a bobaitu fani nanatus mat abi nonotis. Men fofonin ari ra kaitamom bai yagiginai nan tanan on, arimon bobaitu engon sinarab.
Karun, abi fefeyanim, om einau enai, ato yau arimon sunub sunub ani gibubunuem annat, fofoninai ana bib bobaitu a fifirig mat weie arimon Edom nan tani nefoten.”
Esau iyau, “Basit au orot fani on om bisimui ani kirires.” Baise Jacob iyafotai iyau, “Au bada, aibo mes on nanaba ebi yamai, baise on on om am ya obin aurin.”
On mes on rai Esau ibosuruf imatabir men inai au Edom.
Baise Jacob on au Sukkoth inai nan an goa iyon, a bobaitu asi guwi mat iyonen. On mes efan min wabin iyor Sukkoth.
On kounai Jacob Mesopotamia emon imatabir on obinai inat Shechem mafam gagamin Canaan tafanamai igat, ato on an guwi on motob ato mafam gagamin bisinai, on nan iyon.
On Hamor wawan agirin Shechem taman emon on motob turin agim silver orot wat nim, onai itobon.
On nan sirifu agim kema iyon ato iwabai El Elohe Israel asi God.
Ra tani Jacob a Leah rus natus jeverei wabin Dinah on inai Canaan jever it fasiues mes.
On an werai orot wabin Hamor on Hivi dam emon ato on min tafanam an aiwab orot imama. On natun orot wabin on Shechem on Dinah it igogoiai ato irous aurin bobo komasin ifour ikafotai.
Shechem on Dinah it on momogin fafa. On mes on nunuan tutufinai inuaboai a on ifourtobon dura obis wat on jeverei aurin ibi kakafun nunuan it boai mes.
On mes Shechem on taman Hamor iyawur iyau, “Bab yau agogoi atonio jeverei Dinah un boai ato yau on ani awan.”
On gibunai Jacob isagob Shechem on natun jeverei aurin bobo komasin ifour. Baise on nanatun orot engon sigat sinai asi bobaitu sikakaifares on mes Jacob on men dura aifan tani ikakafun ato imousin sit matabir sitnat au go weie dura iti kakafun.
Shechem taman Hamor on igat inai Jacob rus siti kakafun mes.
On werai Jacob nanatun bobo isawar simatabir men sinat on dura sitatam Shechem on osi robus Dinah aurin bobo komasin ifour ikafotai. Osi nunuas iyababan ato siyatatab kwakwan yabin Shechem ato Jacob natun jeverei aurin yawas komasin ifofour on Israel amonai on mamai gagamin ato on bobo nanaba on men it matar.
Baise Hamor on Jacob nanatun mat iyawures iyau, “Yau natu orot Shechem on nunuan tutufinai Dinah egogoai, karun, abi fefeyanim, jeverei woitai ini awan.
Ot dura bo baibasit taniyamai ato wei on omi ami jeverei wani awanis ato omi on eb wei ai jeverig woni awanis.
Ato omi wei ai tafanamai mat tanamair tanama ato tafanam on ruruseren omi aurim nan wonama, wonabib a motob wonabo sini noanim.”
Namon Shechem on Dinah taman a rorobun auris iyau, “Omi ami ya obin on woiteu ato yau arimon aifan ami gogoi on ani yamai.
Omi jeverei woniteu ani awan on ato wonawureu aifan siwar wogogoi on anitem. Mat kekes an rat menan fofonin on wonawureu; yau arimon an baiyan mamaba woyeyeinin on nanaba ani baiyan.”
Ato Jacob nanatun on Hamor natun Shechem rus auris on men dura bagai siyafotes on. Osi sisosoufis yabin Shechem on osi robus Dinah aurin bobo komasin ifour ikafotai.
Osi siyawur siyau, “Wei orot ato men siaskibubuai on men robui wanitai ini awan on. On arimon wei auri on mamai gagamin bag.
Wei eta kaitamomai wat nan baibasit wanitem. Omi ami orot engon woni askibubues wonnat wei ba won matar.
Namon wei arimon wani basitem wei omi ami jeverei wani awanis ato omi on eb wei ai jeverig woni awanis a mat omi amomui wanamair wanama ato mat dam kaitamom tan matar.
Baise dura ato askibubu aurin wau on men won bibasitai on, wei arimon jeverei wan boai wanan.”
Hamor natun Shechem rus atonio dura sitatam on sibasitai.
Shechem on ra kaita inai ato siaskibubuai, yabin on Jacob natun jeverei on inuaboai kwakwan. Shechem min wabin on gagamin an dam warar amosi.
On mes Hamor natun Shechem rus sinai asi mafam gagamin an furi awanai nan on sabu engon auris sikakafun.
Osi siyawures siyau, “Atonio osi orot on sabu obis tani kirires nin tafanamai mat tanama ato amonai sinama sini totobon. Tafanam on irat kwakwan fofonin osi mat auris. Ot osi nanatus jeverig tani awanis ato osi mat ot nanatut jeverig sini awanis.
Baise atonio bobo kaitamom aurin on tani basit on arimon atonio sabu mat engon kaitenei tanama. On min ot orot engon tutufin sini askibubuet tannat osi ba tan matar.
Ot ati baibasit wat on tanites ato asi bobaitu a asi sawar engon on ot sini noanit ato sanati sinamair sinama.”
Sabu engon tutufin sinat Hamor natun Shechem rus asi dura sitatan on engon sibasit, ato orot engon on mafam gagamin amonai on siaskibubues.
Ra ton isawar gibunai, orot engon sibi askibubues on gawud auman simama, Jacob nanatun orot ruam, Simeon a Levi, osi min Dinah rorobun bag, asi seri siboen ato sinai mafam gagaminai sunub sirui sisafures mom ato orot engon siyasubunues.
Osi Hamor natun Shechem rus mat seriai siyasubunues. Namon osi Dinah Shechem an goa emon sibo ato sigat sinai.
On an rai Simeon a Levi sabu siyasubunues isawar gibunai, Jacob nanatun orot fani on engon sinat mafam gagamin amonai gugu engon siboen yabin robus Dinah aurin bobo komasin sibi yamai sikakafotai aurin on an soi sibo.
On mes osi ainauan gigiawan on ato mafam gagamin amonai a kounai nan sheep, cow a donkey nan simama on engon siboen.
Osi on sawar asi baiyas gagamis, jever fifi engon sifatumes, asi buder a asi goa amonai sawar si yen on engon siboen mat sinai.
Namon Jacob on Simeon a Levi rus iyawures iyau, “Omi on bit gagamin bag on wobo wonat auriu yau wabiu woikomasai. Omi on bobo wobi yamai on Canaan sabu a Perizz sabu engon nin tafanamai semama on arimon yau sini sisiweiiu. Ot sabu men sigaraba on ato osi fofonin engon sini kaita sinnat sini ragiteu on, yau au dam warar mat fofonin engon sinasubunuet insawar.
Baise osi ainauan gigiawan on siyafotai siyau, “Wei men fofonin robui wani kirir on nanaba aurin sinafour eta eta an jever ba.”
Namon God on Jacob aurin iyau, “Om egai au Bethel ato nan unama. Om sirifu agim kema Yau am God auriu unyon. Yau min on efanai nan aurim arobotet, on an rai tuam Esau u yai kirir nan.”
On mes Jacob an dam warar, awawan, nanatun a sabu iyabon nan mat simama on iyawures iyau, “Omi sabu touman asi god ta ta ato bisimui sen on won rebenen. Omi toum won yamuyarim ato beber gumidaris wonoten.
Namon ot tani wabunag ato tan misir tanag au Bethel, on nan yau arimon God aurin sirifu agim kema an yon. On God min yau au yababan an rai on i baisiu a menan menan a nan on yau bisiwui ima.”
On mes osi sabu touman asi god ta ta a tainas buwor si yoten on engon tutufin Jacob sitai. Ato on Shechem nan wengar Dunar gagamin babanai isar i tounen.
On an werai Jacob nanatun mat sibosuruf sibib, God an beruber gagamin on ato mafam gagamis bisisi si yen on engon i taragabues, on mes osi mafam sabu on men fofonis gibusi sit faitanis sitan on.
Jacob an sabu engon mat sinat mafam Luz nan sigat, on min ari seyoyorai Bethel, Canaan tafanam amonai nan.
On sirifu agim kema iyon ato efan wabin iyor, “Bethel an God”, yabin on an werai Jacob on tuan orot i yayai kirir i nan ato God Toun on nan aurin irobotet.
Rebecca an fio jever Deborah on nan irabob ato wengar Dunar gagamin babanai sigarob, Bethel bisinai. On mes wabin siyor, ‘Tou an Dunar’.
On an werai Jacob Mesopotamia emon imatabir i nat men, ato God on nan aurin iroboet men ato imomoginai.
God iyawur iyau, “Om wabim on Jacob ato men gibui sin yorem men Jacob, ab om wabim on sin yorai Israel.” Om mes God i wabai Israel.
Ato God iyawur iyau, “Yau on God Faiwariu Bag! Om fifirig sigaraba unitu ato tafanamai sabu on arimon inison kwakwan, ato om nanatum wawam agirim fani on arimon aiwab sin matar.
Yau tafanam ato Abraham a Isaac abites on arimon anitem, ato on motob min nanatum wawam agirim mat anites.”
Namon God on efan menan Jacob aurin ibi kakafun on ikirir ato igai.
On nan Jacob matair agim menan God aurin ibi kakafun nan irou ato sareu wine a rura momon an kerin on tefanai ideburen ikutetai God aurin.
On mes Jacob on efan iyor Bethel menan God on aurin ibi kakafun nan.
Namon Jacob an dam warar mat Bethel sikirir sinai. On an werai osi sinat Ephrath mafam aurin sibi ufin ato Rachel on fifi itarat aurin on koun igigiai ato usi baban gagamin i boai.
On usi baban gagamin bag i boai an werai, on an bai totoubis jever iyawur iyau, “Rachel, om men unaber mes, om fifi orot tani ba uni tuai.”
Baise Rachel on irarabob, ato an aratein kanfoun ibi sawarai on fifi i wabai Ben-Oni. Baise taman on i wabai Benjamin.
Ato Rachel irabob ato Ephrath eta rewanai nan sigarobai, on min Bethlehem.
Jacob matair agim nan Rachel an budi tefanai irou, ato ari ra agim min nan nana yen.
Jacob i nanawan inai Midgal Eder ikirir inai rebanai nan an guwi iyon. (Midgal Eder an yabin min kaifarotin bobaitu ekakaifares an goa ann weromin.)
Jacob on nana on tafanamai imama ato natun Reuben on inai taman awan ufuigeg jever wabin Bilhah on rus siyen; Jacob on dura itatam on i yatatab kwakwan. Jacob nanatun orot wat engon auyotoat an yayatan ruam.
Leah nanatun orot, osi wabis min Reuben, (Jacob natun ainau orot), Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar a Zebulun.
Rachel nanatun orot, osi wabis min Joseph a Benjamin.
Rachel an bobo jever Bilhah nanatun orot, osi wabis min Dan a Naphtali.
Leah an bobo jever Zilpah nanatun orot, osi wabis min Gad a Asher. Atonio osi fifirig orot engon on Jacob nanatun ato osi Mesopotamia nan sirat.
Jacob inat au go taman Isaac aurin Mamre mafamai nan, Hebron bisinai menan Abraham a Isaac rus simama nan.
Isaac ima an kwanda 180
ato on iorokwar bag weie irabob, ato nanatun Esau a Jacob rus sigarobai.
Atonio osi on Esau nanatun wawan agirin, on min wabin tani seyoyorai Edom.
Esau on Canaan jever iawanis. Jever ainaiun wabin on Adah, on min Hitt orot wabin Elon on natun jeverei. Jever bairuin wabin on Oholibamah, on min Anah natun jeverei ato on Zibeon Hivi orot on wawan jeverei.
ato jever baitonin wabin on Basemath, on min Ishmael natun jeverei a Nebaioth robun.
Ato Adah natun orot Eliphas ituai; Basemath natun orot Reuel ituai
ato Oholibamah on nanatun orot Jeush, Jalam a Korah itues. Osi fifirig orot engon on Esau nanatun Canaan nan sirat.
Namon Esau awawan, nanatun orot, nanatun jeverig a dam warar engon, an bobaitu a sawar gugu ato Canaan tafanamai imama ibinoanai on engon iboen ato tain Jacob ikirir igat inai tafanam taniai nan ima.
Esau tain Jacob ikirir inai yabin osi rus asi sawar gugu on irat kwakwan bag a asi bobaitu on sison kwakwan, on mes men fofonin rus efan kaitamomai sitama on.
On mes Esau on oyau tafanam wabin Seir, on nan ima. Esau wabin tani min seyoyorai Edom.
Atonio on Esau nanatun wawan agirin asi dudur. Osi min Edom yangan nan oyau Seir nan simama.
Esau nanatun orot wabis on: Eliphaz, Esau awan Adah on ituai a Reuel on Esau awan Basemath on ituai.
Eliphaz nanatun orot, osi wabis on Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam a Kenaz.
Esau natun Eliphaz mat awan tani wabin Timna, on natun Amalek. Atonio fifi orot on Esau awan Adah, on wawan.
Reuel nanatun orot, osi wabis on Nahath, Zerah, Shammah a Mizzah. Atonio fifirig orot on Esau awan Basemath on wawan.
Esau awan Oholibamah on nanatun engon ton itu: Osi min Jeush, Jalem a Korah. Oholibamah min Anah natun jeverei a Zibeon wawan jeverei.
Atonio on dam ta ta Esau emon. On natun ainau orot wabin Eliphaz on nanatun wabis on: Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kezaz, Korah, Gatam a Amalek, osi engon on Esau awan Adah on wawan orot.
<range>
Esau natun Reuel on nanatun, osi amosi on dam ta ta on ato nanaba: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah a Mizzah. Osi min Esau awan Basemath on wawan orot.
Atonio osi dam ta ta on Esau awan Oholibamah, Anah natun jeverei nanatun orot, osi wabis min Jeush, Jalam a Korah.
Atonio dam ta ta on Esau, on min Edom on nanatun wawan agirin.
Atonio on Seir nanatun orot osi min Hor yangan, ainau Edom nan simama, osi wabis min Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon a Anah,
Dishon, Ezer a Disham, osi min Seir nanatun, Hor dam unis Edom nan simama.
Lotan nanatun orot, osi wabis min Hori a Homam ato Lotan robun on Timna.
Atonio on Shobal nanatun orot, osi wabis min Alvan, Menahath, Ebal, Shepho a Onam.
Zibeon nanatun orot, osi wabis min Aiah a Anah. Atonio Anah min on efan koiteterinai nan taman an donkey ikakaifares ato kibubur sareu forabin igaturai.
Anah nanatun, osi wabis min Dishon a Oholibamah, on min Anah natun jeverei.
Dishon nanatun orot, osi wabis min Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran a Cheran.
Atonio osi on Ezer nanatun orot, osi wabis min Bilhan, Zaavan a Akan.
Atonio on Dishan nanatun orot, osi wabis min Uz a Aran.
Atonio on Hor sabu asi dam unis Seir tafanamai simama, osi wabis min Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer a Dishan.
<range>
Atonio on aiwabis ainau Edom tafanamai sibi aiwab weie Israel aiwab imatar.
Boar natun Bela on Edom tafanamai ibi aiwab, an mafam gagamin wabin Dinhabah.
Bela irabob gibunai Zerah natun Jobab, Bozrah emon on Bela an efan ibo iaiwab.
Jobab irabob gibunai, Husham, Teman tafanam emon on an efan ibo i aiwab.
Husham irabob gibunai Bedad natun Hadad on an efan ibo i aiwab. Hadad inai Moab tafanamai nan Midian sabu mat sibi gagam ato Hadad i sowar ibo merubes. Hadad an mafam gagamin wabin min Avith.
Hadad irabob gibunai Samlah, Masrekah emon on an efan ibo i aiwab.
Samlah irabob gibunai Shaul, Rehoboth emon Euphrates sareu bisinai on an efan ibo i aiwab.
Shaul irabob gibunai Achbor natun Baal-hanan on an efan ibo i aiwab.
Achbor natun Baal-hanan irabob gibunai Hadar on an efan ibo i aiwab. An mafam gagamin wabin Pau ato awan wabin Mehetabel, Matred natun jeverei a Me-zahab wawan jeverei.
Atonio osi on Edom yangan asi dam unis wabis: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth, Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon, Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar, Magdiel a Iram. Osi dam kakaita kakaita on mafam mabis mabis on tafanamai nan simair sima, ato osi dam unis wabis on mafam siwabis. On min Esau Edom yangan wawas agiris.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Jacob nana Canaan tafanamai ima, menan taman imama nan,
ato atonio on Jacob an dam warar asi dudur. Joseph on jorei boboun an kwanda auyotoat an yayatan nimtereban ruam on taitain tutuan mat sheep a goat si kakaifares. Osi fifirig min taman awawan ufuigeg ruam, Bilhah a Zilpah nanatus. Ato taitain tutuan aifan bobo komasis sibi yamen on i nat tamas ikakasonai.
Jacob wabin tani min Israel, on Joseph inuaboai kwakwan bag men nanatun fani ba, yabin on iorokwar bag weie Joseph irat. On Joseph an bai takwakwaren obin weromin a imas mat weromis iyamai wein.
On an werai taitain tutuan sit on osi tamas on Joseph inuaboai kwakwan men osi ba, on mes tais tuas sisusuneai kwakwan ato men moa obinai aurin sibi kakafun.
Fom tani Joseph ibomomout ato taitain tutuan on bomomout ikakasones on, osi aumiet bag sisusuneai.
Joseph on iyawures iyau, “Eii! Omi au bomomout anau wontatam.
Ot engon masauai sawareg tagegedauen ato ra kaita yau au kafurir on imisir totor itawar. Ato omi ami kafurir on yau au kafurir siki bubuai ato aurin usos situr sisur.”
Baise Joseph taitain tutuan on dura sitatam ato siyawur siyau, “Om enonosin om aiwab orot unmatar ato wei auri uni bad i?” On mes osi nana aumiet bag sibi susuneai yabin on an bomomout a an dura aifan osi auris ibi kakafun on fasinai.
Namon Joseph bomomout tani ba it ato taitain tutuan ikasones iyau, “Yau bomomout tani ba ait, on nan ait on wera, roke a siribod auyotoat an yayatan kaitamom on yau auriu usos situtur.”
Joseph an bomomout mat on taman iyawur, ato taman imisir igam iyawur iyau, “On bomomout on aifan? Om enonosin on ayom, taitaim tutuam a yau on wannat om aurim usoi wantur i?”
Joseph taitain tutuan on sibi boboarai baise taman on bomomout aurin on nana ibi nonotai.
Ra kaitamom Joseph taitain tutuan sinai Shechem nan tamas an bobaitu sit kaifares mes.
Jacob on Joseph iyawur iyau, “Yau agogoi unan au Shechem, menan taitaim tutuam bobaitu sekakaifares nan.” Joseph iyafotai iyau, “Basit tamau, yau anan.”
Jacob on natun iyawur iyau, “Om enai unites, taitaim tutuam a bobaitu mat engon basit wat ai ambin, ato un matabir un kasoneu.” On mes on taman Hebron roubaban emon iyafarai inai Shechem igat,
ato on efanai taitain tutuan inunuenis, ato orot tani Joseph aurin igat ato itetemai iyau, “Om abifan enunuen?”
On iyafotai iyau, “Yau taitaiu tutuau anunuenis, osi nin asi bobaitu si kakaifares, fofonin ut kasoneu osi on menan?”
Orot iyawur iyau, “Osi sinai nono, atatamis siyau on au Dothan senan.” On mes Joseph taitain tutuan gibusi inai Dothan nan igatures.
Joseph taitain tutuan on nanenei nan sit i nat, ato weie on auris it nat iti ufin, osi siyanu sitasubun mes.
Osi tous sanasi siyau bonen, “Woit! Bomomout otin atonio e nat.
Omi ne wonat, ari weie tanasubun ato dogu sareu simamutinis sen on tani amonai tan ribirirai insur; namon ot tanau on rega an bobaitu tutuenis siyan. Ato tanitai on an bomomout emon arimon aifan in matar.”
Reuben on taitain asi dura itatamis ato ifourtobon Joseph iti yawasai mes. On iyau, “Ot men tanasubun mes.
Ot asir efan koiteterinai atonio dogu sareu rar raninai tan ribirirai insur ato men usi baban tanitai.” On dura nanaba iyawures yabin on inonot taitain tutuan emon on iti yawasai ato iti yafarai men it matabir taman aurin.
On an werai Joseph inat taitain tutuan auris igat mom, osi an bai takwakwaren weromin imas weromis mat on sisafef si boseir.
Namon osi Joseph sibo ato dogu sareu rar ranin amonai siribirirai isur.
Namon osi simair bayu sitam mes ato matas si yeit on Ishmael yangan Gilead emon si nan au Egypt on sites. Osi asi camel tefasi on asi fio yandes ninibis asi baiyas gagamis ta ta on siyagagaien siboen si nat.
Judah taitain tutuan auris iyau, “Ot tait tanasubun tani buniai weie on amon emon min arimon aifan wat tan boai?”
Ot on Ishmael yangan auris tan tobonai. On nanaba tani yamai on men arimon fifi usin taniruyein on. Yabin fifi on ot tait tuat a ot ati tara biot turin.” On taitain tutuan engon si basit.
On an werai Midian bai totobonotis sinat sigat, Joseph taitain tutuan on Joseph dogu emon siti bogai igai, ato Ishmael yangan auris agim silver orot kaitamomai sitobonai ato sibo sinai au Egypt.
On gibunai Reuben imatabir men inat dogu sareuai ato it on Joseph nan ambin ato on iyababan kwakwan an beber isafef.
On taitain auris imatabir inai ato iyau, “Fifi on nan ambin! Yau arimon abifan ani yamai?”
Namon osi goat tani siyasubun ato Joseph an bai takwakwaren sibo tara ai sitamumun.
Osi an bai takwakwaren sibo simatabir men sinat tamas aurin ato siyawur siyau, “Wei atonio bai takwakwaren on nan i yen wagaturai. Om eit tait, atonio bai takwakwaren min om natum noan i?”
Jacob on natun an bai takwakwaren it tiwag isagob ato iyau, “Dura bag! Nin on yau natu Joseph an bai takwakwaren. Rega an kuke tutuenis fani siyasubun. Yau natu Joseph on sisafefai gugud imatar ato siyan.”
Jacob iyabbaban ato beber gadur iyoten ato natun aurin ra weromin itou iroro.
On nanatun fifirig jeverig sinat sit kubainunubai mes, baise on men igogoi sit kubainunubai ato iyau, “Yau nana natu an roro auman an mama anarab. On mes on natun Joseph aurin on nana itou roro auman ima.
On werai Egypt nan on eb Midian yangan Joseph Potiphar aurin sitobonai. Potiphar min Egypt aiwab orot an goa kaifarotin gagamin a on toum min kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot gagamin.
Wera fani sisawar gibunai Judah taitain tutuan ikirires ato inai orot wabin Hirah on rus sitama mes, on min Adullam mafam emon.
On nan Judah on Canaan orot wabin Shua natun jeverei igaturai. On iawan ato rus siyen;
on jeverei inafot ato natun orot ituai wabin iyor Er.
Gibui on inafot men ato natun orot ituai wabin iyor Onan.
On min on fifi orot tani ba ituai wabin iyor Shelah. Ato Judah min Achzib nan imama nan fifi orot irat.
Judah on natun ainau orot wabin Er on awan irubin. On jeverei min wabin Tamar.
Baise Judah natun ainau orot Er on bobo komasis BADA matanai ifofour; on mes BADA on Er iyasubun irabob.
Namon Judah on Er tain orot Onan iyawur iyau, “Om enai tuam rabobin an kena rum wonen. Ot ati baifafaro iyau nanaba on tuam nanatun ambin inarab inan on tain giya orot on jever iniawan ato fifirig sinarat on tuan orot rabobin nanatun mes.”
Baise Onan isagob fifirig sin rarat on men arimon on nanatun on. On fasinai on tuan kena rus si yen on, an sareu motobai idedebur isusur onai on men fifi tani itarat tuan orot aurin on.
Onan bobo aifan ibi yamai on komasin BADA matanai, on mes BADA on Onan mat iyasubun irabob.
Namon Judah rawan jever Tamar iyawur iyau, “Om un matabir men unan tamam an goai nana kena un mama ato yau natu orot Shelah inarat gagamin in matar.” On nanaba iyau yabin on iber, ari Shelah ba inarab ato tutuan sirarabob ba. On mes Tamar imatabir men inai taman an goai imama.
Kwanda fani sisawar gibunai Judah awan, Shua natun jeverei on irabob. Judah on an roro wera isawar gibunai, on turan Hirah on min Adullam emon on rus sinai efan Timnah nan sabu on an sheep bubunis siyayaragen on itites mes.
Sabu fani Tamar siyawur on rawan orot Judah on enan au efan Timnah nan an sheep bubunis in yaragen mes.
Tamar on isagob nono Judah natun giyamomos Shelah on irat orot imatar ato men sitai iawan on. On mes on kena an bai takwakwaren usinai si yen on iboseseren ato beber ibo magin ikukum toun ibuniai. Ato on inai Enaim mafam an eta awanai nan imair imama. On eta kaitamom min on inai Timnah mafamai igat.
On an rai Judah ibib inat it on men isagob on yabin on magin ikukum on mes. On inos on eta eta an jever.
On aurin Judah irabon inai eta rebanai ato iyau, “Yau agogoi rut tanen.” Judah on men isagob on rawan jever. Tamar iyau, “Om rut tanen aurin on aifan wat arimon uniteu?”
On iyafotai iyau, “Yau au goat boboun etatar on aurim ani yafar.” Ato jever iyau, “Basit wat, ato om sawar tani uniteu on aumatan ba bisiwui an kakaifarai weie gibui goat uni yafar.”
Judah itetemai iyau, “Ato aifan egogoi anitem on aumatan ba bisimui i nen?” Jever iyafotai iyau, “Om anjomui damud er wabim auman on a am tutuk on un iteu.” On mes Judah sawar iboen jever itai. Namon on rus siyen ato jever inafot.
Tamar inai au go, on magin beber iboseir ato an kena bai takwakwaren on iyoten men.
On gibunai Judah on turan Hirah iyafarai goat boboun ibo inai jever ititai ato an garamin aumatan sawar ato bisinai si yen on itabo mes. Baise on jever men igaturai on.
Hirah on Enaim an orot fani nan on itetemis iyau, “Eta eta an jever nin eta rewanai imama on menan?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “Nin men eta eta an jever tani emama on.”
On mes Hirah imatabir men inai Judah aurin ato iyau, “Yau eta eta an jever men agaturai on. Ato orot on mafam emon on eb siyau, ‘Nin men eta eta an jever tani emama on.’”
Namon Judah iyau, “Na eikirir, sawar aifan bisinai sen on bagun on ini noanai. Ot men tagogoi sabu sini koboit sin sererit. Yau afourtobon ati baiyanai, baise om jever men ugaturai on.”
Roke ton isawar gibunai, sabu fani on Judah siyawur siyau, “Om rawam jever Tamar on eta eta an jever ba fetag fetag orot mat si yen simimisir ato ari on inafot.” Judah dura wawaninai iyau, “Omi wobo wogat ato wairafai woter inaras inarab.”
Osi Tamar sibo si gat ato dura iyafar rawan orot aurin iyau, “Yau on orot iyafan atonio osi sawar ebi noanai on emon on ai nafot. Omi woi nateteyen tait, iyafan an sawar, damud wab auman a tutuk.”
Judah sawar iten isagob ato iyau, “On on bobo obin iyamai, yabin yau dura aifan au on men aiyamai, natu orot Shelah men aitai iawan, ato Judah men gibui rus siyen.
On an wera inat Tamar i tatoub mes on osi sigaturai on arimon fifirig orot sisiru sinarat.
On koun igigiyai usi baban gagamin i boai an werai on fifi tani iman ainau iyotet igat ato bai totoubis an jever on fifi iman ibo uram mururinai iyous ato iyau, “Atonio on ainau irat.”
Baise on iman itein irui men ato tain giya orot on i nau irat, on mes bai totoubis an jever iyau, “Om ato nanaba toum am eta uwawar ugat!” ato on iwabai Perez.
Gibui on tuan imanai uram mururin auman irat ato i wabai Zerah.
Ishmael yangan Joseph sibo sisur sinai Egypt nan ato Potiphar itobon inat an bobo orot mes imatar. Potiphar min Egypt aiwab orot an goa amonai an bobo an orot gagamin a on toun min aiwab orot an goa kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot.
BADA on Joseph bisinai imama on mes iyamai an bobo on engon obis totoris wat ifofour. On an bada Egypt orot an goai imama,
ato Potiphar it isagob BADA on Joseph bisinai imama on mes an bobo aifan ibi yamen on engon tutufin obis wat.
Potiphar on Joseph aurin iyasisir kwakwan bag, on mes iyamai inat an bobo orot mes imatar. On Joseph baibad itai bobo orot engon Potiphar an goa amonai sibobo on asi orot gagamin imatar a an sawar engon on Joseph imanai iyagai.
On an werai nan Joseph fasinai on BADA Egypt orot an goa amonai sawar engon tutufin on ibi noanai a an masau mat engon imomoginen.
On mes Potiphar on Joseph itutumai ato an sawar engon on ibi noanai on iyabonai Joseph an baibad babanai on ikakaifaren ato on men aifain tani ibi nonotai on. Baise on toun on bayu mamaba inam inatom an eta wat on ikakaifarai. Joseph an itin on obin a ann iman irou irat.
Ato wera men weromin gibunai, on an bada awan jever ibosuruf Joseph i gogoi ai ato iyawur rus siten mes.
Baise Joseph men igogoi ato an bada awan jever iyawur iyau, “Etei. Om un sagob on yau au bada orot itutumeu go amonai sawar engon tutufin yau au baibad babanai iyein akakaifaren, on mes goa amon an bobo on men tani ebi nonotai on, yabin yau on nin.
Yau au baibad atonio goa amonai on, on rui fofon, mat on men aifan sofafar tani auriu iyein on. Ab bobo kaitamom wat men ibiteu on om, yabin om on au bada orot awan. Yau men fofonin on bobo komasin nanaba ani yamai ato God matanai arimon an bokomas.
Jever on ra fufur Joseph irurutobonai, baise on men i gogoi rus siten.
Baise ra kaitamom Joseph irui goa amonai an bobo itabo mes. On werai nan bobo orot on men iyafan tani on bobo efanai.
Potiphar awan on Joseph an beberai ibo ato iyau, “Om enat rut tanen.” Baise Joseph on jever iman iyaskou ato goa emon iyayai igat ato jever on Joseph an beber wat on ibotan.
On an werai jever it on Joseph an beber on imanai ikirir ato goa emon iyayai igat,
jever on an goa bobo orot auris iyor ato iyawures iyau, “Omi atonio beber woit! Yau awau on atonio Hebrew orot ibo inat ot ati goai on mamai gagamin itet. On yau auriu irui ato igogoi rui waten mes, baise yau aumiet bag ai yoku.
Ato on an werai itatam yau aumiet bag ai yoku, on mes on an beber yau bisiwui ikirir ato iyayai igat.”
Jever on Joseph an beber iyein i yen ato awan orot inat au go.
Namon on dudur kaitamom min awan aurin idudur iyau, “Atonio Hebrew agir orot om ubo u nat on auriu irui ato bobo komasin iti yamai iti mamaiiu mes.
Baise on an werai yau aumiet bag ai yoku on mes, on an beber bisiwui ikirir ato iyayai igat.”
On an werai Joseph an bada orot on awan jever an dudur itatam aifan Joseph ibi yamai on i yatatab kwakwan.
Ato on an orot iyafares Joseph sifatumai ato fafatum goai siwan, menan aiwab orot an fafatum sabu simama nan. Ato Joseph min on nan ima.
Baise BADA on Joseph bisinai imama a ibi momoginai on mes fafatum goa an bai netewar orot Joseph itai on nunuan iboai.
On mes fafatum goa an bai netewar orot on Joseph irubinai ato baibad itai fafatum yangan fani a bobo engon ato fafatum goa amonai on i kakaifaren.
Fafatum goa an bai netewar orot on bobo aifan Joseph ibi tai on men ibi nonotai on, yabin BADA on Joseph bisinai imama ato iyamai bobo aifan engon ibi yamen on obis wat.
Wera fani sisawar gibunai, Egypt an aiwab orot an sareu wine kaifarotin a rafi teren an orot gagamin rus on asi aiwab orot aurin bobo komasin tani siyamai.
Aiwab orot on ato osi babad ruam auris iyatatab,
ato ifatumes fafatum goai iwanis menan Joseph imama nan. On min kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot an goa.
Osi wera weromin fafatum goai sima ato kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot on Joseph irubinai osi asi bobo orot mes imatar.
Fom tani fafatum goai nan sareu wine kaifarotin a rafi teren orot gagamin rus sibomomout ato asi bomomout asi yabis on ta ta.
Ra itom fomenei Joseph inat auris ato asi itis iten on men sibi yasisir on.
On mes on itetemis iyau, “Omi aibo mes wobi yababan?”
Osi siyafotai siyau, “Wei rui fom wa bomomout, baise men iyafan tani nin arimon wai bomomout asi yabis inau bubunag tiwag wantatam on. Namon Joseph iyawures iyau, “God Toun on sagob ebites ato bomomout yabis sau bubunag, omi ami bomomout wo kasoneu an tatam.”
On mes sareu wine kaifarotin iyau, “Yau au bomomout ait on wengar wine on yau nawui i yen.
Ato on wengar wine on fafamen ton. On famen emon isisig igat roroun iyein ato sasasan wat uwan an beran iyein ato uwas sibosuruf simumurur.
Yau on aiwab orot an viga a botan. Yau uwan aboen abi rowen ato kerin on an vigai isur namon aiwab orot aitai.”
Namon Joseph iyau bunagai iyau, “Fafamen ton an yabin on ra ton.
Ra ton amonai aiwab orot arimon fafatum goa emon in boseirim ungat ato ainau am bobo ubobo nan in yeinim men. Om arimon ainau ufofour ba, an sareu wine kaifarotin un matar on bobo unabo.
Baise on an rai om am eta engon obin wat inan on karun, abi fefeyanim, yau men uni nosfoteu mes a am moa obin auriu uni yamai. Om aiwab orot aurin ei dudur ato ei baisiu atonio fafatum goa emon on an gat.
Yau on Hebrew tafanam emon si bainauiu mom siboeu anat nin, ato nin Egypt amonai on eb yau men bobo aifan tani ai komasai on fafatum goai siwaniu amama.”
On an rai rafi teren an orot gagamin dura itatam on sareu wine kaifarotin an bomomout on obin bag on mes on ba Joseph iyawur iyau, “Yau mat abomomout, yau on rafi kaifet engon ton on uniwui am teren.
Kaifet tefanai bag on rafi teteran ta ta; on min rafi banag, afair a sarar aiwab orot aurin, baise kiwiu on, on kaifet amonai rafi si yam.”
Joseph iyafotai iyau, “On an yabin on atonio, kaifet ton on ra ton.
Ra ton amonai aiwab orot arimon fafatum goa emon in boseirim ungat ato anjom inasutin weie wengarai in sikonim ato kiwiu biom sinan.”
Ra baitoninai, on min aiwab orot an rat ra on forag gagamin an babadis engon auris ibotitiwag. On sareu wine kaifarotin a rafi teren an orot gagamin rus fafatum goa emon iboseiris sigat an babadis nasi sitawar.
Aiwab orot on sareu wine kaifarotin an bobo ainau ibobo on itai men,
baise aiwab orot on an bobo orot iyawures rafi teren an orot gagamin on sibo wengarai sisikonai. Joseph dura aifan i yau on bobo nanaba imatar.
Baise sareu wine kaifarotin on men meyan Joseph inonotai, on asir inosfotai mom.
Kwanda ruam inai isawar gibunai, Egypt an aiwab orot ibomomout on Nile sareu rewanai itatawar.
Ato cow engon nimtereban ruam usis obis kadidis on sareu emon sigai sinai tefai ato sibosuruf wayo si yam.
Namon cow engon nimtereban ruam ba sigai; osi on usis teinis rarikis. Osi sinat ato cow ato sareu rewanai wayo si yam on bisisi sitawar.
Ato cow usis teinis rarikis on simisir cow usis obis kadidis on siyam isawar. Namon aiwab orot on bomomout i tai on iror imisir.
On iyeinir men iyen bubur ato bomomout tani ba it. On ibomomout on sawareg ann kaitamomai yabis engon nimtereban ruam siya gagamis tutufis obis ato simari.
Namon sawareg nimtereban ruam ba sisisigis sigat. Osi sawareg on men obis a gagaf rabis yabin kwanda an yabat forabin irabis on mes.
Namon sawareg gagaf rabis on simisir ato sawareg gagamis tutufis obis on sitonanis. Aiwab orot en bubur emon imisir weie, isagob on i bomomout.
On mes aiwab orot fomenei imisir ato magin an itin on men yasisir. Ato on dura iyafar Eygpt amonai orot gigiboanotis, kwakwairotis a baromotis engon siruayo ato an bomomout ikasones, baise men iyafan tani iyau bunag aurin.
Namon sareu wine kaifarotin on aiwab orot iyawur iyau, “Yau ari aurim ani rufan, yau on bobo komasin aiyamai.
Ra kaitamom om yau a rafi teren an orot gagamin rui auri uyatatab ufatumei ato fafatum goa an bai netewar orot an goai nan ureberuei.
Fom kaitamom rafi teren an orot gagamin rui wa bomomout ato wai bomomout asi yabis on ta ta.
Hebrew jorei boboun on mat nan wamama, on min fafatum kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot an bobo orot. Wei wai bomomout wa kasonai ato asi yabis on mabi mabi iyau bunagen weinei mamaba wa bomomout on fofonisi.
On dura aifan iyau bubunagei on bobo engon nanaba simatar. Yau au bobo an efanai uyeiniu men, baise om rafi teren an orot gagamin on wengarai usikon.”
Namon aiwab orot on sasasan wat an bobo orot iyafares sinai Joseph aurin ato fafatum goa emon on sibo sigat. On sareu iyeib, iyaragai ato sawar obis iyoten weie inat aiwab orot nanai itawar.
Aiwab orot on Joseph iyawur iyau, “Yau abomomout ato men iyafan tani arimon itau bunag on. Baise yau sikasoneu on om fofonin bomomout asi yabis unau bubunagen.”
Joseph iyafotai iyau, “Aiwab gagamim, yau on men fofoniu, baise God on arimon inau bubunagim tiwag ato ini yasisirem.”
Aiwab orot iyau, “Yau abomomout on yau Nile sareu rewanai atatawar.
