Sawar aifan sitoun sisabutan yen on arimon au rereb ingat, a bobo buburis engon on arimon sinsagob.
On mes om dura aifan nan woumanai ukakafun on, arimon ra aiyet basun nan sintatam, ato om dura mamaba kafakakai wat am goa metewan urufot amonai nan udurusof mom on arimon goa uwayobai nan siniyoku sinikakafun.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Yau tuturau awurem, omi men wonaber ato osi sabu auris ato usim wat sinasubun aurin on, baise osi gibui on men arimon aifan bobo komasin tani siniyamai on.
Yau aniyoboem Orot Iyafan on wonberuai: God wonberuai, On arimon inasubunuem a On an baibad yen inboem wairaf an efan komasinai inyeinim. Dura bag, omi On Orot ekesin mom wonberuai!
“Sabu on kiwiu gugudis engon nim nanaba on agim gugudis ruam wat on nan setotobon. Ato God osi auris on men arimon tani ininosfotai on.
Mat God on tefam iyab isagob biyam nanaba on unimui sen. On mes om men unaber mes; om on gagamim bag men ato kiwiu gugudis ba on!”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Yau awurem dura bag iyai iyafan wasai nan auriu dura ekurereb on Yau ebinoaniu, on eta kaitamomai Orot Natun arimon God an anea matasi nan bobo nanaba aurin inafour.
Baise iyai iyafan wasai nan dura ekurereb on Yau men egogoiiu, on Orot Natun mat arimon God an anea matasi nan nanaba inisisiweiai.
“Iyai iyafan Orot Natun aurin dura komasis inbikakafun on God arimon innotburai, baise iyai iyafan dura komasis Ayu Kakafotin aurin inbikakafun on God arimon men innotburai.
“Omi sabu sinboem wonar bayoi goa amonai, o gawan nasi o sabu bainetewarotis nasi wontatawar on, omi men woniyababan mamaba toum wonrufafarem aurin on o dura wonbikakafun aurin on.
Yabin on an werai on Ayu Kakafotin arimon inibebeyim dura mamaba wonikakafun.”
Orot tani sabu kuayo sanasi imisir Iesu aurin iyau, “Baibebeotim, tuau orot yawur ato tamai an sawar ikiriren weinei on rui wanraram.”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Orot iyafan on Yau baibad iteu omi anigurubabanim o omi rum ami sawar an raram weinem i?”
Namon Iesu on an dura ibotein sabu engon tutufin auris iyau, “Omi matam woneit a wonkaifarem tiwag, tafanam an sawar magis magis auris; yabin orot an yawas bag on men ato sawar aifan ebinoanai ba on, basit on sawarotin min on.”
Namon Iesu atonio dura kawen on auris idudur: “Ra tani orot sawarotin an motobai on fesi obis wat ibofefes ato bayu min yabis gagamis simatar.
On ibosuruf toun ibinonotai, ‘Yau au goa efan on ambin menan nan au bayu engon nan antubabaren. Yau mamaba anafour?’
Orot ibosuruf toun ibinonotai i’yau, ‘Yau bobo atonio nanaba anafour; yau au bayu goa on angoros insur ato gagamin bag anyon, on nan au sawareg a bayu fani antubabaren sinen.
Namon yau tou auriu anau, yau on asowar nono! Yau au gogoi bayu on obis a fofonis wat ato atubabaren sinen kwanda kwanda. Yawas sasasan agaturai bayu anam anatom, a tou aniyasisireu!’
Baise God aurin iyau, ‘Om ojim! Ari fom on unarab; ato sawar ato ekakaifaren on iyafan inabo i?’”
Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau, “Atonio bobo on arimon nanaba inmatar ato osi sabu iyabon sawarotis tous asi sawar sebisosoi mom on, baise God matanai on om men sawarotim on.”
Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau, “On mes awurem au, omi men bayu auris woniyababan ato wonam yawasim wonama aurin on a mat men ara beber auris woniyababan ato usim baitakwakwaren aurin on.
Yawas on gagamin bag men bayu ba, a usim on gagamin bag men ara beber ba.
Omi kiwiu ato woites: Osi on men fesi sebofefes a osi on men bayu sekukuwain on; osi on men goa siyonen nan bayu setubabaren on; osi on God bayu ebitues! Omi orot jever on gagamim bag men ato kiwiu ba!
Omi men iyafan tani nanaba inama an wera tutufinai ato sawar auris inbiyababan on.
Omi bobo gugudis bag on men fofonin woniyamen on, aibo mes wobiyababan bobo gagamis auris i?
Omi beran ato segeg on woniten: Osi men bobo sebobo a osi men tous auris ara beber sebiyamen on. Baise anawurem, aiwab orot Solomon an baiaiwab a an ara beber on men tani iyobin bag atonio beran ba.
God on ara beber wayo ebiyotes—wayo on ari wat inen ato raso on sinikomasai wairafai inaras. On mes wonsagob God on omi ami ara beber on gagaminai bag iniyotem. Omi ami baitutum on men inikafakakai mes!
“On mes omi men ra fufur wonnos kwakwan ato bayu aifan wonam a wontoman aurin on.
(Sabu bokomasotis nin tafanamai on ra fufur atonio osi bobo auris on sebinonotis kwakwan.) Ato osi sawar auris wogogoi on omi Tamam min isagob.
Baise omi bobo aifan wonbiyamai on God an Baiaiwab aurin wat on wonnuen, namon sawar fani auris wogogoi min arimon initem.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi foro sheep ruamom on men wonaber mes, omi Tamam on inonot nono arimon Baiaiwab initem.
Omi ami sawar sen on engon wonitotobon ato agim wonboai sabu kokoianis wonites. Omi agim asi kukufet on wonabo ato on agim kukufet on arimon wantoan inen, omi ami baiaiwab safamai aurin on wonbotitiwag, on baiaiwab arimon men meyan insawar, yabin orot bainauotin on men fofonin arimon safamai inbainauim on a men arimon nonot sinikomasen on.
Omi ami bainonot on ra fufur nan ami obin safamai wonbiaiwab aurin wat on wonyein.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi wonbotitiwagim bobo aifan inmamatar aurin on, omi ami ara beber on wonboai nan wongigin tiwag a ami ramef wonitutu auman wonbotitiwagim bobo aurin,
omi woniyamai ato sabu agirotis ba asi bada semomousin on tabin an bobaitab emon inmatabir men. On innat metewan inrugegedan on, osi ra kaita metewan sinruseren wain inar.
Yasisir gagamin bag ato osi agirotis auris, on an ra asi bada inmamatabir men ingagatures on, osi on sibotitiwagis isawar matas siyeit semama! Yau awurem dura bag, on arimon kaid inboai nenen ingigin ato inawures kemai sinamair ato on toun asi bayu inbotitiwagen weines.
Yasisir gagamin bag osi agirotis auris, asi bada fom nub basun innat o wera gibui weie innat, ato On innat on ingatures osi sibotitiwag nono semama!
Atonio wonsagob, ato orot goa matuanin wera itsagob meyan orot bainauotin enat on arimon men itikirir itar an goa itaseb on.
Ato omi mat on wonbotitiwagim yabin omi wera on men wosagob a omi men wonbinonotim an werai on Orot Natun innat.”
Peter iyau, “Bada, atonio dura kawen on wei auri ebikakafun o sabu engon auris mat ebikakafun i?”
Bada iyafotai iyau, “Iyafan agirotin on baitutumin a gigiboanotin? On orot on an bada baibad initai goa inkaifarai a agirotis fani asi bayu on wera fofoninai bag nan inbibites.
Yasisir gagamin bag on agirotin aurin, ato an bada innat au go ingaturai on an bobo inbobo on!
Yau awurem dura bag, on an bada on arimon baibad engon agirotin initai on bobo engon tutufin inkaifaren wain.
Baise on agirotin on toun aurin inau, yau au bada on wera weromin maiau nan emama ato on men arimon gariwat innat on. On mes on inbosuruf agirotis fani jever orot inarou a on bayu inam a sareu wawanis inatom kwakwan inbikokok,
namon ra tani an bada inmatabir men ato on agirotin on men on inbinonotai a on an wera mat on men insagob. On an bada innat on agirotin baimaki komasin bag initai, ato on inboai an efan on sabu fonaseirotis mat nan inyeinis.
“Agirotin isagob on an bada an gogoi bobo abifan on iniyamai, baise on toun men ebotitiwagai ato an bada an gogoi men ebobo on arimon an baimaki on wawaninai bag urouwawanai nan sinaswabirai;
baise agirotin on men isagob on an bada an gogoi aifan on bobo inabo, ab on toun an gogoi bobo fani on ebobo, ato asir urouwawanai saswabirai mom on, on arimon an baimaki on sasasanai urouwawanai sinaswabirai. Orot iyafan sawar fofoninai sibitai on an garamin on nanaba an fofoninai inites men; ato orot iyafan imanai sawar sigaraba sibitai on, osi sinifefeyan on angaramin nanaba sawar sigaraba bag inites men.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Yau anat wairaf tafanamai an yein inaras mes, Yau anonosin au gogoi on wairaf on i’taras nono!
Yau on bapataito magin tani baikokosar an bapataito on anboai, Yau nunuau on yababan ibonueu ato agogoi yababan on anisawarai!
Omi wononosin Yau anat tafanamai tuf an yein mes i? Ambin, Yau men tuf anyein on, baise awurem, Yau anat tafanam an kuseseb mes.
Ari ra on arimon goa amonai taitais tutuas engon nim nanaba sinkuseseb tais tuas ton on mabisi ato osi siniragit tais tuas ruam auris, a tais tuas ruam on eb tais tuas ton auris siniragit.
Fifirig tatamas on arimon nanatus auris siniragites ato fifirig on eb arimon tatamas auris siniragites; jeverig ayos on arimon nanatus jeverig auris siniragites ato jeverig on eb arimon a’yos auris siniragites; jever arimon rarawas jeverig auris siniragites; ato urataman jeverig on eb arimon rarawas jever auris siniragites.”
Mat Iesu on sabu auris iyau, “Omi wontage kasakasau gugugurin wonitai wera sifun emon innanat on ra kaita wonau, usan arimon inayar—ato usan min eyayar.
Ato yabat rega emon esisin ato naniam wat wontatam wonsagob ato wonau tafanam arimon inforab—ato efoforab.
Omi on baisigogo’otim! Omi on kasakasau a tafanam woniten on wonsagob ra mamaba ekokomas o obin yen, ato omi aibo mes ari ra ato bobo semamatar on men wosagob?”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi aibo mes toum on men woninonotim tiwag ato bobo obis wat wonafour?
Orot tani iboem egeg baigurubaban orot nanai nan dura wonikakafun mes on, om unafourtobon rum ami komasis on eta nenenai nan wonitotorai onai om men inboem wonag baigurubaban orot nanai wontawar, ato on bobo men nanaba unfofour on, orot inboem wonag baigurubaban orot nanai wontawar ato on inboem tafanam an baifafaro kaifarotis imasi inyagai ato osi sinboem fafatum goai sinreberuem.
Yau awurem, om arimon nan unama ato om fafatum goa emon boseirim gat mes unfofour on am agim baiyan engon tutufin unyein weie ungat.”
On an werai sabu fani nan on Iesu sikasonai, mamaba Galilee sabu fani auris bobo imamatar on. Galilee sabu fani on God sikwakwafirai asi bobaitu on sirifu mes sikuteten ato Pilate an sabu iyawures siyasububunues. Osi sabu asi tara on bobaitu asi tara mat sikaita.
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Yabin omi wononosin sabu atonio nanaba siyasububunues on omi wobidura bag osi on bokomasotis bag men Galilee sabu engon tutufin ba?
Ambin bag! Yau awurem, ‘Omi men ya baikitabir wonboai on, arimon osi sabu sirarabob ba engon wonarab.’
Ato sabu auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baitonin nanaba Siloam nan goa ann weromin on osi tefasi ifeu iyasububunues on mamaba i? Omi wononosin woi dura bag osi sabu bokomasotis bag men ato sabu fani engon nan Jerusalem semama ba i?
Ambin bag! Ato Yau awurem omi men ya baikitabir wonboai on, omi arimon osi sirarabob ba engon wonarab.”
Namon Iesu on atonio dura kawenai auris idudur: “Ra tani orot an wine masau amonai nan bubudau wengar igai itatawar. On ra ra nanaba ifofour ibibib i’nan an masauai bubudau wengar uwas ibinateteyen baise bubudau uwan on men tani i’gaturai on.
On mes on imisir an masau bo’otin aurin iyau, ‘Eite, kwanda ton nanaba on yau ra ra a’nat bubudau uwas mes abinateteyen, baise men uwan tani agaturai mes. Etar efeu! Aibo mes on wengar uwan on men tani eyeyeinin ato fetag au motobai etatawar?’
Baise orot masau bo’otin on iyafotai iyau, ‘Bada, wengar asi eikirir mom, ato kwanda kaitamom ba tanimateteai; yau arimon wengar ann totoun anabar a anbotitiwagai anitai.
Namon kwanda tani inboai nan uwan inou on, basit iyobin bag; ato ambin on, wengar untarai inafeu.’”
Sabat ra taniai nan Iesu bayoi goa amonai sabu ibibebeyes.
On Jever tani nan on tefanai ayu komasin imama ato on ibiyamai isasawau on kwanda auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baitonin nanaba isawar; on jever on koun ikwatut ato men fofonin koun ititotorai men.
Iesu on jever it mom ato aurin iyor iyau, “Jever om am sawau on ari arufanim!”
On iman jever usinai iyagai, ato ra kaita on jever koun itotorai, ato on imisir God ifain ibogagaiai.
Iesu Sabat an ra nan jever ibiyawasai aurin on bayoi goa an bainetewarotin on yan itatab, ato imisir sabu auris ikakafun iyau, “Wera nimtereban kaita on bobo tanabo; on mes osi wera amosi on nan wonnat sabu woniyawasis, baise men Sabat an ra mes!”
Bada on iyafotai ikakafun iyau, “Omi baisigogo’otim! Omi engon ami foro ox o donkey asi goa emon uram worurufanen ato ra fufur woboes wonan sareu setotoman—ato Sabat an ra min bobo nanaba wofofour.
Atonio jever on Abraham wawan agirin, on Afaguban ifatumai imama on kwanda auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baitonin isawar, ato Sabat an ra abiyawasai on men bobo komasin tani mes.”
Iesu atonio dura ibiyafot on, sabu iyabon On siragitai dura sibikakafun on tous wat mamai iboes, ato sabu fani nan On bobo obis engon ifouren simamatar auris on siyasisir.
Iesu itetem iyau, “God an Baiaiwab on mamaba? Abifan sawarai nan anifofon?
Ato nanaba. Orot aigab fesi eboai ato an masauai etatanum. Ato on foun on ekukubou egeg ato wengar emamatar, kiwiu senat on wengar fafamenai asi batar seyoyonen.”
Iesu itetem men iyau, “God an Baiaiwab aurin on abifan sawarai anifofon?
Ato nanaba. Jever fio yist on eboai rafi auman egagamatabir, ato rafi ekakadid egeg ebitutufin.”
Iesu on etai ibib igeg au Jerusalem, ato eta nenenai nan mafam gagamis a mafam gugudis amosi on sabu ibibebeyes.
Orot tani nan Iesu itetemai iyau, “Bada, sabu arimon ruamom wat on yawas sinboai?” Iesu iyafotes iyau,
“Omi wonafourtobon metewan awan viririnai wonar wonan; yabin sabu sigaraba on dura bag sinafourtobon sinar, baise arimon men fofonin on.
Wera innat on, goa an bada arimon inmisir metewan inrufot. Namon omi goa kounai wontawar, wonbosuruf metewan wonrugegedan wonau, ‘Bada, metewan eruseren weineu,’ ato On arimon iniyafotem inau, ‘Yau men asagobim on, omi men emon wonat!’
Namon omi arimon woniyafotai wonau, ‘wei on om mat bayu tam tatom; om on wei ai mafam gagaminai nan ubibebeyei!’
Baise On inawurem men inau, ‘Yau men asagobim omi men emon wonat. Omi woikirireu wonai, omi sabu komasim bag!’
Omi arimon Abraham, Isaac, Jacob a aubairuruotis engon on nan God an Baiaiwabai sinmama wonites. Baise omi on sinrebenim au koun wongat namon omi nan wonatou wam wonitafoforen!
Sabu sigaraba arimon tafanam au engon tutufin sinnat ato nan God an Baiaiwab amonai sinar kemai sinamair bayu sinam.
Namon sabu iyabon ari asi efan babanai semama on sinag efan aiyetunai sinama, ato sabu iyabon ari asi efan aiyetunai semama on sinsur efan babanai sinama.”
On wera kaitamomai Pharisee yangan fani sinat Iesu aurin ato siyau, “Om on ari bag atonio efan unikirir ungat unan tafanam taniai, yabin Herod egogoi inasubunuem.”
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Omi wonan on orot kuke fox komasin wonawur: ‘Ari a raso on au bobo abobo dau sabu tefasi semama on afafaitanis segat, ato wera baitoninai on au bobo anisawarai.’
Baise Yau on ari, raso a ra baitoninai on etai anabib. Men kafakakai obin mes ato aubairuruotis on men tafanam faniai nan sasbubunues on, baise Jerusalem amonai wat.
“Jerusalem, Jerusalem, om aubairuruotis uyasububunues, God an dura bobibotis om aurim sibiyafares on agimai uyasububunues! Ra sigaraba maiau agogoi om am sabu engon tutufin atruayois ato kokorerek jever efofour ba nanatun eruruayois ato fafenai efafaris. Baise omi sabu on men wogogoi Yau on bobo nanaba anafour on!
Omi ami tafaror goa on arimon wagan wat inen. Yau awurem dura bag, omi arimon men woniteu, on an rai an wera innat weie omi wonau, ‘God imomoginai On Bada Wabinai enat.’”
Sabat ra taniai Iesu inai Pharisee yangan asi bainetewarotin an goai nan bayu itam mes; ato sabu on Iesu sibimateteai tiwag.
Orot sawau tani ibo ann iman sidadau, on inat Iesu aurin,
ato Iesu on Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on itetemis iyau, “Ot ati Baifafaro iyau on fofonin arimon sabu Sabat ra nan sabu taniyawasis o ambin i?”
Baise osi men fofonin abi dura tani sitau. Iesu orot ibo, iyawasai ato iyafarai inai.
Namon On osi auris iyau, “Omi natum o ami foro ox tani on Sabat ra nan sareu an doguai itafeu, ato omi mamaba wotafour i? Omi ra kaita wotan wottein itag, basit Sabat ra min on.”
Baise atonio dura aurin on osi men fofonin arimon sitiyafotai on.
Iesu isagob mamaba sabu fani siyoyores si’nat bayu am aurin on, osi asi efan on obis wat sinunuenen on nan simamair, on mes atonio bobo aurin on sabu engon auris dura kawenai nan idudur:
“Orot tani inibebegim unnat tabin an forag aurin on, om men efan aiyetunai unamair mes. Om men usagob goa matuanin on orot tani gagamin bag men om ba, on ibebegai enat tabin an forag aurin,
ato goa matuanin, omi rum engon ibibebegim wo’nat on innat aurim inau, ‘Om atonio efan emama on unikirir ato orot atonio on nin efanai inamair.’ Namon om arimon mamai inboem ato efan babanai bag on nan unamair.
Baise om, goa matuanin inbibebegim on, unan efan babanai unamair, ato goa matuanin on toun ibibebegim on aurim innat ato inau, ‘Turau, enat efan obinai unamair.’ Namon sabu fani sibebegis sinat nan semama on arimon engon om sinkakafem.
Iyai iyafan toun ebigagaminai on arimon sinyeirai insur, ato iyai iyafan toun eyeyeirai on arimon siniyamai gagamin inmatar.”
Namon Iesu on dura ato orot goa matuanin on iyor inat on aurin iyau, “Om aiyet an bayu o rabirabi an bayu unbotitiwag on men om turam o taitaim tutuam, o om am dam warar o sabu fani sawarotis—osi unibebegis mes, osi on arimon angaramin sinibebegim men, on etaiai ato aifan bobo ufofour aurin on arimon sinigaraminem men.
Om am forag unbiyamai on, sabu kokoianis, ass imas raguraguis, ass komasis, a matas fotis on unibebegis;
onai om on arimon baimomogin unboai yabin osi sabu on men angaramin sinigaraminem men. Baise sabu obis ato rabob emon sinmisiririn an rai on nan God inigaraminem men.”
Sabu kemai nan simama, ato orot tani atonio dura itatam ato on Iesu aurin iyau, “Yasisir gagamin bag ato osi sabu auris iyabon God an Baiaiwabai sinamair bayu si’nam on!”
Iesu on orot aurin iyau, “Ra tani orot forag gagamin iyamai ato sabu sigaraba maiau ibebegis.
Bayu am an wera inat, ato on orot on an agirotin iyafarai inai ato sabu ibibebegis on itawures ‘Omi wonat, wei bayu engon wabotitiwag nono!’
Baise osi sabu on engon sibosuruf, kakaita kakaita asi dura ta ta on siboen sigat. Orot ainauin on agirotin iyawur iyau, ‘Yau au motob atobon on mes anan anitai; ato am bada unawur, arie yau on aurin abiyababan yabin yau men anat on.’
Orot tani ba iyau, ‘Yau au foro ox engon auyotoat atobonen ato yau a’nan au masauai nan foro anites ansagob osi on fofonis bobo sinabo o ambin; ato am bada unawur, arie yau on aurin abiyababan yabin yau men anat on.’
Orot tani iyau, ‘Yau ato arimon atabin, on fasinai yau men anat on.’
Agirotin imatabir men atonio bobo aurin on an bada iyawur. On goa an bada on yan men sunub itatab ato an agirotin aurin iyau, ‘Om gariwat egat enai mafam gagamis amosi unar goa sanasi nan unar ungat sabu kokoianis, ass imas raguraguis, matas fotis a ass komasis on unboes unnat.’
Men weromin agirotin iyau, ‘Bada, dura mamaba uyawureu on nanaba afour, baise efan on gagamin yen.’
On mes bada on agirotin aurin iyau, ‘Egat enai rega etai nan a rega uwar sanasi nan sabu eboes senat, ato au goa awan inbonu.
Yau awurem, sabu ainau abibebegis on men iyai tani arimon yau mat bayu wanam on!’”
Sabu kuayo gagamin on Iesu mat sibib si’nan, ato On irutabir sabu auris iyau,
“Iyai iyafan Yau auriu enat on men fofonin au baigibubunuotin inmatar on, ab on Yau ininuaboiu tiwag weie, on men on toun taman, ayon, a’wan, nanatun, taitain tutuan, rorobun a on toun ibinuabois ba on.
Iyai iyafan men fofonin toun an nab inabar ato inigibubunueu, on min men Yau au baigibubunuotin on.
“Iyai iyafan ebinonot goa ann weromin inyon on, ainau inamair ato goa inyoyonin an baiyan on engon inkuseb initai, on an agim on fofonin arimon an bobo inisawarai.
Ato on bobo men inbiyamai on arimon goa ann wat inrou ato men fofonin inyon insawar, ato sabu sinitai ato bobo mamaba imamatar on, arimon sinikoboai sinsererai.
Osi arimon sinau, ‘Atonio orot ibosuruf goa ann weromin iyoyonin ato men fofonin inisawarai on!’
“Aiwab orot an sabu 10,000 nanaba iboes egat, ato aiwab orot tani on sabu 20,000 nanaba on mat baigagam mes. Ato orot on ainau inamair ininonot on an faiwar fofonin arimon aiwab orot tani rus sinigagam ai ambin.
On orot men fofonin arimon aiwab orot tani inisowarai on, an sabu dura bobibotis iniyafares sinan aiwab orot sinnefotai sinifefeyanai tuf baiyamin aurin, on an ra on orot on eta nanenei emama nan.
Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau, “On eta kaitamomai, iyai iyafan egogoi Yau au baigibubunuotin inmatar on, ato bobo aifan ato ebobo on engon inikiriren.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Kamit on obin, ato on kamit an nanian insasawar on, men eta yen arimon taniyamai an nanian inboai men.
Motob aurin on men obin a kuke foro asi ain mat aurin men obin; osi asir tanrebenen mom. Omi sabu er tainam aumas on Yau atonio dura abikakafun on wontatam tiwag!”
Ra tani sabu agim takes bo’otis sigaraba a sabu bokomasotis sigaraba on sinat Iesu an dura sittatam mes,
ato Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on sibosuruf sigagamois si’yau, “Atonio orot on sabu bokomasotis ebikakaiwis a on eb On mat bayu sam!”
On mes Iesu atonio dura kawen on auris idudur:
“Omi orot tani aurin foro sheep orot nim nanaba ato foro sheep kaitamom wat itsisiwan on arimon-mamaba itafour i? On an foro sheep orot bat auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baibatin on nan itikirires wayo si’tam ato on itgat itan foro sheep kaitamom isisiwan on itnuen itgaturai.
On foro sheep itgaturai on, itiyasisir kwakwan ato itboai abaranai ityagai,
ato itabar itnat au go. Namon on tuturan a sabu fani ityores sitruayo ato itawures, ‘Yau abiyasisir kwakwan ato au foro sheep isiwan on agaturai men. Omi wonat engon taniyasisir!’
On eta kaitamomai on awurem, orot bokomasotin kaitamom ya baikitabir inboai on, safamai on arimon yasisir gagamin inmatar, ato sabu orot bat auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baibatin auris on osi tous sebinonotis on obis wat on fasinai osi men ya baikitabir segogoi on.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Jever aurin agim gugudis engon auyotoat nanaba ato agim kafakakai kaitamom wat itbisiwanai on- jever arimon mamaba itafour i? On ramef ititutu ato an goa itrereb, ato efan engon itnuen tiwag itgaturai.
On agim itgaturai on. Jever tuturan a sabu fani ityores ato itawures itau, ‘Yau au agim agaturai on mes abiyasisir kwakwan. Omi wonat engon taniyasisir!’
On eta kaitamomai awurem, God an anea on arimon men sunub siniyasisir ato orot bokomasotin kaitamom ya baikitabir inboboai on.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Ra tani orot nanatun ruam mat simama.
Fifi giya on taman aurin iyau, ‘Bab, yau au buder ato uyein yen on agogoi ari bag uniteu.’ On mes orot an buder ikuseb nanatun ainau giya auris.
Ra fani sisawar gibunai fifi giya on an sawar sabu fani auris itotobon agim ibo ato on an goa ikirir igat inai. On igat inai tafanam nanenei nan an ma komasinai imama an agim on engon ireben isawar.
On an agim engon ireben isawar. Namon on efanai on gomar gagamin bag imatar tafanam au engon ibo, ato on an bayu ambin bag.
On mes on inai, ato on tafanam an orot tani aurin on nan bobo ibo, ato on orot iyafarai igat an foro itkaifares mes.
Fifi on bitanan igi kwakwan ato igogoi bag on foro asi bayu si’yam on itboen itam mes. Yabin men iyafan tani bayu itai iyam on.
Au kanfoun on fifi an not itotorai ato toun aurin iyau, ‘Tamau an bobo sabu sigaraba nan semama auris on bayu fofonis wat baise yau nin on bayu mes ararabob!
Yau an misir anan tamau aurin ato anau, “Bab, yau on God aurin abokomas a om mat aurim bobo komasin afour.
Yau men obiu on unyoreu natum; ab om uniyameu yau om am bobo’otin tani ba.’
On mes fifi imisir ato imatabir men inai taman aurin. “Fifi on eta nanenei bag arimon i’nat au go ato taman iyeit inai natun it; ato iyababan kwakwan, on iyayai inai natun irous ato iboyayanin.
Fifi iyau, ‘Tamau, yau God aurin abokomas a om mat aurim bobo komasin afour. Yau on men obiu on unyoreu natum.’
Baise fifi taman on an agirotis auris iyor iyau, ‘Gariwat beber obin wobo wonat woitakwakwarai. Imanai kwasi woiwan, a kamak wobo ann woiwanen.
Namon omi wonai foro boboun momon wat worab, ato forag gagamin taniyamai bayu tanam taniyasisir!
Yabin yau natu on irabob, baise on iyawas men; on isiwan ato agaturai men.’ On mes osi sibosuruf forag gagamin siyamai.
“On an werai ato ainau orot on igat inai masau ibobo. Namon on imatabir i’nat, on inat goa aurin ibiufin ato osi on tataf sirarabin a sibisau on wafararabis itatam.
On mes on agirotin tani iyor inat ato itetemai iyau, ‘Nan bobo aifan emamatar i?’
Agirotin iyafotai iyau, ‘Taim inat men au go, ato tamam on foro boboun momon irab yabin taim on yawasin imatabir men.’
Ainau orot on yan itatab kwakwan on men igogoi goa amonai itar; on mes taman on nana natun ibifefeyanai itar goa amonai mes.
Baise fifi ainau orot on taman iyafotai men iyau, ‘Eite, kwanda sigaraba maiau yau on agirotiu ba aurim aboen, ato yau men meyan om fonam aseir mes. Ato aifan uteu i? Ambin bag, om men foro goat kafakakai urab uteu yau tuturau mat wam waiyasisir mes!
Baise atonio natum on am buder engon ibo inai nan eta eta asi jeverig auris on engon ireben isawar, ato on imatabir inat men on om on aurin foro tona boboun momon urab!’
Taman iyafotai iyau, ‘Natu om on ra fufur nin bisiwui emama ato au sawar aifan engon nin sen on om noam.
Baise ot forag tabiyamai tabiyasisir on taim on irabob baise ari on yawasin; on isiwan baise ari agaturai men.’”
Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau, “Ra tani orot sawarotin on an agirotin on baibad itai an sawar engon ikakaifaren. Gibui sabu fani orot sawarotin sikasonai on an agirotin ato baibad itai an sawar ikakaifaren on, an agim turin on fetag fetag ebiraram,
on mes orot sawarotin an agirotin iyor irui ato iyawur iyau, ‘Om bobo komasis efofour on duram nanaba atatam i? Om fef unboai ato au agim asi eta mamaba sibobo on engon ungayam unkasoneu ansagob, yabin om men gibui arimon baibad unboai au sawar unkaifaren mes.’
Agirotin on toun aurin iyau, ‘Yau au bada on arimon au bobo emon inboseiriu angat. Yau mamaba anafour? Yau on men wawaniu arimon dogu anasar on, ato bobo nuenin aurin fefeyan on mamai eboeu.
Yau ari asagob, arimon mamaba anafour? Au bada ato au bobo emon inboseiriu angagat on, arimon tuturau asi goai nan siniwaniu mat wanama.’
On mes bobo an bada on sabu osi iyabon asi bada sawarotin bisinai sawar siboen ato gibui sitigaraminai mes, osi sabu on engon iyores sirui aurin. On orot ainauin itetemai iyau, ‘Om au bada aurin sawar biyam nanaba on uboen bisimui sen i?’
On iyafotai iyau, ‘Olive momon naukwat awas bonuis aumas on engon orot nim nanaba on anitai men.’ Bobo an bada iyau, ‘Om momon uboai an fef min atonio yen. Gariwat emair ato eyeirai esur orot bat auyotoat nanaba egayam.’
Namon on orot tani ba aurin iyau, ‘Om sawar biyam nanaba uboen bisimui sen i ?’ On iyafotai iyau, ‘Sawareg kwakwar auman an bit on 1,000 nanaba abo.’ Bobo an bada on iyau, ‘Om am sawareg kwakwar uboai an fef min atonio. Eyeirai esur 800 nanaba egayam.’
“On yabinai orot sawarotin an agirotin komasin ato bobo auris ibi bada on ifain, yabin sabu ato ari nin tafanam an yawasai semama on sisagob tiwag mamaba eta faniai nanaba sinafour tuturas auris, men ato sabu Bada an yawasai semama ba on.”
Ato Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Yau awurem: Atonio tafanam an sawar obis aurim sen, on nan uniyamai tuturam mat wonam bonen wonama tiwag. Namon on sawar sinsasawaris on, God arimon safamai nan inikakaiwim inboem unar.
Iyai iyafan bobo gugudis ekakaifaren tiwag on, on min arimon bobo gagamis auris mat inkaifaren tiwag; iyai iyafan bobo gugudis men inkaifaren tiwag, on min men arimon bobo gagamis inkaifaren on.
Om atonio tafanam an yawasai agim sawar men ukaifarai tiwag on, ato safam an sawar maiauin kaifarin aurin mat min mamaba sinitutumem?
Om sabu fani asi sawar on men ukaifarai tiwag on, ato om toum am sawar on mamaba arimon sinitem.
“Agirotin men iyafan tani on an bada ruam auris iniagir mes; on arimon tani on inisisiweiai ato tani on ininuaboai; on arimon tani on inbokikin ato tani on inisisiweiai. Om men fofonin arimon God a agim rus ra kaita uniagires on.”
Pharisee yangan atonio dura engon sitatam on osi Iesu sikoboai sisererai yabin osi on agim sinuaboai kwakwan on mes.
Iesu osi auris iyau, “Omi toum wobiyamem sabu engon matasi seitem on obim wat, baise God isagob omi nunuam on mamaba. Sawar ato sabu senonosin osi auris on gagamis bag, ato God matanai on sawar yabis ambin.
“Moses an Baifafaro a aubairuruotis asi dura sigagayam on nan sabu sibigibubunuai. Ato John Bapataito’otin inat an rai on Wasagobin God an Baiaiwab aurin ikurereb, ato sabu engon on sefofourtobon God an Baiaiwab amonai sinar mes.
Safam tafanam on arimon gariwat sasasan sintumai, baise Baifafaro amonai gayam kaitamom kafakakai wat on arimon men fofonin insiwan.
“Orot iyafan awan jever ebikirir ato on jever tani ibo ebiawan men on min ebireg nan; a orot tani iyafan ato jever sibikirir on ibo ebiawan men, on min ebireg nan.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Ra tani orot sawarotin imama ato an ara beber on obis obis wat i’yoten ato ra fufur on forag ibiyamai bayu obis wat i’yam.
Orot tani mat wabin Lazarus on orot on kokoianin imama, on usin engon on gawud wat, ato on ra fufur si’boai si’nan orot sawarotin an goa metewan awanai sibimairai imama.
On igogoi on ato orot sawarotin an kemai bayu i’yam tuturis sifefeu on itabo itam mes. Ato kuke mat si’nat an gawud on sireremosen.
“Gibui, on orot kokoianin irabob ato anea on ayubin sibo sinai Abraham aurin safamai nan. Orot sawarotin ba irabob ato sigarobai,
baise on siyafarai inai efan menan sabu komasis serarabob senan semama on nan usibaban gagamin iboai. On itage ato Abraham nanenei nan it Lazarus rus simama.
On mes on iyor iyau, ‘Tamau Abraham! Ekabereu, ato Lazarus eiyafarai iman arakokoanai wat sareu itikutub ato fafeu itinubai, yabin yau on atonio wairafai nan baikokosar gagamin aboai!’
“Baise Abraham iyau, ‘Natu, asir enos mom, om am yawas tutufin amonai umama am sawar engon aurim on basit fofonim wat, baise Lazarus an yawas amonai on komasin wat imama. Baise ari Lazarus nin on ebiyasisir ato om on usibaban eboai.
Mat, ot basuti on tarabab gagamin yen; men fofonin arimon iyafan tani inrabon om inibaisim a mat men iyafan tani on efanai emama on inrabon atonio efanai.’
Orot sawarotin iyau, ‘Tamau Abraham, abifefeyanim Lazarus utiyafarai itan tafanamai nan tamau an goai,
ato taitaiu tutuau engon nim nan semama, on itan osi tainas ityein on men atonio baikokosar an efanai sinnat mes.’
“Abraham iyau, ‘Om taitaim tutuam on Moses an baifafaro a aubairuruotis dura sigagayam on sibo siniyab ato tous sinsagob.’
Orot sawarotin iyafotai iyau, ‘Tamau Abraham! On men fofonin on. Orot tani rabob emon inmisir ato inan osi auris on sinitutum ato osi min ya baikitabir sinboai.’
Baise Abraham iyau, ‘Om taitaim tutuam on Moses an baifafaro a aubairuruotis asi dura sigagayam on men aurin sibifonabo on, ato orot iyafan rabob emon inmisir inan auris, on arimon men an dura sintatam on.’”
Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau, “Bobo arimon dura bag sinmatar iniyamai sabu sinbokomas; baise komasin bag orot iyafan on bobo iniyamen sinmamatar on!
Iyai iyafan on bobo komasin iniyamai fifi kafakakai inbobokomas on, iyobin on orot jever on anjonai agim gagamin sinous ato kamit borit badamai sinreberirai insur inamtotom inarab.
On mes omi wonkaifarem tiwag bobo aifan wofofour on! “Om taim tuam inbobokomas on matanai unawur, om eta usarar ato on ya baikitabir inboai on, om uninotburai.
Om taim tuam ato ra kaitamom amonai on wera nimtereban ruam nanaba aurim inbobokomas ato on wera kakaita kakaita nanaba on innanat aurim i’nau, ‘Yau ya baikitabir abo’ basit om on uninotburai.”
Baiyoyobotis on Bada aurin siyau, “Wei ai baitutum eiyamai inarat.”
Bada iyafotes iyau, “Omi ami baitutum an rat on ato aigab foun ba on, wengar wabin mulberry on unawur, ‘Toum awerorom engon auman yabarainim ato eboem esur kamitai nan etanumem!’ Ato arimon aurim inifonabo.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi ami agirotin tani motob itkukuwain o foro sheep itkakaifares. On masau emon itnat mom on, ra kaita utawur utau, om gagariwat enat am bayu yam?
Ambin bag! Baise om arimon utawur utau, ‘Yau au bayu ebotitiwag, bayu am an beber eiwanim ato ebotitiwagim au bayu unbotitiwag, yau bayu anam anatom weie; om gibui am bayu unam.’
Agirotin ebifonabo bobo ebobo aurin on an bada men ebifain on?
On eta kaitamom omi aurim on eb on nanaba; omi bobo aifan aurin sawurem on asir wonabo mom ato wonau, ‘Wei on asir agiroti maiaui wat; wei asir ai bobo wat wabobo.’”
Iesu au Jerusalem igeg ato On inai tafanam ruam Samaria a Galilee asi sanaf on basunai nan igat.
On inai mafamai nan irur ato sabu auyotoat usis gawu gawudis on sinat sinefotai. Osi nanenei nan sitawar,
ato siyoku siyau, “Iesu! Bada ekaberei!”
Iesu osi ites ato auris iyau, “Omi wonai priest auris ato osi sininateteim.” Osi si’nan eta nenenai on engon siyawasis.
Osi sabu amosi orot kaitamom on toun inateteai on iyawas, ato on imatabir men fonan gagaminai God ifain.
On Iesu nanai ifeu sindan irou ato ikakaiwai. On orot on Samaria emon inat.
Iesu ikakafun iyau, “Sabu on auyotoat nanaba siyawas; ato sabu nimtereban baibatin on menan nan i?
Aibo mes orot touman on ekesin mom inat God inikakaiwai mes i?”
Ato Iesu on orot aurin iyau, “Om emisir enai; am baitutum emon uyawas.”
Pharisee yangan fani Iesu sitetemai on meyan arimon God an Baiaiwab innat. On an baiyafot on iyau, “God an Baiaiwab on men eta taniai nan innat unitai on.
Ato men iyafan tani arimon inau, ‘Eite, atonio’ o ‘Ato nan!’ yabin God an Baiaiwab on omi amomui yen.”
Namon On baigibubunuotis auris iyau, “Wera innat arimon ra tani wongogoi Orot Natun wonitai baise arimon men wonitai on.
Ato osi sabu arimon sinawurem, ‘Eite, ato nan!’ o ‘Eite, atonio nin!’ Baise omi men wongat wonnuen mes.
Orot Natun innanat men an ratafin on arimon nanamar ba inboai kasakasauai inbokiai ato tafanam engon intagawai.
Baise On ainau on arimon inikokosarai bag a ari ra on sabu arimon sinisisiweiai.
Orot Natun innanat men an werai on ato Noah imama an rai ba.
Noah imama an werai on sabu bayu si’yam sitotom a orot jever on sitatabin ato on an rai Noah inai wa amonai irur mom on sareu igat sabu engon tutufin iyasububunues.
On eta kaitamomai ato Lot an werai imamatar ba, on nanaba arimon inmatar. Sabu engon on bayu si’yam sitotom, sawar sibitotobon, masau sibobo a goa siyoyon.
On an rai Lot Sodom ibikirir mom on wairaf wamemeran er yanden auman on yabat ba, safam emon isur ato sabu engon tutufin iyasububunues.
On bobo nanaba on arimon Orot Natun an kudidirin auman inrobotet.
“On an rai orot iyafan an goa uwayob aiyetunai nan on, men insur an goa amonai an sawar inabo; on eta kaitamomai orot masauai nan on men inmatabir men inan au go.
Omi woninonotim, ato bobo mamaba Lot awan aurin imatar on!
Iyai iyafan efofourtobon toun an yawas ebokikin on, arimon yawas obin on inisiwanai ato iyai iyafan toun an yawas ebisisiweiai on, arimon yawas obin inboai.
Yau awurem, on fom amonai on sabu ruam arimon babar kaitamomai sinembubur: orot tani on arimon sinboai sinan ato orot tani on sinikirir.
Jever ruam on arimon rus rafi singagamatabir: jever tani on sinboai sinan, ato tani on sinikirir.
(Orot ruam arimon masau sinbobo: Orot tani on arimon sinboai sinan ato orot tani on sinikirir).”
Baigibubunuotis sitetemai siyau, “Bada, atonio bobo min menan nan i?” Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Orot usin rabobin menan nan yen on, arimon kiwiu kikim on nan sinnat sinruayo.”
Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris atonio dura kawenai idudur itibebeyes, on osi ra fufur sinbayoi men sinisuweigan mes.
“Mafam gagamin tani amonai orot baigurubabanotin imama, on orot on men God ibeberuai a sabu men ikakafes on.
Ato kena jever on eb on mafam gagaminai imama, on ra fufur i’nat baigurubabanotin aurin ibifefeyanai i’yawur, ‘Yau agogoi unibaisiu ato au ragit au sawar ibo bisinai yen on anboai men!’
Wera weromin maiau orot baigurubabanotin on men igogoi on bobo itiyamai,baise au kanfoun on toun aurin ikakafun iyau, ‘Basit yau on men God abeberuai a sabu men akakafes,
baise atonio kena jever on nana yau ebisababaniu kwakwan, on mes atonio bobo aniyamai an gogoi on anibaisin. Ato yau atonio bobo men anbiyamai on kena jever arimon nana auriu innanat inbiyameu arimon anisuweigan kwakwan!’”
Ato Bada an dura nana ibotein iyau, “Omi wontatam mamaba ato orot baigurubabanotin komasin an dura ibikakafun on.
God an sabu fom ra On aurin setotou on arimon fofonin obin wat on inites, On arimon sasasan wat iniyafotes.
Yau awurem, God arimon sasasan wat an sabu inibaisis! Baise Orot Natun inmatabir men innanat au tafanam on sabu arimon ingatures On aurin on sebitutum o ambin?”
Mat Iesu on atonio dura kawenai sabu auris idudur, osi sabu fani sinonosin osi on obis wat ato sabu fani on komasis.
“Ra tani sabu ruam sigai tafaror goai bayoi mes: Orot tani on Pharisee, a orot tani on agim takes bo’otin.
Pharisee orot on ekesin mom mabinai itawar ato ibayoi, ‘God yau abikakaiwim kwakwan bag, yau on men afeyaniu, baifafaro men astoben on a men abi reg nan on, yau men ato osi sabu engon sefofour ba. Yau abikakaiwim kwakwan bag yau on men ato orot agim takes bo’otin ba.
Yau tafaror kaitamom amonai on wera ruam nanaba on bayu abikirir abifofour a au agim aboai on ra fufur auyotoat turin on abitem.’
“Baise agim takes bo’otin on nanenei nan itawar ato men fofonin magin au safam ittage on, ab on dogaran irab ato iyau, ‘God, ekabereu, yau on bokomasotiu!’
Iesu iyau, “Yau awurem, atonio orot agim takes bo’otin on God an bokomas innotbur ato inai au go, men ato Pharisee orot on. Yabin osi sabu iyabon tous sebogaiis on sinyeires sinsur ato osi sabu iyabon tous seyeyeires on arimon sinbogaiis sinag.”
Sabu fani nanatus gugudis siboen sinat Iesu aurin iman tefasi ityagai itimomogines mes. Baigibubunuotis osi sites ato bobo sifofour aurin on simisir sabu sigam siyawures.
Baise Iesu fifirig gugudis iyores sinat ato iyau, “Omi fifirig gugudis wonikirires sinnat auriu, men wonsofafaris mes, yabin God an Baiaiwab on ato sabu iyabon asi yawas fifirig gugudis ba sefofour on osi ebinoanis.
Yau awurem dura bag! Iyai iyafan an yawas men ato fifi kafakakai ba infofour God an Baiaiwab inboboai on, on arimon men fofonin inar on.”
Jew asi bainetewarotin on Iesu itetemai iyau, “Baibebeotim obim, yau mamaba anafour yawas mama wantoanin anboai i?”
Iesu itetemai iyau, “Om aibo mes uyoreu Yau Orot obiu? Men iyafan tani on obin ab God ekesin mom on obin.
Om min baifafaro dura usagob: ‘Om men unireg nan; turam men unirabobai; om men unbainau; turam men unisigoai; ayom tamam unkakafes.’”
Orot iyafotai iyau, “Yau fifi kafakakaiu bag on atonio osi baifafaro dura engon auris on aifonabo.”
Iesu atonio dura itatam ato orot aurin iyau, “Om bobo kaitamom wat on nana arimon uniyamai. Om am sawar engon tutufin sabu auris unitotobon ato agim unboai on sabu kokoianis unites, ato om arimon safamai nan unisawarotim; namon om unnat unigibubunueu.”
Baise orot atonio dura itatam on, men sunub iyababan yabin on orot on sawarotin bag.
Iesu it orot on iyababan ato iyau, “Sabu sawarotis auris on iwani kwakwan God an Baiaiwab amonai sinar!
Foro camel on sasasan wat arimon sainuk matan an doguai inar, baise orot sawarotin aurin on iwani kwakwan men fofonin arimon God an Baiaiwab amonai inar on.”
Sabu on dura sitatam ato sitetemai siyau, “Iyafan on arimon yawas mama wantoanin inboai i?”
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Bobo aifan sabu auris on iwani kwakwan, baise God aurin bobo engon tutufin on fofonin wat.”
Namon Peter iyau, “Eite! Wei on ai goa waikiriren ato Om wabigibubunuem.”
Iesu auris iyau, “Dura bag, ato Yau awurem, sabu iyabon God an Baiaiwab aurin on asi goa o awawas jever o taitais tutuas o a’yos tatamas o nanatus sibikirires on,
arimon gagamin bag God inites men ato ari semama ba, a gibui sinrarabob on arimon yawas mama wantoanin sinboai.”
Iesu baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on iboes mabisi sinai nan ato auris iyau, “Omi wontatam! Ot on tanan au Jerusalem on nan ato aubairuruotis dura aifan engon Orot Natun aurin dura buk amonai sigagayam on innat inidura bag.
On arimon sabu men Jew yangan on imasi sinyagai, osi arimon On sinikoboai, On dura komasis sinawur a sinakan tuturai.
On arimon sinaswabirai ato sinasubun baise ra baitoninai on arimon inmisir inyawas men.”
Baise baigibubunuotis atonio dura aurin on men tani sisagob; atonio dura an yabin on auris sibuni ato Iesu dura aifan ibikakafun on osi men sisagob.
Iesu inat Jericho mafam gagamin aurin ibiufin ato orot matan fotin tani on etai nan imair agim mes ikafefeyan.
Sabu kuayo sinat sineseirai si’nan on itatamis ato on sabu itetemis iyau, “Nin on aifan emamatar i?”
Osi siyawur siyau, “Iesu Nazareth emon on inat ineseirim enan.”
On iyoku iyau, “Iesu! David Natun! Ekabereu!”
Sabu ato ainau si’nan on orot sigam siyawur ato osi siyawur awan itafot mes. Baise on aumiet bag iyoku iyau, “David Natun! Ekabereu!”
On mes Iesu itawar ato sabu iyawures orot matan fotin on sitboai aurin sitnat. Orot inat Iesu aurin iufin ato Iesu itetemai iyau,
“Om aifan egogoi aurim anafour i?” On iyafotai iyau, “Bada, yau agogoi matau aneit men.”
Iesu orot aurin iyau, “Matam yeit men! Om am baitutum emon uyawas.”
Ra kaita on matan fotin iyeit men, ato on Iesu igibubunuai God ibikakaiwai. Sabu kuayo on bobo si’tai on engon tutufin God sifain siduduranai.
Iesu inai Jericho mafam gagaminai irui, ato nana ibib i’nan.
Orot wabin Zacchaeus, on orot on agim takes bo’otis asi orot gagamin tani a on eb on sawarotin on nan imama.
On ifofourtobon ititai iyafan on Iesu, baise on orot on dibokakain on mes on men fofonin Iesu ititai on, yabin sabu kuayo on gagamin bag.
On mes on sabu kuayo nasi ainau iyayai inai wengar wabin sycamore, on nan igai Iesu on etai nan ibib i’nat on ititai mes.
Iesu ibib inat on efanai igat ato itage Zacchaeus aurin iyau, “Zacchaeus, gariwat esur, Yau on ari om am goai nan anama.”
Zacchaeus on sasasan wat wengar emon isur ato yasisirai nan Iesu ikakaiwai ato ibo inai an goai nan.
Sabu engon tutufin on bobo si’tai on sibosuruf sibidurusof sigagam si’yau, “Atonio orot on inai bokomasotin an goai emama!”
Zacchaeus imisir itawar ato Bada aurin iyau, “Bada untatam! Yau au sawar turin on an kuseb sabu kokoianis anites, ato iyai iyafan ankakabainauai mes on, arimon wera bat nanaba on tefanai anigaraminai men.”
Iesu aurin iyau, “Yawas on ari atonio goa amonai irui, orot mat on Abraham wawan agirin.
Yabin Orot Natun on inat sabu sisiwan semama on innuenis iniyawasis mes.”
Sabu atonio dura si’tatam ato Iesu on dura kawenai ibotein men sabu auris idudur. Iesu ibib inai Jerusalem aurin ibiufin ato sabu fani sinos on God an Baiaiwab on kafakakai mom inrobotet.
On mes On iyau, “Ra tani orot gagamin aiwab an dam warar emon on inai tafanam tani nanenei nan on sitiyamai itiaiwab ato on gibunai on itmatabir men itnat an au go.
Weie on an goa itikirir itgat, on an agirotis engon auyotoat iyores sirui ato agim gold on kakaita kakaita iraramis ato iyawures iyau, ‘Atonio agimai on nan bobo wonabo agim turin ba woniyamai, yau anan ato anmatabir men annat.’
Baise on orot an mafam sabu on men sigogoiai, on mes sabu dura bobibotis on siyafares orot gibunai sinai ato orot bainetewarotin siyawur, ‘Wei men wagogoi atonio orot on wei ai aiwab orot mes inmatar.’
“Baise orot on kututu sitai aiwab imatar ato imatabir men inat au go. On ra kaita an agirotis iyawures sinat nanai sitawar, ato itsagob agim ibites on biyam nanaba siyamai.
Agirotin ainau on inat iyau, ‘Bada, agim gold kaitamom wat uteu, ato on amonai abobo on agim gold engon auyotoat nanaba abo.’
On iyau, ‘Om bobo obin bag ufour, om on agirotim obim! Bobo gugudis on ukaifaren tiwag, on mes anboem mafam gagamis engon auyotoat nanaba on om unkaifaren.’
Agirotin bairuin ba irui ato iyau, ‘Bada, om agim gold kaitamom wat uteu, ato on amonai aboen on agim gold engon nim nanaba abo.’
Atonio agirotin aurin iyau, ‘Om arimon mafam gagamis engon nim on unkaifaren.’
Agirotin tani on inat ato iyau, ‘Bada, om am agim gold ato, yau beberai aikiman aibuni i’yen.
Yau om aberuem yabin om on orot wawanim on mes. Agim men om noam baise om ubo a masau men om uba baise wasi on ukuwain.’
On orot aurin iyau, ‘Om agirotim komasim! Om toum am dura ubikakafun on nan antawar animakiem! Om usagob on yau orot wawaniu, om uyau agim men yau noau baise abo a masau men aba baise bayu on akuwain.
On nanaba dura bag on ato, om au agim on utboai agim an goai bag utiwan. Namon au agim on kafakakai itabo turin itiyamai ato atnat men on au agim atboai.’
“Namon on sabu nan sitatawar auris iyau, ‘Agim gold on imanai wabaruai ato agirotin agim auyotoat ibiyamai on wonitai.’
Baise osi on aurin siyau, ‘Bada, on agim auyotoat iboen nono!’
On iyafotes iyau, ‘Yau awurem, iyai iyafan aurin sawar sigaraba si’nen on arimon sinitai, baise iyai iyafan aurin sawar ambin, basit kafakakai wat yen min on arimon imanai sinabaruai.
Ato yau au ragit osi men sigogoi yau osi asi aiwab orot mes atmatar on woboes wonat nin ato yau nawui nan wonasububunues!’”
Iesu ato dura ikakafun ato sabu nasi On ainau ekesin inai au Jerusalem.
On inat mafam bethage a bethany auris iufin, Olive Oyau bisinai nan, ato On an baigibubunuotis ruam ainau iyafares sinai,
On dura iyaubaiyates iyau, “Omi wonan nan mafam tani namui yen; on nan wonar mom, on foro donkey kafakakai nan wengarai siyous etatawar on wongaturai ato on foro min men tefanai sigai simair sibonanaboai on, on uram wonrufan ato nin wonboai wonnat.
Ato iyai iyafan nan initetemim inau, omi aibo mes worurufan ato wonawur, wei ai Bada egogoi.”
Osi sinai ato Iesu dura aifan i’yawures on engon sigaturen.
Osi foro donkey kafakakai an uram sirurufan ato foro matuanis on osi auris siyau, “Omi aibo mes foro an uram worurufan i?”
Osi siyafotes siyau, “Wei ai Bada egogoi,”
ato osi foro donkey kafakakai sibo sinai Iesu aurin. Namon osi asi beber on foro donkey tefanai sirebegagaien ato Iesu sibaisin igai foro tefanai imair.
On foro tefanai imair i’nat on sabu asi beber etai nan siyabaren.
On inat Jerusalem aurin ibiufin ato on efanai on eta isur inai Olive Oyauai igat, On an baigibubunuotis kuayo gagamin on sibosuruf fonas gagaminai God sibikakaiwai a sibifain, On mamaba bobo buburis ifofour matasi si’tai aurin on. Osi si’yau,
“God aiwab imomoginai Bada Wabinai enat! Tuf on safamai yen a God Aiyetunenei Wabin duran tanbogagaiai!”
Namon Pharisee fani nan sabu kuayo amosi on Iesu aurin sikakafun siyau, “Baibebeotim, om am baigibubunuotis dura wawaninai yawures awas sinafot!”
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Yau awurem osi awas sinafot on, agim arimon tous wat sinbosuruf siniyoku.”
On inat mafam gagamin aurin ibiufin ato On iyeit mafam gagamin it’tai on ibosuruf itou,
On Jerusalem aurin ikakafun iyau, “Om iyobin ari bag on tuf an eta utsagob! Baise ari on men usagob on, yabin om on sibuniem!
An wera innat arimon om am ragit on sinikufifinem am mafam gagamin an eta erur e’gat on nan sinyafoten, ato arimon autab wat reban reban engon aurim sinigagam.
Osi arimon am sabu mat engon sinikomasim; men arimon agim tani an efanai sinikirir inen mes, yabin omi men wogogoi wera wotsagob aifanai God inat itiyawasim mes!”
Namon Iesu inai tafaror goai irui ato ibosuruf sabu baitotobonotis ifaitanis sigat,
On iyawures iyau, “God an dura buk amonai sigayam, God iyau, ‘Yau au tafaror goa on sinyorai bayoi an goa.’ Baise omi wobo woikitabirai bainauotis asi ob efan mes imatar!”
Iesu ra fufur tafaror goai nan sabu ibibebeyes. Priest aiwabis, Baifafaro an baibebeotis, a sabu asi bainetewarotis on sigogoi sitasubun,
baise osi men fofonin eta sitgaturai on bobo sitafour, yabin sabu engon tutufin on nana On an dura sitatam, men sigogoi dura tani kaitamom wat sitisarar mes.
Ra tani Iesu tafaror goai nan sabu ibibebeyes a Wasagobin ibibino, ato priest aiwabis, Baifafaro an baibebeotis, a sabu kawian osi sinat
ato On aurin siyau, “Om ekasonei, abi baibad ubo atonio osi bobo efofour i? Atonio baibad on iyafan item osi bobo efofour?”
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Yau ba anitetemim, omi wonkasoneu,
John an baibad on men emon ne ibo sabu ibibapataitois, on God emon ibo o sabu emon ibo?”
Osi sibosuruf tous wat amosi sigagamois bonen, “Ot dura mamaba tanau i? Ot ari tanau, ‘God emon ibo’ ato On inau, ‘Ato omi aibo mes men John woitutumai i?’
Baise ot ari tanau, ‘Sabu emon ibo,’ ato sabu kuayo gagamin on ari agimai sinborarabit yabin osi engon sebitutum John on aubairuruotin.”
On mes osi siyafotai siyau, “Wei men wasagob iyafan on John baibad itai sabu ibibapataitois.”
Ato Iesu auris iyau, “Yau mat men ankasonem iyafan baibad iteu atonio osi bobo afofour.”
Namon Iesu atonio dura kawenai on sabu auris idudur: “Orot an masauai wine itanumen ato on sabu iboes wine masau sitbobo agim sitbiyamai ato on goa ikirir inai tafanam nanenei bag.
Namon wera inat wine uwan bairut mes ato on an agirotin tani iyafarai inai sabu wine bobo’otis auris nan on an agim turin itboai mes. Baise sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir agirotin siborarab ato eriman siyafarai men imatabir.
On mes on agirotin tani ba iyafarai inai; baise sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir agirotin tani ba sibo siborarab, simamaiai ato eriman siyafarai men imatabir.
Namon on agirotin baitonin ba iyafarai inai; sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir siborarab kiyam sitai ato sibo au koun sirebetet igat.
Namon wine matuanin on iyau, ‘Yau mamaba anafour i? Yau tou natu au nuabo bag on aniyafarai; asagob osi arimon on sinkakafai!’
Baise sabu wine bobo’otis on fifi sit ato osi tous wat siyau bonen, ‘Atonio fifi on matuanin toun natun. Tanasubun ato atonio wine masau on ot tanboai ininoanit!’
On mes osi fifi sibo wine masau emon sirebetet igat au koun ato siyasubun. Iesu itetemis iyau, “Wine masau matuanin on arimon mamaba inafour ato osi wine bobo’otis auris?
On arimon innat ato osi sabu inasububunues ato wine masau on inboai wine bobo’otis fani inites.” Sabu atonio dudur sitatam on siyau, “Ambin, bobo men nanaba inmatar mes.”
Iesu on osi magis matas iten ato itetemis iyau, “Atonio God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on an yabin min mamaba i? ‘Arir ato goa baigoyonotis matan ainau sit on men obin on mes sisisiweiai ato gibui sisagob on arir on iyobin bag mat gagamin arir engon tefasi.’
Iyai iyafan on arir tefanai infefeu on arimon usin intamomos insawar ato on arir iyai iyafan tefanai infefeu inrarabin on arimon aunan aunan inasubun fofou inmatar.”
Baifafaro an baibebeotis a priest aiwabis sigogoi bag Iesu on ari wat sitfatumai yabin osi sisagob atonio dura kawen ibidudur on osi auris iragites; baise osi on sabu auris siber.
On mes osi sibosuruf eta sinunuen. Osi sabu fani bubuniai nan siyafares sinai ato sitisigo osi on sabu obis ato Iesu sititetemai On dura mamaba itbikakafun on sitkamosai, ato Rome asi gawan imanai sityagai mes.
Atonio sabu bubuniai sibiyafares on sinat Iesu aurin siyau, “Baibebeotim, wei wasagob Om dura aifan ebikakafun a sabu ebibebeyes on dura bag wat. Wei wasagob Om sabu asi baibad mamaba auris on men etatamis baise Om dura maiauinai God an gogoi wat on sabu auris ebibebe.
Om ekasonei, ot ati baifafaro min iyau fofonin arimon agim takes on Caesar aurin tanibaiyan o ambin?”
Baise Iesu on osi asi baisigogo on it isagob ato auris iyau,
“Omi ami agim woiyoboeu anitai. Nin on iyafan magin a wabin on atonio yen?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “Caesar.”
On mes Iesu iyau, “Sawar aifan Caesar noan on Caesar wonitai a sawar aifan God noan on God wonitai.”
Osi nan sabu nasi on men fofonin sitkamosai on, on mes osi awas sifot ato Iesu an baiyafot aurin on men sunub siduduran on.
Namon Sadducee fani sinat Iesu aurin. Osi sabu sau on sabu rabob emon on men arimon sinmisiririn men. Osi Iesu sitetemai siyau,
“Baibebeotim, Moses atonio baifafaro dura on ot aurit igayam: ‘Orot inarab awan inikirir nanatun ambin on orot tain on kena jever iniawan ato on fifirig inbibitu on arimon orot rabobin nanatun mes.’
Ra tani ainauan gigiawan engon nimtereban ruam nanaba simama: Ainau orot itabin ato nanatun ambin irabob.
Namon giya orot bairuin ba on kena jever iawan,
namon giya orot baitonin ba on kena jever iawan. Atonio bobo kaitamomai on ainauan gigiawan nimtereban bairuin engon auris on bobo imatar—osi nanatus ambin sirabob.
Au kanfoun on, jever irabob.
Weie, osi ainauan gigiawan nimtereban bairuin engon ato jever sibiawan on arimon kanfounai rabob emon sinmisiririn men on, arimon iyafan on awan i?”
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Orot jever tafanamai semama on setatabin,
baise orot jever ato obis wat God rabob emon ebobaimisires men ato ra gibui sinmama men on arimon men sintabin.
Osi on arimon anea ba sinama ato men sinarab. Osi arimon God nanatun mes sinmatar yabin osi on God rabob emon ibobaimisires on mes.
Moses ato rerebai iyoboet, rabobis on arimon God inbobaimisires men. God an dura buk amonai sigayam ato wairaf regai iyoyour aurin on nan Bada ikakafun iyau, ‘On Abraham an God, Isaac an God, a Jacob an God.’
On an yabin min On on sabu yawasis asi God, On men sabu rabobis auris. yabin God aurin on sabu engon tutufin on yawasis wat.”
Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani sikakafun siyau, “Baibebeotim, Om am baiyafot obin!”
Osi men iyafan tani fofonin arimon ititetemai men.
Iesu osi auris iyau, “Mamaba mes osi sebikakafun sau Keriso on David an warar emon i?
David toun on buk Psalm amonai iyau, ‘Bada on yau au Bada, On aurin iyau: Om nin au asumaiauai emair,
ato Yau am ragit anboes sinsur om am baibad babanai sinama.’
David On aurin iyor iyau, ‘Bada;’ Ato mamaba mes Keriso on David an dam warar emon i?”
Sabu engon Iesu sitatamai ato On an baigibubunuotis auris iyau,
“Omi matam woneit ato osi Baifafaro an baibebeotis auris, osi asi gogoi on beber weromis soten aumas ato baitotobon an efanai nan sebibib a mat osi asi nuabo on sabu nan sebitotobon on kakafai wat nan sinbikakaiwis; osi on bayoi goa amonai asi sifumama on kakafaiis wat on serurubinen a asi efan obis wat on forag asi efanai nan serurubinen;
Osi kekena sebisigogoes ato asi goai sawar sen on engon osi seyayakeis ato tous wat sebogaiis asi bayoi weromin sebabayoi! Osi asi baimaki on arimon komasin bag sinboai!”
Iesu on sabu sawarotis inateteis tiwag asi siwar on tafaror goa an didiwag amonai siyeyeinin,
a mat On it kena jever kokoianin bag on inat an agim gugudis ruam mom iyein.
On iyau, “Yau awurem atonio kena jever kokoianin siwar iyeyeinin on irat kwakwan men ato osi sabu engon siyeyeinin ba.
sabu fani ato asi siwar siyeyeinin on asi agim irat kwakwan on ato kafakakai wat siyein; baise on jever on kokoianin, aifan aurin i’yen on engon tutufin ato iyein isawar men agim yen arimon an bayu intobon on.”
Baigibubunuotis fani on tafaror goa aurin sibikakafun, on tafaror goa an itin obin agim obis on nan siyon a siwar God aurin sikuteten. Iesu iyau,
“Ato osi engon woiten-on an wera innat on men arimon agim kaitamom tani nin an efanai sinikirir inen mes; agim engon tutufin arimon sinboen sinribiriren sinsur.”
Osi sitetemai siyau, “Baibebeotim, atonio bobo on arimon meyan inmatar i? Bobo aifan inmatar onai wei iniyoboei wansagob on wera inat atonio osi bobo sinmatar?”
Iesu iyau, “Omi matam woneit, sabu fani asi dura on men wontatam mes. Sabu sigaraba arimon Yau Wabiui sinnat sinikakafun sinau, ‘Yau orot min atonio!’ato ‘Wera inat nono!’ Baise omi men osi wonigibubunues mes.
Omi men wonaber ato baigagam a baikokosar inmamatar on; osi bobo on arimon ainau sinmatar baise osi on men dura bag tafanam au kanfoun iufin nono on.”
On an dura nana ibotein iyau, “Tafanam arimon tous wat sinigagam bonen; baiaiwab arimon tous wat sinigagam bonen.
Uruyoi arimon gagamis bag sinmatar, gomar an ra inmatar a sawau komasis arimon tafanam au engon inboai; a sawar beruber komasis a bobo baiduduranis gagamis arimon safam aiyetun emon sinnat.
Baise weie osi bobo engon tutufin sinmatar, omi arimon sinfatumem ato baikokosar sinitem; omi arimon sinboem bayoi goa amosi nan sinigurubabanim a sinboem fafatum goai sinreberuem. Yau fasiui on omi arimon sinboem sabu aiwabis a bainetewarotis nasi wontawar.
Atonio on omi ami wera bag on nan Yau au Wasagobin on sabu auris wonkurereb.
Omi ainau ami not on woniyamai wonsagobim ato sinboem babadis nasi wontatawar on, men woniyababan dura mamaba wonbikakafun aurin on,
yabin Yau on arimon sagob a dura gigiboan aniyoboem on nan wonikakafun, ato omi ami ragit on men iyafan tani arimon ami dura inrab on, osi ami dura sintatam on dura bag wat wobikakafun.
Omi arimon toum ayom tamam, taitaim tutuam, ami dam warar a tuturam on omi sinboem babadis imasi sinyagai ato omi fani on arimon sinasubunuem.
Yau fasiui on sabu engon tutufin sinisisiweiim.
Baise omi on arimon engon obim yawasim wat, unimui tefam sen engon mat men tani arimon intarir insiwan on.
Omi atonio osi bobo emon nana wonfaskikin on arimon toum woniyawasim.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi wonitai wou yangan Jerusalem sebikufifinai on, wonsagob on mafam gagamin on kafakakai mom sinikomasai.
Namon osi sabu iyabon Judea tafanamai semama on au oyau sinayai sinan; osi sabu iyabon mafam gagaminai semama on mafam sinikirir singat, osi sabu iyabon Jerusalem bisinai semama on men mafam gagamin amonai sinar mes.
Yabin ari ra on ‘Baimaki Ra,’ ato God an dura engon tutufin buk amonai sigagayamen on innat inidura bag.
On an rai on arimon komasin bag ato osi jever iyabon yas sisag aumas a jever iyabon nanatus sebisus auman on! Yawas wawanis bag on arimon atonio tafanamai sinmatar ato God on arimon atonio osi sabu auris iniyatatab.
Sabu fani arimon seriai sinasububunues a sabu fani on arimon sinfatumes ato sinboes tafanam au engon sinabib sinan; a eteni sabu on arimon osi Jerusalem sinboai sinfasfifinim sinikomasai inan asi wera fofonin on nan insawar.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Bobo magis magis arimon wera, roke, siribod auris sinmatar. Tafanamai sabu sigaraba arimon sinaber kwakwan ato kamit yawarad wan inrukikiai an rarabin gagamin a tuwabut gagamin auman innanat on.
Sabu arimon sinbeber on matas sinbubu ato bobo aifan enat tafanam au engon inmamatar aurin sinonosin on, sawar faiwaris engon tutufin safamai sen on arimon asi efan sinisararen.
Namon sabu arimon Orot Natun sinitai kasakasauai inrobotet an faiwar gagaminai an kudidirin auman innat on.
Atonio osi bobo sinbosuruf sinmamatar on omi, wonmisir usom wontagai yabin God on kafakakai mom iniyawasim.”
Namon Iesu on atonio dura kawenai auris idudur: “Omi wengar bubudau a wengar engon on woniten.
Omi wonitai ato wengar rorous sinkutet singagat on wonsagob on kwanda an wera on inat iufin nono.
On eta kaitamomai, omi atonio osi bobo woniten sinmamatar on wonsagob God an Baiaiwab on kafakakai mom inat.
“Yau awurem dura bag, atonio osi bobo engon tutufin sinmatar weie sabu ari semama on sinarab.
Safam a tafanam on arimon intumai baise Yau au dura on arimon men meyan intumai.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi matam woneit! Omi men ami not engon on forag aurin a sareu wawanis wonatom wonbikokok aurin a atonio tafanam an yawas aurin wonyein kwakwan mes, o on Ra on arimon innat inbisafurem on omi men wobotitiwagim on.
Yabin on ra on arimon baisafur egiraf ba innat sabu engon tutufin nin tafanamai auris.
Omi ra fufur wonbotitiwagim a wonbabayoi ami faiwar wonboboai ato bobo aifan engon tutufin sinmamatar on, omi obinai wat wonan Orot Natun nanai wontawar.”
Osi ra nan on Iesu tafaror goai sabu ibibebeyes ato ibirabirabi on i’gat i’nan Olive Oyauai nan i’yenbubur.
Ra ra fomenei fufur on sabu engon si’nan tafaror goai an dura sittatam mes.
Forag wabin Rafi Sarar Men Fio Yist Auman on seyoyorai Baisobon, on an wera inat iufin.
Priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on sabu auris siber on mes osi sifofourtobon eta sinunuen Iesu bubuniai nan sitasubun mes.
Namon Afaguban on baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis bairuin tani wabin Judas on seyoyorai Iscariot, on nunuanai irui.
On mes Judas on inai priest aiwabis a tafaror goa kaifarotis asi babadis auris, osi mat sitikakafun mamaba Iesu osi auris itkaseirai mes.
Osi on siyasisir ato siyaumatanai agim sitibaiyanai mes.
Judas on bobo aurin ibasitai ato ibosuruf eta inunuen menan wera obin itgaturai nan bubuniai Iesu osi auris itkaseirai mes.
Ra inat Forag wabin Rafi Sarar Men Fio Yist Auman aurin ato on ra nan min foro sheep bobous on sitasububunuen Baisobon an bayu sitam mes.
Iesu on Peter a John rus atonio duraiai iyaubaiyates ato iyafares iyau, “Omi wonan Baisobon an Bayu on ot aurit wonbotitiwag tanam.”
Osi sitetemai siyau, “Om menan nan egogoi bayu wanbotitiwag mes i?”
On iyafotes iyau, “Omi wonan mafam gagaminai wonar mom ato orot sareu kibub iyabar e’nat on arimon mat woninofoten. Omi on orot wonigibubunuai wonan ato on goa amonai inrurur
ato omi goa matuanin on wonawur wonau: ‘Baibebeotin on om aurim iyau, goa amonai efan menan nan on au baigibubunuotis mat Baisobon an bayu wanam i?’
On arimon goa ann weromin aiyetun nan efan gagamin sirereb sibotitiwag yen on iniyoboem ato omi bayu engon nan aurit wonbotitiwag.”
Osi sinai ato Iesu dura aifan i’yawures on engon sigaturen ato nan Baisobon an bayu sibotitiwag.
Wera inat ato Iesu an baiyoyobotis mat on kemai simair.
On osi auris iyau, “Yau agogoi kwakwan atonio Baisobon an bayu on mat tanam weie yau anikokosariu!
Yau awurem, Yau men arimon Baisobon an bayu tani ba anan men, on an ra God an Baiaiwab amonai on innat inidura bag.”
Namon Iesu viga ibo God aurin ikakaiu ato iyau, “Atonio viga wobo ato omi toum sanamui wonfasararam.
Awurem Yau men arimon atonio sareu wine antoman men, on an ra God an Baiaiwab innat weie Yau antoman men.”
Namon On rafi sarar ibo God aurin ikakaiu ato iyabaseseb ites iyau, “Nin on Yau usiu on omi aurim abitem, omi atonio bobo nanaba wonafour Yau wonnosiu.”
On eta kaitamomai bayu siyam isawar weie On viga ibo ites iyau, “Atonio viga on God an dura bobaibasit boboun on Yau au tarai nan inbosuruf, on omi engon tutufin aurim idebur.
“Baise woit! Orot iyafan Yau ekakaseiriu on mat nin kemai tamama!
Yabin God ibotitiwag nono Orot Natun arimon inarab baise komasin bag on orot aurin iyafan Yau ekakaseiriu on!”
Namon osi sibosuruf tous amosi sibitetem bonen orot iyafan osi sanasi on atonio bobo inafour.
Baigibubunuotis sanasi wat on gamo imatar osi sinonosin iyafan on gagamin bag osi engon amosi.
Iesu osi auris iyau, “Sabu men Jew yangan asi aiwabis on asi faiwar yen asi sabu auris, a sabu bainetewarotis on seyoyores, ‘Sabu tuturas.’
Baise omi aurim on eta men on nanaba on, ab omi sanamui iyafan gagamin on inikafakakai men ato bainetewarotin on iniyamai tuturan iniagires.
Orot iyafan on gagamin; orot emama mom bayu yam on o orot ato ebiagirai on i? Dura bag orot ato kemai imair emama on. Baise Yau omi sanamui on omi abiagirem.
“Yau auriu yawas wawanis simamatar on omi engon bisiwui woma;
Yau Tamau on baibad iteu aninetewar mes, on mes Yau au dura bobaibasit kaitamom on arimon omi aurim aniyamai.
Omi arimon au Baiaiwab amonai au kemai wonamair bayu wonam wonatom, a omi arimon mamageai wonamair Israel an dam engon auyotoat sasagis ruam on woninetewaris.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Simon, Simon! Om untatam! Afaguban on God ifefeyanai ibasit ato omi engon tutufin inrutobonim mes, omi on arimon ato masau bo’otin ba on sawareg ebobo ekukuseb sawareg wat on mabisi eyaya ato fefemis on mabisi eyaya.
Baise Simon, Yau aurim ababayoi am baitutum on men inafeu mes. Ato om Yau auriu unrutabir unnat men, ato taitaim unkufaiwaris asi baitutumai on sinfaskikin.”
Peter iyafotai iyau, “Bada, yau on abotitiwagiu isawar rut tanan fafatum goai tanar a yau arimon rut tanarab!”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Peter, Yau awurem om arimon ari wera ton nanaba unisosoufiu unau, yau on Orot on men asagobai, weie kokorerek inatou.”
Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis itetemis iyau, “On an werai Yau aiyafarem wo’gat on men agim an kukufet, kekes a amm kikiman wonboen mat wonan mes, ato omi sawar aifan wat auris on wogogoien i?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “Ambin.”
Iesu iyau, “Baise ari on, iyai iyafan aurin agim an kukufet o kwakwar aurin i’nen on inboai mat inan; iyai iyafan aurin seri ambin on usin an baitakwakwaren on inboai sabu fani auris intotobon ato agim inboai an seri intobon.
Yau awurem dura buk amonai sigayam siyau, ‘On bainauotis sibimakies on mat simakiai, Yau auriu on arimon innat inidura bag yabin dura aifan Yau auriu sigagayam on inat ebidura bag.”
Baigibubunuotis siyau, “Bada! Eite! Seri ruam atonio!” On iyafotes iyau, “Basit on fofonin!”
Iesu mafam gagamin ikirir inai, On ra fufur nanaba ifofour i’nan i’nat, ato On an baigibubunuotis mat sinai Olive Oyauai nan.
On inat on efanai igat ato iyawures iyau, “Omi wonbayoi on men arimon rutobon wonboai mes.”
Namon On ikirires kafakakai inai mabinai ato orot agim erereben enan an fofon ba ato nan sindan irou ibayoi.
On iyau, “Tamau, atonio bobo on Om am gogoiai on, men uniyameu atonio viga an baikokosar anboai mes. Baise men Yau au gogoiai, ab Om am gogoiai on inmatar.”
Anea safam emon irobotet isur aurin ato ikufaiwarai.
Iesu an usi baban on irat kwakwan ato wawaninai bag ibayoi, On magin usin abar i’gat on tara ba sifefeu igagaror isusur motobai.
On ibayoi isawar ato imisir men inai an baigibubunuotis igatures, osi asi yababan emon iyames sisuweigan siyenbubur.
On osi auris iyau, “Omi aibo mes woienbubur? Omi womisir wonbayoi on men arimon rutobon wonboai on.”
Iesu on dura nana ibikakafun ato Judas baigibubunuotin auyotoat sasagis ruam on tani on sabu kuayo ibonanawaiis sinat, on inat Iesu aurin ato rereban iyan.
Baise Iesu iyau, “Judas om ato rerebau eyayanin on ebiyamai Orot Natun on ubo On an ragit imasi eyayagai?”
Baigibubunuotis osi nan Iesu mat sitatawar on sit atonio bobo on inmatar, on mes sitetemai siyau, “Bada, wei seri wanboai mat wanigagam i?”
Ato osi sanasi orot tani on an seri ibo ato Priest Ainauin an agirotin tainan asumaiauai on iyasutin itutu.
Baise Iesu iyau, “Atonio bobo on eikirir!” On orot tainan ibotobon ato iyawasai.
Sabu iyabon sinat Iesu sitfatumai mes on priest aiwabis a tafaror goa kaifarotis asi babadis a sabu kawian on sinat Iesu sitfatumai mes, On imisir iyawures iyau, “Omi ami seri a ami sambeyan woboen wonat on sitau Yau on bainauotiu bait?
Yau on ra fufur omi mat nan tafaror goai ato omi men wogogoi nan wotfatumeu. Baise ari on omi ami wera inat ami gogoi aifan on wonafour, ato Afaguban ebinetewarim nan.”
Osi Iesu sifatumai ato sibo sinai Priest Ainauin an goai nan; ato Peter on nanenei nan osi ibigibubunues.
Wou yangan on nan furi amonai efan basunai bag nan wairaf siyasir ato Peter inai nan sabu mat simair wairaf iraranis.
Jeverei agirotin tani on Peter it nan wairaf iraranai, on totor aurin iyeit it ato iyau, “Atonio orot mat on Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani!”
Baise Peter isosouf iyau, “Jever, yau on orot on men meyan asagobai on!”
Wera men weromin ato orot tani Peter it isagobai ato iyau, “Om mat On an baigibubunuotin tani!” Baise Peter iyafotai iyau, “Orot, yau on ambin!”
Ato wera kaitamom nanaba isawar gibunai orot tani on dura nana ibikakafun i’yau, “Ot men taniyoi on, atonio orot on Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani, yabin on orot mat on Galilee emon!”
Baise Peter iyafotai iyau, “Orot, yau men asagob om aifan aurin on ebikakafun!” Peter on dura nana ibikakafun ato ra kaita kokorerek itou.
Bada irutabir totor wat iyeit Peter it, ato Peter inonot Bada an dura mamaba i’yau on, “Om arimon fom wera baitonin nanaba unisosoufiu unau, yau on orot on men asagobai weie kokorerek inatou.”
Peter igat au koun ato men sunub itou on.
Sabu iyabon Iesu sikakaifarai on sikoboai a siborarab.
Osi beber sibo Iesu matan siyous, ato sitetemai siyau, “Om yawurei tait! Iyafan irabim i?”
Ato osi dura komasis sigaraba maiau on aurin sikakafun.
Ra itom, Jew yangan asi sabu kawian, priest ainauis a baifafaro an baibebeotis on nan engon tutufin siruayo ato Iesu on sibo sigat osi Jew babadis Rurubinis on nasi itawar.
Osi siyau, “Om yawurei tait, Om min Keriso i?” On iyafotes iyau, “Yau ari dura ankakasonem on omi arimon men wonitutumeu on;
ato Yau omi anbitetemim on omi arimon men woniyafoteu on.
Baise ari ra on Orot Natun arimon God Faiwarin maiau an asumaiauai inamair.”
Osi engon tutufin siyau, “Om min God Natun i?” On iyafotes iyau, “Dura aifan ato wau on Yau nanaba.”
Ato osi siyau, “Ot men tagogoi sabu dura fani ba sinkasonet men! On dura aifan ibikakafun on Toun awan fonan ato tatam nono.”
Jew babadis kuayo engon tutufin simisir ato Iesu sibo sinat Pilate nanai itawar,
ato osi nan sibosuruf sibiubarai si’yau, “Orot atonio on dura fetag fetag ibikakafun wei ai sabu asi not engon ibikokomasen on ato wabo, On sabu iyawures men agim takes sinyein Caesar aurin a On Toun eyoyorai Keriso a Aiwab.”
Pilate On itetemai iyau, “Om min Jew yangan asi Aiwab i?” Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Om dura ato u’yau on nanaba.”
Namon Pilate on priest aiwabis a sabu kuayo auris iyau, “Atonio orot an komasin on men agaturai on animakiai.”
Baise osi on nana dura wawaninai sibikakafun si’yau, “On an baibebe ibiyamai on sabu Judea tafanam amonai on engon tutufin yas ibogagaien. Atonio bobo on Galilee nan ibosuruf ato ari atonio nin ba.”
Pilate atonio dura itatam ato On itetemis iyau, “Atonio Orot min Galilee emon i?”
Pilate gibui isagob Iesu on Galilee emon, ato Herod min on tafanam ibinetewarai, on mes on iyafarai inai Herod aurin, on an werai Herod min mat nan Jerusalem imama.
Herod on iyasisir kwakwan ato Iesu i’tai on yabin on duran itatam ato men ari igogoi magin ititai mes. Herod on igogoi Iesu bobo buburis fani itafour on ititai mes.
On mes Herod on Iesu aurin ra sigaraba maiau itetemai baise Iesu on men dura tani iyafotai on.
Priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on sitawar dura riribis komasis on Iesu aurin sikakafun siubarai.
Herod an wou yangan mat on Iesu sikoboai ato sigigimai; namon osi beber obin sibo Iesu siyotai ato siyafarai men imatabir inai Pilate aurin.
On wera kaitamomai on Herod a Pilate rus on ra kaita sinat situran; ainau osi rus on sibiragit bonen.
Pilate on priest aiwabis, bainetewarotis, a sabu osi iyores siruayo
ato iyawures iyau, “Omi atonio Orot auriu wobo wonat ato omi wau On bobo fetag efofour sabu asi not ebikokomasen. Ari omi namui abitetemai ato omi ubar wobitai aurin on, ato On an komasin on men agaturai on.
Herod mat On an komasin men igaturai, on aurin ato ot aurit iyafarai men imatabir. Atonio Orot on men abi bobo komasin ifour on tani rabobai.
On mes wou yangan on anawures sinrab sinaswabirai mom ato an yatetai ingat. (Ra fufur Baisobon an Forag an werai Pilate on orot tani fafatum goai imama on i’yatetai i’gat weines.)

Sabu kuayo gagamin on siyoku siyau, “Yasubun! Barabbas on eyatetai egat weinei!”
(Barabbas on sibo fafatum goai siwan imama yabin sabu mafam gagamin amonai baiyonen sibimatarai on amosi irui mat on bobo amonai on orot siyasubun.)
Pilate on igogoi Iesu ityatetai itgat, on mes on sabu kuayo auris iyau men.
Baise osi siyoku men siyau, “Nabai ekubarai! Nabai ekubarai!”
Pilate wera baitonin ba auris iyau men, “Baise atonio Orot on abi bobo komasin ifour i?” On an komasin on men tani agaturai on, ato On abi bobo komasin ifour on fasinai inarab! Yau on wou yangan anawures sinaswabirai mom ato sinyatetai ingat.”
Baise osi nana fonas aumiet bag siyoku si’yau on Iesu nabai itkubarai mes, ato au kanfoun on, asi gogoi aifan aurin si’yau on siyamai imatar.
On mes osi asi gogoi aifan Pilate aurin sibifefeyanai on ibasitai.
Osi asi gogoi orot aurin si’yau on iyatetai igat weines, ato sibiyonen orot siyasubun aurin on fafatum goai siwan imama, osi asi gogoi nanaba on mes on Iesu ibo osi imasi iyagai.
Wou yangan Iesu sibonanawai sinai, osi etai si’nan ato orot wabin Simon, an tafanam on Cyrene, on orot on tafanam tani emon i’nat au mafam gagamin igeg on mat sinofoten. Osi on orot sifatumai ato nab sibo abaranai siyagai ato Iesu ibaisin nab iyabar kounai itawar.
Sabu kuayo gagamin on, On sibigibubunuai; osi sabu sanasi on jever fani Iesu aurin on sitotou sitararag.
Iesu osi auris irutabir ato iyau, “Jerusalem jever! Omi men Yau auriu wonatou mes, baise omi toum aurim a nanatum auris wonatou.
Yabin ra enat nono sabu arimon sinau, ‘Yasisir gagamin maiau osi jever auris osi iyabon a’ris on, osi men fifirig sebitu on a osi iyabon fifirig men sebisus on!’
On an werai sabu arimon oyau auris sinau, ‘Wei tefaii wonafeu!’ Ato oyau gugudis auris sinau, ‘Wofeu woyatatani!’
“Wengar ato matain yen nan on sabu atonio osi bobo sefofour; ato wengar inkikimeu on arimon bobo aifan inmatar.”
Osi orot ruam mat siboes, osi rus on yakeotis, osi mat siboes sigat Iesu mat sitirabobis mes.
Osi sinat efan wabin seyoyorai, “Tekwakwan An Efan,” on nan Iesu nabai sikubarai, ato sabu yakeotis ruam min mat nan sikubares, orot tani on Iesu an asumaiauai a orot tani on an asugagafai.
Iesu iyau, “Tamau osi sabu einotbures! Osi on men sisagob atonio bobo aifan sefofour on.” Osi asi kik iyau nanaba on asi barom siyo nan sitsagob orot iyafan on Iesu an beber itboai.
Sabu on nan sitawar siruruai ato Jew yangan asi bainetewarotis on Iesu sikoboai siyau: “On sabu fani ibiyawasis; ato On Keriso God an Rurubinin mes on Toun eiyawasai tait!”
Wou yangan mat on Iesu sikoboai: Osi On aurin sinat ato sareu wine riribin sitai ittoman mes,
ato siyau, “Om Jew yangan asi Aiwab mes on, Toum eiyawasim tait!”
On unin tefanai nan wengar sibo sigayam siyau, “Atonio Orot on Jew yangan asi Aiwab.”
Orot yakeotin tani on nabai iroror on dura komasis Iesu aurin iyau: “Om min Keriso i? Om Toum eiyawasim ato wei mat uniyawasi!”
Orot yakeotin tani on baise turan on igam iyawur iyau, “Om God men ebeberuai? Om ato baimaki kaitamom uboai on nanaba ibo.
Baise ot aurit on basit taboai yabin ot bobo komasis tafour on fasinai; baise on Orot on men bobo komasin tani ifour on.”
Ato on Iesu aurin iyau, “Iesu, Om unnat unbiAiwab an rai on yau unnosiu!”
Iesu on aurin iyau, “Yau awurem dura bag, om on ari Yau rut safamai tanar.”
Wera aiyet nanaba ato wera matan min igurube ato tafanam engon tutufin iwouman inai wera baitonin nanaba isawar;
ato beber nan tafaror goa amonai iroror on isafef ruam simatar tefanai isur inai babanai igat.
Iesu fonan aumiet bag iyor iyau, “Tamau, Yau ayubiu on Om imamui ayeyeinin!” On atonio dura iyau ato irabob.
Wou yangan asi orot gagamin on matanai bobo it aifan imatar ato on God ifain iyau, “Dura bag On Orot obin!”
Sabu nan siruayo bobo aifan nan imamatar on siruruai, osi on bobo imatar matasi si’tai on siyababan kwakwan dogaras sirou auman sinai asi au go.
Sabu osi iyabon Iesu sisasagobai tiwag a jever fani mat on Galilee emon nan sigibubunuai sinat on nanenei nan sitawar bobo engon tutufin simamatar on siruruai.
Orot tani imama on wabin min Joseph, on orot on Jew yangan asi mafam gagamin wabin Arimathea emon, Judea tafanamai nan. On orot obin a on baifafaro dura engon auris ibifonabo tiwag, on orot on God an Baiaiwab enat aurin on imomousin. On orot on Jew asi babadis Rurubinin on tani, baise osi asi bainonot aifan sibiyamai Iesu asubunin aurin on men ibasitai on.
<range>
On orot inai Pilate nanai itawar ato Iesu usin boin aurin on ifefeyanai.
Namon on Iesu usin ibo iyeirai ato beber kakakaiinai ikikiman ato rasi dogu on agim wawanin on ainau isar i’yen ato men orot jever tani nan siyeirai on.
On ra min friday ato Sabat ra on kafakakai mom itbosuruf.
Jever osi Galilee emon Iesu sigibubunuai sinat on Joseph mat sinai ato sit mamaba Iesu usin iyein.
Namon osi sinai au go ato fio yanden ninibin a rura momon on sibotitiwag usin aurin. Baifafaro iyau nanaba, Sabat an ra on mes siyarir.
Sunday fomenei ra gugubanai nan jever asi fio yanden ninibin on sibotitiwag ato auman sibo sinai au rasi.
Osi agim sit rasi awan emon on sifiruruai inai mabinai i’yen,
on mes osi rasi dogu amonai sirui; baise osi Bada Iesu usin on men sigaturai on.
Osi nan sitawar sibinonotis on aifan imatar, ato ra kaita orot ruam asi beber kudidiris auman nan bisisi sitawar.
Jever on siber kwakwan ato osi sikwafir sisur motobai ato orot ruam on jever auris siyau, “Omi aibo mes Orot yawasin aurin on wonat nin sabu rabobis asi efanai wonunuen i?
On men nin; On God rabob emon ibobaimisirai men. Wononosin, omi Galilee nan ato On mamaba iyawurem:
‘Orot Natun on arimon sabu bokomasotis imasi sinyagai nabai sinkubarai, ato ra baitoninai on arimon inmisir men.’”
Namon jever On an dura on sinos,
ato osi rasi dogu emon sinai au go, ato atonio osi bobo auris on baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagin kaita a sabu fani engon mat nan on sikasones.
Osi jever on Mary Magdalene, Joanna, a Mary James ayon; osi on jever fani mat on atonio osi bobo auris on Iesu an baiyoyobotis on sikasones.
Baise Iesu an baiyoyobotis on sinos osi jever asi dura sibikakafun on yabis ambin, ato osi men situtumes on.
Baise Peter imisir ato iyayai inai au rasi doguai nan; on ikwafir ato Iesu sibikikimanai, On an beber wat si’yen iten, ab on men aifan tani it on. Namon on imatabir men inai au go ato bobo aifan imamatar aurin on iduduran.
On wera kaitamomai Iesu an baigibubunuotis ruam on mafam wabin Emmaus on aurin on Jerusalem emon simisir sibib si’nan, on eta an weromin on kilomita auyotoat sasagin kaita nanaba,
ato osi tous wat on ato bobo aifan imamatar aurin on sikakafun bonen si’nan.
Osi atonio bobo aurin on sikakafunai si’nan ato Iesu Toun on osi kousi emon auris itawadudun ato mat sibib si’nan;
osi On sit, baise osi sit on men sinabunagai on Iesu.
Iesu osi auris iyau, “Omi aifan aurin on rum woidudur bonen wobib wonan i?” Osi magis on yababan auman ato nanaba sitawar.
Orot tani wabin Cleopas on itetemai iyau, “Om nanawan orot ekesim mom Jerusalem amonai on ato ra ruamom amonai bobo aifan simamatar on men usagob i?”
On itetemis iyau, “On min abi bobo on i?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “Bobo ato Iesu Nazareth emon aurin imamatar on. Atonio Orot on aubairuruotin ato On bobo faiwaris ifofour a dura faiwaris ibikakafun on iyoboei God On aurin on idura bag, mat sabu engon tutufin On aurin on sidura bag.
Wei ai priest aiwabis a bainetewarotis on sibo Rome gawan imanai siyagai, igurubabanai ato sikubarai.
Ato wei waitutumai On arimon Israel yangan itrufanis mes! Ato dura tani on, atonio bobo imamatar on ari ra ton nanaba isawar.
Wei ai kuayo amonai jever fani siyamei on waiduduran kwakwan; osi fomenei ra gugubanai nan sinai au rasi doguai nan,
baise On usin on men sigaturai. Osi simatabir men siyau, osi anea sites ato osi siyawures On on yawasin.
Sabu fani wei ai kuayo emon on sinai au rasi doguai nan, ato sigaturai jever dura aifan si’yau on dura bag, baise On men sit.”
Namon Iesu osi auris iyau, “Omi ojim bag, omi men wobitutum ato bobo engon tutufin auris mamaba aubairuruotis sibikakafun on!
Keriso on arimon atonio osi bobo auris inikokosarai weie an faiwar amonai inar.”
Ato Iesu on osi auris idudur mamaba buk amonai engon On Toun aurin sigagayam on, On ainau Moses an buk amonai sigayam on nan ibosuruf ato inat aubairuruotis engon sigagayam on auris igat.
Osi sinat on mafam aurin sibiufin ato Iesu iyamai on sitau On totor wat enan bait;
baise osi sifefeyanai siyau, “Om nin mat tanama; wera inai esosofafir ato awa efofom.” On mes On inai mat nan sima.
On kemai imair osi mat bayu am mes ato On rafi sarar ibo ato imomoginai; namon On rafi sarar iyabaseb ato ites.
Namon osi matas siruseren ato sit sinabunagai, baise osi matasi emon isiwan.
Osi tous wat auris siyau bonen, “Iesu etai nan aurit dura ibikakafun an tatamin on wairaf ba nunuati i’yaras, On mamaba ato buk amonai sigayam an yabin bag ikakason an tatamin on iyobin bag.”
Osi ra kaita simisir ato simatabir men sinai au Jerusalem, osi nan baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagin kaita sigatures, sabu fani mat nan kaita siruayo simama,
ato osi orot ruam auris si’yau, “Dura bag Bada imisir men! On Simon aurin irobotet!”
Orot ruam bobo aifan auris etai nan imamatar on auris sidudur, a mamaba rafi sarar iyabaseb weie osi nan Bada sit sinabunagai on engon sikasones.
Osi orot ruam on nana dura sikakasones ato ra kaita Bada Toun on osi sanasi itawar ato auris iyau, “Tuf aurim inama.”
Osi on siber kwakwan, sinos on dau sit bait.
Baise On osi auris iyau, “Omi aibo mes wober i? Omi bobo aifan toum matamui woitai on mamaba mes wobiyoi!”
Omi imau a auu woiten ato Yau woiteu, Yau Tou on dura bag Orot maiau. Omi wobotoboniu ato wonsagob, Yau on er biou a au rarik auman ato dau on men er bion a an rarik auman on.”
On atonio dura iyau ato iman a ann iyoboes sit.
Osi on nana men sibitutum, osi on sibiyasisir kwakwan a sibiduduran; on mes On itetemis iyau, “Omi aurim bayu aifan wat yen on tanam i?”
Osi iyan tatab turin wat on sibo sitai,
On osi matasi nan iyan ibo iyan.
Namon On auris iyau, “Atonio osi bobo auris on Yau ainau bisimui amama on nan on awurem nono: Ato aifan engon tutufin ainau auriu Moses an Baifafaro dura an buk amonai sigagayam, aubairuruotis asi buk amonai sigagayam a buk Psalm amonai sigagayamen on inat idura bag.”
