Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Yau arimon rafi sarar anboai sosof ramoai anitakokous anbibitai on; on orot min on.” On mes On rafi sarar turin ibo ramoai iwan nan sosofai itakokous ato Judas, Simon Iscariot natun itai.
Judas rafi sarar ibo mom Afaguban on nunuanai irui. Iesu on aurin iyau, “Om bobo aifan egogoi uniyamai mes on sasasan wat unafour!”
Sabu ato nan kemai simair simama on men sisagob Iesu on aibo mes atonio dura on orot aurin ikakafun.
Judas on baibad sitai agim an kukufet auman on ikakaifarai ato baigibubunuotis fani sinos on Iesu iyawur itan asi gogoi bayu aifan on ittobon Forag aurin o Judas on rafi sarar aifan tani itboai sabu kokoianis itites mes.
Judas rafi sarar turin ibo ato ra kaita igat inai. On min fom amonai nan.
Judas igat inai gibunai, Iesu iyau, “Ari on Orot Natun Wabin duran gagamin on irerebai, ibo egat sabu sinitai; Orot Natun emon on God Wabin duran gagamin on ari rerebai ibo egat sabu sinitai.
Ato Orot Natun emon on God Wabin duran gagamin inboai ingat sabu sinitai on, ato God Toun on arimon Orot Natun Wabin duran gagamin inboai ingat ato On arimon ra kaita inafour.
Yau nanatu, Yau arimon wera dibon wat on omi mat tanama. Omi arimon Yau wonnueniu; baise Yau ari dura aifan awurem on nanaba on Jew yangan awures nono, ‘Yau a’nan nan on omi men fofonim wonan.’
Ato ari on baifafaro dura boboun on abitem: omi toum woninuaboim bonen. Ato Yau abinuaboim ba on, on mes omi toum woninuaboim bonen.
Omi toum woninuaboim bonen on sabu engon tutufin arimon sinsagob omi on Yau au baigibubunuotim.”
Simon Peter on Iesu itetemai iyau, “Bada, Om on menan nan enan i?” Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Yau menan anan on om men fofonim Yau unigibubunueu on; baise om arimon gibui weie Yau unigibubunueu.”
Peter itetemai iyau, “Bada, mamaba mes yau ari bag on men anigibubunuem on i? Yau abotitiwagiu nono Om aurim anarab!”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Om min dura bag ubotitiwagim Yau auriu unarab i? Yau awurem dura bag: om arimon ra ton unisosoufiu unau, yau On Orot on men asagobai weie kokorerek inatou.”
Iesu iyawures iyau, “Omi men woniyababan a men nunuam sinkomas mes, omi on God wonitutumai a Yau mat wonitutumeu.
Efan sigaraba maiau Tamau an goai sen ato Yau a’nan omi ami efan anbotitiwagen weinem. Atonio on men dura bag mes on, Yau dura men atawurem on.
Ato Yau anan efan omi aurim anbotitiwag on, Yau arimon anmatabir men Tou anboem tanan onai on Yau menan amama on nan wonama.
Omi wosagob eta ato inai on efanai i’gat on nan a’nan.”
Thomas on Iesu aurin iyau, “Bada, wei men wasagob Om menan nan enan; ato wei eta mamaba wansagob ato nan wanan?”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Yau on eta, Yau on dura maiauin, a Yau on yawas; men iyafan tani inan Tamau aurin, ab Yau emon weie.”
On iyawures iyau, “Omi ari on Yau wosagobiu ato omi on Tamau mat wonsagobai; ato ari on omi On wosagobai a omi On matamui woit.”
Philip on Iesu aurin iyau, “Bada, wei Tamam men wait on, eiyoboei wanitai, on wat on wagogoi.”
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Philip, wera weromin maiau Yau omi engon tutufin mat tama; baise om men usagobiu? Iyai iyafan matanai Yau iteu on, on min Tamau it. Om aibo mes uyau, ‘Tamam eiyoboei wanitai i?’
Philip om men ebitutumeu Yau ba min Tamau ato Tamau ba min Yau?” Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau, “Dura ato aikakafun on men Yau emon inat on. Tamau ato Yau amoui emama, On Toun an bobo ebobo.
Omi Yau wonitutumeu ato aikakafun au, Yau on Tamau amonai ato Tamau on Yau amoui. Ambin on, omi wobitutumeu yabin Yau on bobo buburis afofour on mes.
Yau awurem dura bag: iyai iyafan Yau ebitutumeu on ato bobo afofour on nanaba inafour—dura bag on arimon bobo gagamis bag inafour yabin Yau a’nan Tamau aurin.
Ato om Yau Wabiui unbifefeyan on arimon anafour onai Tamau an Itin on Natun emon iniyoboes sinitai.
Om Yau Wabiui aifan mes unbifefeyan on arimon aurim anafour.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi Yau wonbinuaboiu on omi arimon au dura aurin wonifonabo.
Yau arimon Tamau anifefeyanai ato On arimon Baibaisotin tani initem, On arimon wantoan bisimui inama.
On min Ayu, On God an dura maiauin ibo egat. Sabu tafanamai on men fofonin sitboai yabin osi On men sit a osi On men sisagobai. Baise omi On wosagobai yabin On omi amomui emama ato On arimon omi amomui inama.
“Yau on anan ato arimon men anikirirem ekesim gagan ba wonama; Yau arimon anmatabir men aurim annat.
Wera dibon wat on sabu tafanamai on arimon men siniteu baise omi on arimon woniteu, yabin Yau amama on mes omi wonama.
Ra innat on, omi arimon wonsagob Yau ba min Tamau ato omi ba min Yau ato Yau ba min omi.
“Iyai iyafan Yau au baifafaro dura eboai ato on aurin ebifonabo on, on orot jever on Yau ebinuaboiu. Yau Tamau arimon on ininuaboai; on iyafan Yau ebinuaboiu on; Yau mat arimon on aninuaboai a Yau Tou on rerebai anboeu angat aniyoboai.”
Judas (men Judas iscariot on) on iyau, “Bada, mamaba mes wei auri wat on Toum rerebai unboem ungat uniyoboei wanitem ato sabu tafanamai on men sinitem i?”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Iyai iyafan Yau ebinuaboiu on arimon au baibebe aurin inifonabo. Yau Tamau on arimon ininuaboai, ato Yau a Tamau rui on arimon wannat ato on mat wanama.
Iyai iyafan Yau men ebinuaboiu on men au baibebe aurin ebifonabo on. Omi baibebe ato wotatam on men Yau noau on, baise Tamau emon enat, On Yau ibiyafareu on.
“Yau nin mat tamama nan on atonio dura on awurem.
Baibaisotin, Ayu Kakafotin, On Tamau arimon Yau Wabiui on iniyafarai on bobo engon tutufin auris on inibebeyim a bobo engon tutufin auris abikakafun on iniyamem wonnoskikin.
“Tuf on omi aurim abikirir; Yau Tou au tuf on abitem. Yau men abitem ato tafanamai sabu sefofour ba. Omi men woniyababan a nunuam men sinkomas mes; omi men wonaber mes.
Omi Yau au dura abikakafun on wotatam nono, ‘Yau on anan baise arimon anmatabir men annat omi aurim.’ Omi Yau woninuaboiu on, omi wotiyasisir Yau on anan Tamau aurin; On on gagamin bag men Yau ba.
Yau ari atonio dura engon tutufin awurem weie bobo inmatar onai on bobo inmamatar on, omi arimon wonitutum au dura on dura maiauin.
Yau men dura weromin mat tanikakafun mes, yabin atonio tafanam an bainetewarotin on enat. On an faiwar Yau auriu on ambin bag,
baise sabu tafanamai sinsagob on Yau Tamau ainuaboai; on fasinai On an dura aifan engon iyawureu on afofour. “Omi womisir atonio efan on tanikirir tanan.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Yau Tou on wengar wine maiauin bag, ato Tamau on masau bo’otin.
Yau fafameu fani uwas men sou on yaburutoben, a fafameu fani uwas men sou tiwag on yasutuenen a ebubunagen onai osi arimon rererebis wat sinen a uwas sigaraba sinoubibiro.
Yau au baibebe dura abitem nan on omi wobubunagim nono.
Omi nana Yau usiui wonikaita wonama ato Yau arimon omi usimui anikaita anama. Famen toun wat on men fofonin uwan inou; famen on wengarai inen on arimon uwam inou. On eta kaitamomai omi nana usiui wonmama on arimon uwam sinou.
“Yau on wengar wine, ato omi on fafamen. Iyai iyafan Yau usiui inama a Yau on usinai anama on arimon uwan sigaraba inoubibiro; baise on Yau inikirireu on, on men bobo aifan tani inafour on.
Iyai iyafan men Yau usiui inama on ato wengar famen ba on sinreben ingat nan inkimeu; osi wengar fafames nanaba on sinruayois ato wairafai sinrebenen nan sinaraten.
Omi on Yau usiui wonama a Yau au dura on ari usimui inama on, omi ami gogoi aifan auriu wonbifefeyan on arimon wonboai.
Omi uwam si’nou nan on Tamau Wabin duran gagamin on wonboai wongat; ato on etaiai on omi wonnat Yau au baigibubunuotim wonmatar.
Yau on omi ainuaboim ato Tamau omi ibinuaboiu ba; omi on Yau au nuabo amonai wonama.
Omi Yau au dura aurin wonifonabo on omi arimon au nuabo amonai wonama, ato Yau Tamau an dura aurin abifonabo ba, a On an nuabo amonai amama ba.
“Yau on atonio osi bobo auris awurem onai Yau au yasisir kaitamom on wonboai ato omi ami yasisir on arimon inarat awan inbonu inkadedebur.
Yau au baifafaro dura on atonio: omi tuturam mat woninuabo bonen ato Yau abinuaboim ba.
Orot iyafan tuturan auris inarab on ebiyoboet on an nuabo tuturan auris on gagamin bag yen.
Ato omi on Yau tuturau, omi bobo ato awurem on nanaba wonfofour on.
Yau men arimon gibui anyorem agirotim men yabin agirotin on men isagob an bada on abi bobo ebobo. Baise Yau ayoyorem tuturau yabin Yau dura Tamau emon a’tatam on engon tutufin akasonem.
Omi on men Yau worubineu on; Yau on omi arubinem a bobo aitem wongat uwam sigaraba sinoubibiro mes, on uwam on arimon nana inen au wantoan. Ato omi mamaba Yau Wabiui nan Tamau aurin wonbifefeyan yabin omi Yau au baigibubunuotim on mes, on arimon initem.
Atonio on Yau au baifafaro dura on awurem: omi tuturam mat woninuabo bonen.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Sabu tafanamai omi sinbisisiweiim on, omi asir wonnos mom ainau on Yau sisisiweiiu.
Omi atonio tafanam itbinoanim on, ato sabu tafanamai on omi sitinuaboim sitboem osi itinoanis. Baise Yau atonio tafanam emon on arubinem ato omi on men tafanam ebinoanai on; on fasinai sabu tafanamai on omi sebiragitem.
Yau dura aifan awurem on wonnonosin: ‘Agirotin on men gagamin bag on an bada aurin.’ Osi Yau baikokosar sinbibiteu on, osi arimon omi mat baikokosar sinitem; ato osi Yau au baibebe aurin sinbifonabo on, osi arimon omi mat ami baibebe aurin sinifonabo.
Baise osi arimon atonio osi bobo engon tutufin on omi aurim sinafour yabin omi on Yau ebinoaniu on mes; yabin osi on men sisagobai On Iyafan on Yau iyafareu.
Yau men atnat osi auris dura maiauin atikakafun on, osi men asi bokomas aurin sitnos on nana yen on; baise ari on osi asi bokomas aurin on men siniyoi on.
Iyai iyafan Yau ebisisiweiiu on, Tamau mat ebisisiweiai.
Yau on bobo buburis osi sanasi afofour on men iyafan tani nin ifofour ba, ato Yau osi bobo men atfofour on, osi men asi bokomas aurin sitnos on nana yen, baise osi matasi siteu bobo afouren, ab osi nana Yau Tamau rui sebiragitei.
Baise atonio bobo imatar onai ato Baifafaro dura sigagayam on itnat itidura bag: Atonio nanaba sigayam siyau, ‘Osi on men er yabinai Yau sebiragiteu on.’
“Baibaisotin on arimon innat—On min Ayu maiauin, On God an dura maiauin on rerebai inboai ingat ato On min Tamau emon innat. Yau arimon Tamau emon on aurim aniyafarai ato omi aurim inikakafun.
Ato omi mat on Yau auriu wonikakafun yabin anai bag omi on Yau mat.
“Yau atonio osi dura awurem onai omi ami baitutum on men inafeu mes.
Osi arimon bayoi goa emon sinrukouim wongat. Ato wera innat on iyafan inasubunuem on innos on, atonio bobo efofour on God ebiagirai.
Sabu atonio osi bobo on arimon aurim sinafour yabin osi men sisagob menan on Tamau o menan on Yau.
Baise Yau atonio dura awurem onai wera innat osi atonio bobo sinfofour on, omi arimon wonnos Yau dura mamaba awurem on.” Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Anai bag Yau mat tamama nenei on men atonio osi bobo auris akasonem on.
Baise ari on Yau a’nan ato Orot Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on aurin, ato omi men iyafan tani itetemiu iyau, ‘Yau on menan nan anan?’
Ato ari ato dura awurem on, omi nunuam on sebiyababan.
Baise Yau awurem dura bag: Omi ami obin aurin on Yau a’nan yabin Yau men annanan on, Baibaisotin on men arimon innat omi aurim on. Baise Yau annanan on arimon On aniyafarai innat aurim.
Ato On innanat on, sabu tafanamai on iniyoboes sinsagob bokomas an yabin on mamaba, a yawas totorin an yabin on mamaba a God an baigurubaban an yabin on mamaba.
Ayu arimon iniyoboes bokomas an yabin on mamaba yabin osi on men Yau sebitutumeu on,
Ayu arimon iniyoboes yawas totorin an yabin on mamaba yabin Yau on anan Tamau aurin ato omi arimon men woniteu men;
Ayu on arimon iniyoboem baigurubaban an yabin on mamaba yabin atonio tafanam an bainetewarotin on sigurubabanai nono.
“Yau auriu on dura sigaraba sen aurim anikakafun baise omi aurim on arimon men fofonin wonboai on.
Baise Ayu Kakafotin maiauin innanat on, On God an dura maiauin on rerebai inboai ingat, On ininetewarim wonan dura maiauin engon wonsagob. On arimon men Toun an baibadai nan dura inikakafun on, baise On dura aifan itatam on nanaba inikakafun a bobo aifan arimon senat aurin on inkasonem.
On arimon omi iniyoboem Yau on God ba yabin Yau dura aifan abikakafun on inboboai ato omi inkakasonem.
Bobo engon Tamau bisinai sen on Yau ebinoaniu; on fasinai Yau aikakafun au, Yau bobo aifan ato Ayu Yau abitai on wat on inboai ato omi inkasonem.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Wera dibon wat on omi arimon men woniteu ato wera men weromin gibunai on omi arimon woniteu men.”
On an baigibubunuotis fani on tous wat sanasi sibitetem bonen si’yau, “Atonio dura an yabin on abifan i? On iyawuret wera dibon wat on men tanitai, ato wera men weromin gibunai on tanitai; a mat On iyau, ‘Yabin Yau on anan Tamau aurin.’
Osi sitetem siyau, “Atonio dura ‘wera dibon wat’ on an yabin on abifan i? Ot men tasagob On abi dura ebikakafun!”
Iesu isagob osi sigogoi sititetemai mes, on mes On osi auris iyau, “Yau aikakafun au, ‘Wera dibon wat on omi arimon men woniteu ato wera men weromin gibunai on omi arimon woniteu.’ Atonio dura aurin on omi toum sanamui wobitetem bonen i?
Yau awurem dura bag: Omi arimon wonatou woniyababan baise tafanamai sabu on arimon siniyasisir; ato omi arimon woniyababan baise omi ami yababan inikitabirai on yasisir inmatar.
Jever an wera idib toub aurin on ebiyababan yabin on an baikokosar an wera on inat baise fifi irat an werai on an baikokosar aurin on ebinosfotai yabin on ebiyasisir fifi irat tafanamai on mes.
On eta kaitamom nanaba on omi aurim: omi ari on woniyababan baise Yau arimon anitem men, ato omi nunuam on arimon yasisir wat inibonuem, atonio yasisir on men iyafan tani arimon omi emon inboai inan on.
“Ra innat ingat on omi men arimon sawar tani aurin on Yau wonifefeyaniu mes. Yau awurem dura bag: omi Yau Wabiui nan Tamau aurin wonbifefeyan on arimon initem.
Ainau bag on men aifan tani Yau Wabiui sawar tani aurin woifefeyan on; omi wonifefeyan ato wonboai, onai omi ami yasisir arimon inarat awan inbonu inkadedebur.”
Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Yau on dura kawenai nan atonio osi bobo auris on aurim abikakafun. Baise wera innat on Yau men arimon dura kawenai anikakafun on, ab Tamau aurin on Yau dura rerebai wat omi aurim anikakafun.
On ra innat on, omi Yau Wabiui on On aurin wonifefeyan; ato Yau men aikakafun au, omi weinem on Yau On aurin anifefeyanai,
yabin Yau Tamau Toun on omi inuaboim. On omi inuaboim yabin omi on Yau woinuaboiu a woitutumeu Yau on God emon anat.
Yau on Tamau emon anat, ato Yau anat au tafanam; ato ari on Yau tafanam abikirir ato anan Tamau aurin.”
Namon On an baigibubunuotis on aurin siyau, “Eite Om ari on dura rerebai wat ebikakafun, Om men dura kawenai nan ebikakafun on.
Wei ari wasagob Om on bobo engon tutufin usagob; Om men egogoi arimon iyafan tani initetemim on yabin sabu asi bainonot on engon usagob nono. Atonio etaiai on iyamai wei wabitutum Om on God emon unat.”
Iesu iyafotes iyau, “Omi ari weie wobitutum i?
Wera on enat ato on inat nono, ato omi arimon engon tutufin wontagege, omi kakaita kakaita arimon wonan toum ami goa auris, ato omi arimon Yau ekesiu wonikirireu. Baise Yau men arimon ekesiu wat on yabin Tamau on bisiwui.
Yau atonio dura awurem onai omi tufai wat Yau amoui wonikaita wonama. Sabu tafanamai on arimon siniyamem wonikokosarim. Baise omi wontawar wonfaskikin! Yau tafanam abomerubai nono!”
Iesu atonio dura iyau isawar gibunai On au safam itage ato iyau, “Tamau, wera inat nono Om am Itin ba on Natum unitai, onai Natum on On an Itin ba mamaba on sabu iniyoboes sinitai.
Yabin Om baibad Natum utai sabu engon tutufin auris onai Om sabu engon tutufin ubitai on yawas mama wantoanin itites.
Ato yawas mama wantoanin an yabin min atonio: sabu on Om sinsagobim, Om ekesim mom on God maiauin, a sabu on Iesu Keriso sinsagobai ato Om ubiyafarai on.
Yau on Om am Itin ba on rerebai abo agat au tafanam; Om bobo ato uteu abobo on aisawarai nono.
Tamau! Ari om namui atatawar on am Aiwab eiteu, Om am Aiwab kaitamom min on rut tafasararam nono weie tafanam ufourai.
“Yau on sabu ato tafanam emon ubiteu on afouris sinat Om sisagobim. Osi sabu min Om ebinoanim, ato osi sabu min Yau imaui uyagai. Osi sabu on Om am dura aurin sifonabo,
ato ari osi sabu on sisagob ato bobo engon tutufin ubiteu on Om emon sinat.
Om dura ubiteu on sabu engon tutufin akasones ato osi on dura sibo sibokikin; osi sisagob on dura bag Yau on Om bisimui emon anat, a osi sebitutum on Om Yau uyafareu.
“Yau osi auris ababayoi. Yau men sabu tafanamai auris ababayoi on baise sabu ato ubiteu on, yabin osi on Om ebinoanim.
Sabu engon tutufin ato Yau ebinoaniu on Om noam a sabu engon tutufin Om ebinoanim on Yau noau; ato Yau au Itin Om ba on sabu ato osi emon sibo sigat.
Ato ari on Yau a’nat Om aurim; Yau arimon men tafanamai anama on, baise osi sabu on arimon tafanamai sinama. Tamau Kakafotim! Om Wabim an faiwarai nan unnrufafares, faiwar ato Om ubiteu on, onai osi on kaitamom wat sinmatar, ato Om Yau rut tabikaita ba.
Yau osi sabu mat amama on, Om Wabim an faiwarai nan arufafares, faiwar ato Om ubiteu on. Yau arufafares ato men iyafan tani isiwan on, ab orot kaitamom on enan wairaf an efan komasinai inar, on ekesin mom on isiwan—onai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on innat inidura bag.
Ato Yau ari a’nat Om aurim ato Yau atonio osi dura tafanamai abikakafun onai osi Yau au yasisir gagamin bag on sinboai nunuasi sinyein inag awan inbonu inkadedebur.
Yau on Om am dura on aites ato sabu tafanamai on osi siragites yabin osi on men tafanam ebinoanis on ato Yau ba, Yau on men tafanam ebinoanai on.
Yau men abifefeyanim osi tafanam emon unboseiris mes on, baise Yau abifefeyanim ato Ayu Komasin emon on unrufafares.
Ato Yau ba, Yau on men tafanam ebinoanai on, osi men tafanam ebinoanai on.
Om am dura maiauinai nan ebotitiwagis Toum aurim ekutetis; Om am dura on dura maiauin.
Yau on osi aiyafares sigat au tafanam, ato Om Yau ubiyafareu au tafanam ba.
Osi fasisi emon on Yau Om aurim Tou akutetiu; onai osi mat on dura maiauinai wat Om aurim on tous sinkutetis.
“Yau men atonio osi sabu Yau bisiwui wat auris ababayoi on, baise Yau ababayoi ato osi sabu mat auris iyabon Yau auriu on dura sinkurereb a osi sabu dura aurin sinbitutum on.
Yau ababayoi osi engon tutufin on sinnat kaitamom wat sinmatar. Tamau! Yau ababayoi osi sabu engon tutufin on sinnat rut amoti kaitamom sinmatar ato Yau Om amomui ba a Om Yau amoui. Yau ababayoi osi kaitamom wat sinmatar onai sabu tafanamai sinitutum on Om Yau uyafareu.
Om am Aiwab ubiteu on kaitamom min on aites onai osi kaitamom wat sitmatar ato Om Yau rut tabikaita ba:
Yau on osi amosi ato Om on Yau amoui onai osi initutufin kaitamom sinmatar ato sabu tafanamai sinsagob on Om Yau uiyafareu a Om osi uinuabois ato Yau ubinuaboiu ba.
“Tamau! Osi sabu on Yau uteu, ato Yau menan nan on agogoi osi sabu mat on nan Yau bisiwui onai osi sabu on Yau au Aiwab sinitai, au Aiwab ato Om ubiteu on; yabin Om Yau uinuaboiu weie tafanam ufourai.
Tamau am yawas totorin bag! Sabu tafanamai on Om men sisagobim baise Yau on Om asagobim a atonio osi sabu sisagob on Om Yau uiyafareu.
Yau Om Wabim on abo agat atonio osi sabu auris sisagob, ato Yau arimon on bobo on nana anafour Wabim anboai angat onai Om am nuabo Yau auriu yen on osi mat amosi inen a Yau mat on osi amosi anama.”
Iesu atonio bayoi iyamai isawar gibunai, On an baigibubunuotis mat sinai Kidron sareu esusur on sirabon rebanai nan. On efanai nan on masau nan i’yen, ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on masauai nan sirui.
Judas, kaseirotin on isagob efan menan nan, yabin wera sigaraba maiau Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on nan siruruayo.
On mes Judas on Rome yangan asi wou yangan asi kuayo a tafaror goa an kaifarotis on iboes sinat nan masauai sirui. Osi sabu on priest aiwabis a Pharisee yangan on siyafares; osi on asi baigagam sawar, ramef a tafa on siboen auman sinat.
Iesu on isagob bobo engon tutufin on arimon On aurin sinmatar, on mes On kafakakai wat auris itawadudun ato itetemis iyau, “Omi iyafan wonunuen i?”
Osi siyafotai siyau, “Iesu Nazareth emon.” On iyafotes iyau, “Yau min atonio.” Judas kaseirotin min mat nan sitatawar.
Iesu iyawures iyau, “Yau min atonio, ato osi augib simatabir ato motobai sifeu.
Iesu itetemis men iyau, “Omi iyafan wonunuen i?” Osi siyau, “Iesu Nazareth emon.”
Iesu iyau, “Yau min ainau awurem nono, Yau min atonio. Omi Yau wonnunueniu mes on ato, atonio osi sabu fani on wonikirires sinan.”
(On atonio dura iyau onai dura aifan ainau i’yau ibikakafun on itnat itidura bag: “Tamau, sabu ato ubiteu on men meyan tani aisiwanai on.”)
Simon Peter on seri i’botan, on irou ato Priest Ainauin an agirotin tainan asumaiauai nan iyasutin itutu. On agirotin wabin min Malchus.
Iesu on Peter aurin iyau, “Om am seri ebo an efanai eyein men! Om enonosin Yau Tamau baikokosar an viga ibiteu on men fofonin antoman i?”
Namon wou yangan asi kuayo, asi bainetewarotin mat a Jew yangan asi kaifarotis mat on Iesu sifatumai ato siyoustatanai,
ato ainau sibo sinai Annas aurin. On orot min Caiaphas rawan orot ato on kwanda amonai on Caiaphas min Priest Ainauin imama.
Caiaphas min on Jew babadis iyawures on, iyobin orot kaitamom on itarab sabu engon tutufin auris.
Simon Peter a baigibubunuotin tani rus on Iesu sibigibubunuai sinai. Priest Ainauin on atonio baigibubunuotin tani on isagobai tiwag on mes on Iesu mat sirui Priest Ainauin an goa kounai nan,
ato Peter on kounai nan furi awanai itatawar. Namon baigibubunuotin tani imatabir men igat inai ato agirotin jeverei furi awanai itatwar on iyawur ato Peter ibo rus sirui furi amonai nan.
Jeverei ato furi awanai itatawar on Peter aurin iyau, “Om mat on ato Orot an baigibubunuotin tani i?” Peter iyafotai iyau, “Ambin, men yau mat on.”
Nuba yagur isusur on mes agirotis a kaifarotis on wairaf siyasir nan sikufifinai wairaf iraranis. On mes Peter on inai ato mat nan sitawar wairaf iraranai.
Priest Ainauin on Iesu an baigibubunuotis a an baibebe aurin on itetemai.
Iesu iyafotai iyau. “Yau on ra fufur wasai nan sabu engon tutufin auris dura abikakafun; Yau au baibebe engon tutufin on bayoi goa a tafaror goa amosi nan Jew yangan engon si’nat siruruayo on nan abibebeyis. Yau men dura tani aibuni mom aikakafun on.
Om aibo mes yau ebitetemiu i? Sabu iyabon Yau au dura si’tatam on eitetemis. Om osi eitetemis tait, Yau abi dura awures on—osi sisagob Yau dura mamaba aikakafun.” Iesu atonio dura iyau mom, ato kaifarotin tani nan itatawar on Iesu rereban
iyasfarai ato iyau, “Om men dura nanaba Priest Ainauin aurin unikakafun mes!”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Yau ari dura komasin tani atau on, om sabu engon tutufin atonio semama on unawures on abi bobo komasin afour. Baise Yau dura obin wat aikakafun on aibo mes urabiu i?”
Namon Annas on Iesu iyafarai inai Priest Ainauin Caiaphas aurin. Iesu usinai on nana uramai siyous i’yen.
Peter on nan nana itawar wairaf iraranai. Ato sabu fani on aurin siyau, “Om min ato Orot on an baigibubunuotin tani i?” Baise Peter isosouf. On iyau, “Ambin, men yau mat.”
Priest Ainauin an agirotin tani min nan, on agirotin tani tain tuan min Peter ato imisir tainan iyasutin itutu, on ikakafun. On itetemai yau, “Yau nan masauai min om rum aitem i?”
Peter iyau men, “Ambin.”—ato ra kaita kokorerek itou.
Fomenei fomenei Iesu on Caiaphas an goai emon sibo sinai gawan an goa ann werominai nan. Jew babadis on men goa ann weromin amonai sirui yabin osi sigogoi nana gumidaris sitama onai osi Baisobon an bayu sitam mes.
On mes Pilate igat au koun ato itetemis iyau, “Atonio Orot on abi bobo komasin ifour mes on wobiubarai i?”
Osi siyafotai siyau, “On men bobo komasis itfofour on, wei men om aurim watboai watnat on.
Pilate osi auris iyau, “Omi toum wobo ato ami baifafaro iyau nanaba on woigurubabanai.” Jew yangan siyafotai siyau, “Wei on men fofonin orot jever tani wanirabobai on.”
(Atonio bobo imatar onai Iesu an rabob mamaba inboboai aurin i’yau on itnat itidura bag.)
Pilate imatabir men irui goa ann werominai nan ato Iesu iyor inat. On itetemai iyau, “Om min Jew yangan asi Aiwab i?”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Atonio baitetem on om toum am notai ebitetemiu o Yau au dudur on sabu fani siyawurem i?”
Pilate iyafotai iyau, “Om enonosin Yau min Jew orot i? Atonio on Om am sabu asi priest aiwabis mat on Om siboem Yau imaui siyagai. Om abi bobo ufour i?”
Iesu iyau, “Yau au baiaiwab on men atonio tafanam ebinoanai on; ato Yau au baiaiwab atonio tafanam itbinoanai mes on Yau au baigibubunuotis on arimon sitigagam sitbotaniu, men arimon Jew babadis imasi atag on. Ambin, Yau au baiaiwab on men atonio tafanam ebinoanai on!”
On mes Pilate itetemai iyau, “Om min Aiwab i?” Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Om ukakafun yau, Yau on Aiwab. Yau on arat ato atonio bobo yabinai on anat au tafanam, dura maiauin aurin on anikakafun mes. Iyai iyafan dura maiauin ebinoanai on Yau au dura etatam.”
Pilate itetemai iyau, “Atonio dura maiauin an yabin on aifan i?” Namon Pilate imatabir men igat kounai Jew sabu auris ato iyau, “Atonio Orot aurin on men dura yabin tani agaturai on animakiai.
Baise ami kik iyau nanaba on, yau ra fufur Baisobon an ra on fafatum orot tani arurufanai e’gat weinem. Omi wogogoi yau Jew yangan asi Aiwab on an rufanai ingat weinem i?”
Osi baiyokuai nan siyafotai siyau, “Ambin men On! Wei wagogoi Barabbas!” (Barabbas min yakeotin.)
Namon Pilate on Iesu ibo ato dura wawaninai wou yangan iyawures urouwawanai nan siyaswabirai.
Wou yangan on wengar aisikis fafames on siboen nigir siyamai uninai siyein; namon osi beber mururin on sibo siyotai;
osi sinai aurin ato sikoboai siyau, “Jew yangan asi Aiwab, mama wantoanin!” Ato osi Iesu rereban siyasfarai.
Pilate imatabir men igat au koun ato sabu kuayo auris iyau, “Omi woit, On nin anboai angat aurim wonitai, ato yau on men an yabin tani agaturai on animakiai.”
On mes Iesu on igat au koun, On uninai on nigir siyein a beber mururin siyotai auman. Pilate on osi sabu auris iyau, “Omi woit! Orot atonio!”
Priest Ainauis a tafaror goa ankaifarotis on Iesu sit on siyoku siyau, “Nabai ekubarai! Nabai ekubarai!” Pilate on osi auris iyau, “Omi toum wobo ato nabai wokubarai. Yau on men an yabin tani agaturai on animakiai.”
Jew sabu kuayo on siyafotai men siyau, “Wei ai baifafaro iyau on asir inarab mom, yabin On Toun eyoyorai God Natun.”
Pilate atonio dura itatam on iber kwakwan.
On imatabir men irui goa ann weromin amonai ato on Iesu itetemai iyau, “Om men emon ne unat i?” Baise Iesu men abi dura tani iyafotai on.
Pilate on Iesu aurin iyau, “Om aibo mes men auriu dura ebikakafun i? Om unsagob, Yau au baibad yen anau Om sinrufanim a mat anau Om sinboem nabai sinkubarem.”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Om am baibad Yau auriu yen yabin atonio on God om item. On mes orot iyafan Yau iboeu om imamui iyayagai on an bokomas on irat kwakwan, komasin bag yen.”
Pilate atonio dura itatam on, ifourtobon eta inuen Iesu itrufanai mes. Baise sabu kuayo siyoku men siyau, “Om On unrurufanai on, om on men Caesar turan on! Iyai iyafan toun eyoyorai Aiwab on, Caesar aurin ebiragit!”
Pilate atonio dura itatam mom on, Iesu ibo igat au koun ato Pilate on baigurubaban an mamageai imair, on efan seyoyorai, “Baigurubabanotis asi mamage.” (Hebrew yangan fonasi on seyoyorai, “Gabbatha.”)
On ra itatom on Baisobon an ra ato wera kafakakai mom aiyet itboai. Pilate sabu auris iyau, “Omi ami Aiwab ato!”
Osi siyoku men siyau, “Yasubun! Yasubun! Nabai ekubarai!” Pilate itetemis iyau, “Omi wogogoi yau ami Aiwab nabai ankubarai i?” Priest aiwabis siyafotai siyau, “Wei ai aiwab on Caesar ekesin mom!”
Namon Pilate on Iesu osi imasi iyagai nabai sitkubarai mes. On mes osi Iesu sibo sibonanawai sinai.
On igat Toun an nab iyabar ato sinat efan wabin seyoyorai, “Tekwakwan an Efan,” (Hebrew yangan fonasi on seyoyorai, “Golgotha.”)
Osi nan nabai sikubarai; mat osi orot ruam on eb nabai sikubares, orot tani rebanai a orot tani rebanai ato Iesu on basunai.
Pilate atonio baiyoboen dura on wengarai igayam ato an wou yangan iyawures nab tefanai sidudun. On dura atonio nanaba igayam, “Iesu Nazareth emon, Jew yangan asi Aiwab.”
Sabu sigaraba on atonio dura siyab yabin efan menan Iesu nabai sikukubarai on mafam gagamin bisinai bag. Atonio baiyoboen dura on Hebrew, Latin a Greek yangan fonasi sigayam.
Priest aiwabis on Pilate aurin siyau, “Om men ungayam unau, ‘Jew yangan asi Aiwab,’ baise om ungayam, “Atonio orot iyau, Yau on Jew yangan asi Aiwab.’”
Pilate iyafotes iyau, “Dura aifan agayam on agayam, nana inen.”
Wou yangan Iesu nabai sikubarai isawar weie, osi On an beber on siboen ato sikuseseb matas bat simatar, wou orot kakaita on beber matas kakaita kakaita siboen. Mat osi On an beber ato amonai ibitakwakwarai on sibo, on beber on kaitamom weromin tefanai isur inai babanai igat on nanaba sisagir.
Wou yangan on tous wat siyau bonen, “Ot beber men tansafef mes; ot barom tanyoai nan tansagob iyafan on inboai.” Atonio bobo imatar onai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on inat itidura bag: Dura ato nanaba sigayam siyau, “Osi tous sanasi nan Yau au beber on sikuseseb a au beber amonai abitakwakwariu on sibo asi kwarer siyamai onai barom siyo.” Ato wou yangan min on bobo nanaba sifour.
Iesu ayon giya, Mary, orot Cleopas awan, a Mary Magdalene, on Iesu an nab bisinai sitatawar.
Iesu iyeit ayon a baigibubunuotin On an nuabo on nan sitatawar ites; on mes On ayon aurin iyau, “Jever, atonio on om natum orot.”
Namon On an baigibubunuotin aurin iyau. “Atonio on om ayom.” On gibunai on jever ibo inai an goai nan ikaifarai.
Iesu isagob ari on bobo engon tutufin isawarai; onai itiyamai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on itnat itidura bag. On iyau, “Yau anjou eteteinin.”
Ramo amonai on sareu wine riribin awan bonuin nan i’yen; ato osi beber samisamin on sibo nan sareu wine amonai sikutub ato wengar wabin hyssop on famenai nan siyein ato siyotogai giburunai nan siyein.
Iesu sareu wine itoman ato iyau, “Itutufin nono!” Namon On uson itur ato irabob.
Namon Jew babadis on Pilate sifefeyanai on itibasit ato sabu nabai sikukubares on ass sitastoben gariwat sitarab ato usis on nab emon sityeires sitsur. Osi atonio bobo aurin on sifefeyan yabin friday on botitiwag an ra on mes ato osi men sigogoi usis on Sabat ra nan nana nabai sitroror yabin ra itatom on Sabat Kakafotin an ra gagamin.
On mes wou yangan sinai orot ainau on ann siyasotoben a orot tani aurin ba sinai ann siyasotoben ato Iesu mat sikukubares on.
Baise osi sinat Iesu aurin on sit On irabob nono, on mes osi men ann siyasotoben on.
Baise wou orot tani on iyo ibo Iesu sesebinai iyo ato ra kaita tara a sareu iyawadebur isur.
(Orot iyafan atonio bobo imamatar matanai i’tai on aurin ikakafun, onai omi mat wonitutum. On dura aifan i’yau on dura bag ato on isagob on dura maiauin wat ebikakafun.)
Atonio bobo imatar itiyamai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on itnat itidura bag: “On men arimon an rarik tani arimon inturutob on.”
Ato God an dura tani buk amonai sigayam siyau, “Orot iyoai siyoyoai on sabu arimon matas On aurin sineit.”
On gibunai, Joseph on Arimathea mafam gagamin emon, on Pilate ifefeyanai fofonin arimon Iesu usin itboai. (Joseph on Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani, baise on bubuniai nan ibobo yabin on Jew babadis auris ibeber on mes.) Pilate on Joseph iyawur usin itboai mes, on mes on inai ato usin ibo inai.
Nicodemus, on orot on ainau fom tani inai Iesu ititai mes, on Joseph rus sinai, on fio yanden ninibin on ibo a fio fani keris on mat sikaita sisutatabir, on fio kiman an bit on orot kaitamom auyotoat nanaba on iboen mat sinai.
Osi orot ruam on Iesu usin sibo ato garob an beberai nan fio yanden ninibin on usinai sidebur ato sikiman, Jew asi kik iyau nanaba, rabobis usis on nanaba sebotitiwagis weie segagarobis.
Iesu nabai sikubarai an efanai nan on masau i’yen ato on amonai nan on rasi dogu i’yen, ato on rasi dogu on men iyafan tani ainau nan sigarobai on.
Ra itatom on Sabat ra a yabin on rasi dogu on auwatin on mes Iesu usin on nan siyein.
Sunday fomenei fomenei ra gugubanai nan Mary Magdalene on inai au rasi doguai nan ato iyeit agim it on ainau dogu awan emon sifiruruai inai i’yen.
On iyayai inai Simon Peter a baigibubunuotin tani Bada an nuabo on, osi rus auris igat ato iyawures iyau, “Sabu on Bada rasi dogu emon sibo sinai ato ot men tasagob osi menan nan siyein!”
Namon Peter a baigibubunuotin tani on rus sinai au rasi doguai nan.
Osi rus on si’yai baise baigibubunuotin tani on iyayai kwakwan Peter igiseirai ato on ainau iyayai inai rasi doguai nan igat.
On ikwafir ato garob an beber wat on si’yen iten, baise on men dogu amonai irui.
Simon Peter on gibui inat ato on totor irui rasi dogu amonai nan. On iyeit garob an beber nan si’yen iten
a beber ato Iesu unin sikikimanai on mat nan i’yen it. Beber ato Iesu unin sikikimanai on men garob an beber mat kaita si’yen on baise on beber on toun inu mabinai i’yen.
Namon baigibubunuotin tani on ainau inat rasi doguai i’gat on, on mat dogu amonai irui; it ato itutum.
(Osi nana men sisagob, God an dura ato buk amonai sigayam siyau, On rabob emon inmisir men.)
Namon baigibubunuotis simatabir men sinai au go.
Mary imatabir men inai rasi dogu kounai itawar itotou. On nana itotou ato on ikwafir rasi dogu itinateteai mes
ato nan anea ruam beber kakakaiis wat simonag on ites, nan Iesu usin menan siyein on nan simama, tani uninai tani annai.
Osi sitetemai siyau, “Jever, om aibo mes etotou i?” On iyafotes iyau, “Sabu on au Bada sibo sinai ato yau men asagob On menan nan siyein!”
On atonio dura iyau isawar on irutabir ato Iesu it nan itatawar; baise on men isagob on Iesu.
Iesu itetemai iyau, “Jever, om aibo mes etotou? Om iyafan enunuen?” Jever inos on orot masau bo’otin, on mes on aurin iyau, “Bada, om On unboai unnanan mes on, ekasoneu om menan nan uyein, ato yau anan anboai.”
Iesu on aurin iyau, “Mary!” Ato jever On aurin irutabir ato Hebrew fonasi iyau, “Rabboni!” (Atonio dura an yabin min, “Baibebeotim.”)
Iesu iyawur iyau, “Om men usiu unbokikin yabin Yau men amatabir anai Tamau aurin on. Baise om unan taitaiu auris ato Yau auriu on unawures unau, Yau amamatabir men Yau Tamau a osi Tamas, Yau au God a osi asi God aurin.”
On mes Mary Magdalene inai ato baigibubunuotis ikasones on Bada matanai it a On mamaba iyawur on engon ikasones.
On sunday ibirabirabi bag ato baigibubunuotis on siruayo ato goa metewan engon sirufofoten sikuabinen yabin osi on Jew babadis auris siber on mes. Namon Iesu irui ato sanasi itawar. On iyau, “Tuf aurim inama.”
On atonio dura iyau gibunai, On iman a sesebin iyoboes. Baigibubunuotis ato Bada si’tai on siyasisir kwakwan.
Namon Iesu osi auris iyau men, “Tuf aurim inama. Tamau on Yau iyafareu, on mes on eta kaitamomai Yau omi abiyafarem au tafanam wongat.”
On atonio dura ikakafun isawar ato On osi auris yabat ibabain ato iyau, “Omi Ayu Kakafotin wobo.
Omi sabu asi bokomas wonbinotbur on, arimon sinnotbures; ato omi men woninotbures on, osi arimon men sininotbures on.”
Baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis bairuin tani wabin Thomas (on seyoyorai Sisiru), on men mat nan an rai on Iesu an baigibubunuotis fani wat auris irobotet.
On mes baigibubunuotis fani on siyawur siyau, “Wei on Bada mataii wait!” Thomas on osi auris iyau, “Yau men anitutum on ab yau iman ato sidudun efenis on afas aneit a imau anboai osi afasi anaya a imau on sesebinai aniwan inar on arimon anitutum.”
Tafaror kaitamom isawar gibunai ato baigibubunuotis on goa amonai siruayo men ato ari weie Thomas on mat nan sanasi. Metewan on sikuabinen baise Iesu on irobotet nan sanasi itawar ato iyau, “Tuf aurim inama.”
Namon On Thomas aurin iyau, “Imam nin eyein, imau eiten; namon imam yotet egat sesebiui eiwan erui. Om men uninonot sisit mes baise unitutum!”
Thomas iyafotai iyau, “Yau au Bada a yau au God!”
Iesu on aurin iyau, “Om ututum yabin om matamui bag Yau uteu on mes i? Osi sabu iyabon Yau men matasi siteu baise sebitutum, osi auris on yasisir gagamin!”
Iesu on bobo buburis fani sigaraba an baigibubunuotis matasi ifofour on men atonio buk amonai sigayamen on.
Baise atonio osi sigagayamen onai omi wonitutum Iesu on Orot Rurubinin God Natun ato omi On wonitutumai on Wabinai yawas wonboai.
On gibunai, Iesu irobotet men an baigibubunuotis auris Tiberias kamitai nan. On bobo atonio nanaba ifour.
Simon Peter, Thomas (on seyoyorai Sisiru), Nathanael (ato Cana mafam gagamin Galilee tafanam emon i’nat on), Zebedee nanatun a Iesu an baigibubunuotis ruam on engon nan.
Simon Peter on osi auris iyau, “Yau anan an bosag.” Osi siyawur siyau, “Wei wannat mat tanan.” On mes osi sinai wayai sikaruge; baise on fom weromin on osi men iyan tani siyonai on.
Wera igeg mom, Iesu on toreai nan itatawar baise baigibubunuotis on men sisagob on Iesu.
Namon On itetemis iyau, “Jorig omi men iyan tani woiyonai i?” Osi siyafotai siyau, “Ambin bag.”
On osi auris iyau, “Omi ami uwat on wa auasumaiauai nan woreben egat ato arimon iyan woniyonen.” On mes osi uwat sireben igat ato men fofonin uwat sittein men itar on yabin osi iyan sigaraba bag siyonen on mes.
Baigibubunuotin on Iesu an nuabo on Peter aurin iyau, “Nan on Bada!” Peter on dura itatam on Bada, on an beber tefanai ibitakwakwarai on iyot men (yabin on an beber min iboseseiren) ato kamitai isobit.
Baigibubunuotis fani on wa siboi sirui au tore, uwat amonai iyan sigaraba bag siyonen on auman siteteinin. Osi sirui tore aurin siufin on an weromin on 100 mita nanaba.
Osi wa emon sigat sisur toreai sitawar mom, osi sit wairaf iyoyour on nan iyan siteterai a rafi sarar on mabisi si’yen.
Namon Iesu osi auris iyau, “Omi iyan fani ato arimon wororout on woboen wonat.”
Simon Peter wa tefanai ikaruge ato uwat amonai iyan gagamis sigaraba on engon 153 tefanai auman on nanaba si’yonis on itein irui, basit iyan on sison kwakwan ato uwat on men isafef on.
Iesu osi auris iyau, “Omi wonat wam.” Baigibubunuotis on men iyafan tani igogoi ititetemai itau, “Om on iyafan?” yabin osi sisagob on Bada.
On mes Iesu inai rafi sarar ibo ato ites; iyan aurin on eb bobo kaitamom nanaba ifour.
Atonio on wera baitonin Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris Toun iyoboes ato God rabob emon ibobaimisirai gibunai on.
Bayu siyam isawar gibunai Iesu on Simon Peter aurin iyau, “Simon, John natun, om min Yau uinuaboiu kwakwan men atonio osi sabu fani ba i?” On iyafotai iyau, “Dura bag Bada, Om usagob yau on Om ainuaboim.” Iesu aurin iyau, “Om au foro sheep bobous unkaifares.”
Iesu on dura bairuin ba on aurin iyau men, “Simon, John natun, om min Yau uinuaboiu i?” On iyafotai iyau, “Dura bag Bada, yau on Om ainuaboim.” Iesu on aurin iyau, “Om au foro sheep unkaifares.”
Iesu on wera baitonin ba aurin iyau men, “Simon, John natun, om min Yau uinuaboiu i?” Peter on iyababan yabin Iesu on wera baitonin nanaba itetemai iyau, “Om min Yau uinuaboiu i?” On mes Peter on Bada aurin iyau, “Bada, Om bobo engon tutufin usagob; Om usagob yau min Om ainuaboim!” Iesu on aurin iyau, “Om au foro sheep unkaifares.
Yau awurem dura bag: Om jorei boboum umama on om ubotitiwagim am gogoi nanaba on menan menan ubibib baise om uiorot on om imam unotet ingat ato orot tani inousim, ato men om agogoi efan nan utan, on nan inboem unan.”
(Iesu atonio dura iyau, on iyoboai Peter mamaba inarab God inbiduduranai aurin on.) Namon Iesu on aurin iyau, “Om Yau eigibubunueu!”
Peter irutabir ato baigibubunuotin tani Iesu an nuabo on kounai it—on orot min Iesu mat rabirabi Bada an bayu si’yam nan dogaranai iyenbar ato itetemai iyau, “Bada iyafan Om inkaseirim mes i?”
Peter on it ato Iesu itetemai iyau, “Bada, ato atonio orot on mamaba i?”
Iesu iyafotai iyau, “Yau angogoi on nana inama ato Yau anmatabir men, ato om aibo mes on ebinonotai i? Om Yau eigibubunueu!”
On mes on Iesu an baigibubunuotis sanasi dura irat on atonio baigibubunuotin on men inarab. Baise Iesu on men iyau on men inarab; On iyau, “Yau angogoi on nana inama weie, Yau anmatabir men, om aibo mes on ebinonotai i?”
On baigibubunuotin on atonio osi bobo auris on ikakafun; on min on buk amonai mat igayamen; ato ot tasagob atonio dura aifan i’yau on dura maiauin.
Bobo sigaraba maiau Iesu ifour. Atonio osi bobo kakaita kakaita auris on buk amonai sitgagayamen on, anonosin tafanam au engonai on arimon buk wat on itfafar.
Arie Theophilus: Au buk ainauinai on bobo engon tutufin Iesu ibobo a ibibebe on agayam, ato ainau anai bag On an bobo ibosuruf nan,
ato inat ari ra God On ibo igai au safam. On Ayu Kakafotin an faiwarai on sabu irubinis On an baiyoyobotis mes simatar on iyawures bobo mamaba sinbobo aurin on, weie God Iesu ibo igai au safam.
On irabob gibunai, ra orot ruam amonai On ra sigaraba maiau sabu auris Toun irerebai iyoboes, ato on etaiai sabu sibiyoi on auris itidura bag, On on yawasin; ato osi On sit a osi On mat God an Baiaiwab aurin on sikakafun.
Ato osi engon sinat siruayo ato, On atonio dura wawaninai iyawures iyau, “Omi men Jerusalem wonikirir mes, baise omi wonmousin Tamau siwar aurin iyaumatan on omi initem mes, on aurin min ainau akasonem nono.
John on sareuai ibapataitoim, baise ra men weromin amonai on omi arimon Ayu Kakafotinai wonibapataito.”
Baiyoyobotis on Iesu mat siruayo ato osi On sitetemai siyau, “Bada, Om ari wera amonai on Om arimon Baiaiwab Israel unitai men?”
Iesu on osi auris iyau, “Wera o ra on Tamau ekesin Toun an baibadai nan osi bobo eyaya, ato osi bobo meyan sinmamatar auris on omi men arimon wonsagob on.
Baise Ayu Kakafotin omi aurim innanat on omi arimon faiwar wonboai ato omi arimon Yau au dura wonboai wongat wonkurereb nan, Jerusalem, Judea tafanam amonai engon, a Samaria tafanamai a inai tafanam kanfounai i’gat nan.”
On atonio dura iyau isawar gibunai, osi On siruruaiai matasi, ato God On ibo igai au safam; ato kasakasau inat matasi ibofotai.
On igai inai isawar, ato osi nana matas on safam wat si’tai, ra kaita orot ruam beber kakakaiis wat simonag nan sesebisi sitawar.
Osi siyau, “Galilee sabu, omi aibo mes nan wotawar matam on au safam wat wotatage? Atonio Iesu on omi emon God ibo igai au safam, ato omi ari ato woit igeg au safam on, on eta kaitamomai nanaba On arimon inmatabir men innat.”
Namon baiyoyobotis Olive Oyau emon simatabir men sinat au Jerusalem, on efan on men weroromin bag kilomita kaitamom nanaba mafam gagamin bisinai.
Osi sinai Jerusalem mafam gagamin amonai sirui ato sigai goa ann werominai, menan osi simama nan: Peter, John, James a Andrew, Philip a Thomas, Bartholomew a Matthew, James, Alphaeus natun, Simon, tafanam an rufafarin an orot a Judas, James natun.
Osi on ra fufur siruruayo sibikaita ato sibabayoi, jever fani mat nan a Mary Iesu ayon a Iesu taitain min si’nat nan mat sibabayoi.
Ra fani sisawar gibunai baitutumotis fani ba siruayo, osi sabu on engon orot nimtereban kaita on tefanai nanaba, ato Peter imisir dura ikakafun.
On iyau, “Yau taitaiu tutuau, God an dura buk amonai sigayam, Ayu Kakafotin on David ibonuai ato on Judas aurin on ikakafun iyau, on arimon sabu inbonanawaiis sinan Iesu sinfatumai, ato on dura min ari inat idura bag.
Judas on ot ati kuayo an orot tani, yabin on sirubinai ot bobo tabobo nanaba on ibobo.”
(Judas on bobo komasin ifofour an agim sibibaiyanai on ibo ato motob itobon, ato on motobai nan anjon konat iyein ifeu irabob; ato yan itaseb amon an sawar on engon rerebai sigat sifeuen.
Sabu engon Jerusalem simama on duran sitatam, on mes osi asi durai on ato motob aurin siyor siyau, Akeldama, on an yabin min, “Tara an motob.”)
Peter an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Buk Psalm amonai sigayam siyau, ‘On an goa on arimon sinikirir wagan wat inen, men iyafan tani arimon on goa amonai inama on,’ mat dura sigayam siyau, ‘Orot tani arimon on an efan inboai bobo inabo.’
“On mes orot tani on ot sanati inar mat Iesu Keriso rabob emon imisir aurin on an dura tankurereb. On orot min osi sabu iyabon ot ati kuayo amonai ra fufur Bada Iesu mat tabibib on tani wonrubinai, a ainau anai bag John on bapataito aurin dura ibibino on nana inat ato ari ra igat God Iesu ibo igai au safam.”
<range>
On mes osi orot ruam wabis sibatonen: Joseph, on orot on seyoyorai Barsabbas (mat on orot wabin tani seyoyorai Justus), a Matthias.
Namon osi sibayoi siyau, “Bada, Om sabu engon tutufin nunuas on usagoben. On mes Bada, Om eiyoboei atonio orot ruam amosi on menan on urubinai,
on efan inboai baiyoyobotin mes inmatar bobo inabo ato Judas ibikirir on ato on bobo komasin ifour on fasinai on toun an efan irubin on nan inai.”
Namon osi barom siyo ato osi orot ruam wabis sibobo on orot iyafan on sitrubinai on bobo itboai mes. Ato osi wab sirubinai on Matthias, ato baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagin kaita simama on amosi sibo siwan siyamai asi kuayo irat.
Pentecost an ra gagamin inat, ato baitutumotis engon tutufin on sinat efan kaitamomai nan siruayo.
Ra kaita safam emon rarabin inat, on rarabin on yabat wawanin isisin ba, ato isur sabu efan menan simama on nan goa amonai engon tutufin ibonuai.
Namon osi sit wairaf wamemeran on sabu sigaraba fafes, ba itareremot auris i’gat i’tagege; ato fafen igat sabu kakaita kakaita nan simama on usisi sitog.
Osi sabu engon tutufin on Ayu Kakafotin ibonues ato osi sibosuruf sabu touman fonasi nan dura sibikakafun, Ayu Kakafotin ifouris on dura nanaba sibikakafun.
Jew Yangan nan Jerusalem simama, osi sabu on God sekwakwafirai yangan on tafanam engon tutufin emon sinat.
Osi atonio fonas wafararabis sitatam mom on, sabu kuayo gagamin bag on engon tutufin siruayo. Osi engon sinonot wat, yabin osi sabu kakaita kakaita sitatam baitutumotis on osi fonasi nan dura sibikakafun.
Osi on siduduran a sinonot wat ato siyau, “Osi sabu atonio dura sibikakafun on—engon tutufin Galilee yangan!
Ato mamaba mes on ot engon tatamis osi on ot ati dura bag on sibikakafun?
Ot on tafanam Parthia, Media a Elam emon tanat a Mesopotamia, Judea a Cappadocia emon tanat; Pontus a Asia emon tanat,
ot on Phrygia a Pamphylia emon tanat, Egypt emon a Libya tafanam Cyrene bisinai on emon tanat; ot sabu fani on Rome emon tanat,
ot on Jew yangan a sabu men Jew yangan on sinat Jew yangan mes simatar; ot sabu fani on Crete nua a Arabia tafanam emon tanat,—baise ot engon tatatam, osi on ot tout ati dura on sibikakafun mamaba God bobo gagamis ifofour auris on!”
Osi on siduduran a sitagogois auman nana sibitetem bonen si’yau, “Atonio bobo an yabin on abifan?”
Baise sabu fani on baitutumotis auris sikobois si’yau, “Atonio osi sabu on sareu wawanin sitoman sikokok!”
Namon Peter on imisir itawar baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagin kaita mat ato on fonan aumiet bag nan sabu kuayo gagamin auris ibosuruf dura ikakafun iyau: “Yau au sabu Jew yangan, a omi sabu engon tutufin nin Jerusalem womama on au dura wontatam, ato atonio bobo an yabin on ankasonem.
Atonio osi sabu on men sareu wawanin sitoman sikokok on, omi wononosin on nanaba; ato ari on fomenei wera nimtereban baibatin nanaba.
Baise aubairuruotin Joel on atonio bobo ari imamatar aurin on ikakafun:
God iyau: ‘Ra kanfounai on Yau arimon atonio bobo nanaba anafour, Yau arimon au Ayu on sabu engon tutufin auris an debur. Omi nanatum orot a jeverig on arimon God an dura inboai ingat auris ato osi sabu auris dura sinkurereb; omi nanatum jorig on arimon God an dura maiauin on rerebai inboai ingat iniyoboes matasi bomomoutai ba sinitai, ato nanatum sabu kawian on bomomoutai nan God an dura maiauin on sineit.
Dura bag, on an rai on Yau arimon au Ayu on au agirotis orot a jever on auris andebur, ato osi God an dura auris inboai ingat sinkurereb.
Yau arimon safam aiyetunai nan bobo buburis anafour, a bobo baiduduranis on nin tafanamai anafour. Arimon tara, wairaf a bakur babadoan on sinmatar,
ato wera matan on arimon inwouman, ato roke on arimon matan mururin tara ba inmatar, weie Bada an Ra gagamin bag on innat.
Ato iyai iyafan Bada Wabin ebaton eyoyor on arimon inyawas.’
“Omi Israel yangan, atonio dura wontatam! Iesu Nazareth emon on omi aurim God irubinai on rerebai bobo buburis, bobo baiduduranis, a bobo buburis ta ta on, God Toun Natun emon on ato bobo rerebai ifouren, ato omi toum on wosagob; ato ari bobo min nin sanamui bag imatar.
God, Toun an gogoiai a an sagobai on inonotai nono on Iesu omi imamui ityagai; ato omi wasubun, sabu bokomasotis sibaisim nabai sidudun.
Baise God On rabob emon ibobaimisirai men; On rabob an babanis emon on irufanai, yabin rabob on men fofonin arimon itbotan itfatumai on.
Yabin David min On aurin iyau, ‘Yau ra fufur Bada on nawui nan aitai; On yau au asumaiauai nan etatawar, onai yau men arimon komasin angaturai on.
On yabinai yau nunuau ebiyasisir a yau on yasisirai wat dura abikakafun; ato yau on asir orot maiauiu wat, ato orot fani ba, ato yau on yaterabobai nan amomousin God auriu inafour mes,
yabin Om men arimon ayubiu unikirir nin rasiai inen mes; Om am agirotin Kakafotin on men unikirir rasiai inafim mes.
Om on eta ato inai yawas aurin i’gat on uyoboeu, ato Om yau bisiwui emama on mes, yau abiyasisir.’
“Yau taitaiu tutuau: Yau on dura bag wat anawurem ato agirit David aurin on. On irabob sigarobai, ato on an rasi on ari ot bisiti i’yen inat ari ra igat.
David on aubairuruotin, ato God on aurin aifan iyaumatan on isagob: God iyaumatan ifaro iyau on David an dam an warar amonai arimon orot tani iniyamai innat iniAiwab, ato David ba.
David it God arimon bobo mamaba inafour, on mes on Keriso an bobaimisir aurin ikakafun iyau, ‘On men arimon rasiai nan inikirir on; On usin bion on arimon men inafim.’
God on, atonio Iesu on rabob emon ibobaimisirai, ato wei engon tutufin On mataii wait, on mes wei omi aurim dura wakurereb.
God on Iesu ibobaimisirai ato On an asumaiauai emama, ato Taman mamaba Ayu Kakafotin aurin iyaumatanai on itai; ato ari aifan matamui woitai a dura wotatam on nan On an siwar on ato ot aurit idebur isur.
David toun on men igai au safam on; baise on iyau, ‘Bada on yau au Bada aurin iyau: Om nin au asumaiauai emair,
ato Yau am ragit anboes sinsur om am baibad babanai sinama.’
“Omi Israel sabu engon tutufin wonsagob dura bag, atonio Iesu omi nabai wodudun on, God ifourai inat Bada a Keriso imatar!”
Sabu atonio dura sitatam mom on nunuas iyo kwakwan, ato simisir Peter a baiyoyobotis fani auris siyau, “Wei taitai tutuai, wei on mamaba wanafour i?”
Peter on osi auris iyau, “Omi sabu kakaita kakaita on ya baikitabir wonboai, ato Iesu keriso Wabinai wonibapataito, onai God omi ami bokomas innotbur; ato omi God an siwar, Ayu Kakafotin on wonboai.
Yabin God an aumatan on omi a nanatum auris iyaumatan, ato omi iyabon nanenei womama on—omi engon aurim on ati Bada God eyoyorem.”
Peter on dura sigaraba maiau osi auris ibo igat ikakafun, ato on osi sabu auris isosoan iyau, “Baimaki atonio sabu komasis auris enat on, on emon on toum woniyawasim!”
Sabu sigaraba maiau Peter an dura aurin on situtum ato sibapataito; on ra nan on sabu 3,000 nanaba on sinat asi kuayo amonai sirui.
Osi asi wera siyein ato baiyoyobotis simisir sibebeyes, mat siruruayo sibikaita, rafi sarar siyabaseseb baitutumotis engon kaitanei, si’yam a engon Bada aurin sibabayoi.
Baiyoyobotis on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis on sigaraba sifouren, ato on bobo iyamai on sabu asi kakaf on gagamin siyein.
Baitutumotis engon on nana siruruayo sibikaita, ato asi sawar on siraram bonen.
Osi asi motob a asi sawar on sabu fani auris sitobonen ato agim siboai sabu kakaita kakaita asi gogoi on sibaisis siraram bonen.
Osi ra fufur nana siruruayo tafaror goai sibikaita, a osi sabu kakaita kakaita asi goai nan siruruayo sibikaita rafi sarar siyabaseseb ato osi nunuas on kaitamomai a yasisirai bayu si’yam,
osi God sibifain a sabu engon tutufin osi auris on men sunub sigogoiis on a auris sibiyasisir. Ra fufur sabu sigaraba maiau on yawas si’boai; ato Bada on osi sabu iboes baitutumotis asi kuayo amonai ibiwanis.
Ra tani, rabirabi wera ton nanaba Peter a John rus sinai tafaror goai sitbayoi mes, on wera nanaba on sabu engon seruruayo sebabayoi.
On tafaror goa metewan on seyoyorai, “Metewan Obin,” on efanai on orot ann raguraguin auman irat, on nan imama. Sabu on ra fufur on orot on siboai si’nat atonio metewan awanai nan siyeyeirai imama ato, sabu au tafaror goa si’nan on auris agim mes ikafefeyan.
On iyeit Peter a John rus ites au tafaror goa sirur ato on ifefeyanis sawar aifan tani on sititai mes.
Osi matas on totor wat on orot aurin siyeit sit, ato Peter iyau, “Om matam yeit wei eitei!”
On mes on matan totor iyeit osi ites, ato ibinonot on sawar aifan tani osi emon itboai mes.
Peter on orot aurin iyau, “Yau auriu on agim ambin bag, baise yau auriu aifan yen on anitem: Iesu Keriso Nazareth emon Wabinai dura wawaninai awurem, om emisir unabib!”
Namon on iyof orot iman asumaiauai ibo ato ibaisin imisir itawar. Ra kaita orot ann a ann afukumin on siwani;
on iroboge annai itawar; ato ibosuruf ibibib. Namon on osi orot ruam mat sibib sirui au tafaror goai, on ibib iroroboge God ibifain.
Sabu kuayo gagamin on orot sit ibibib a God ibifain;
osi on orot sit sisagob on kafefeyanotin nan tafaror goa awan wabin, “Metewan Obin”, on nan imama on, osi engon tutufin siduduran a sinonotis wat ato bobo aifan orot aurin imamatar on.
Orot kafefeyanotin on iman iyof Peter a John rus ibokikines mat sibibib on, sabu engon siduduran ato siyayai sinai tafaror goa amonai efan wabin seyoyorai, “Solomon An Tebo,” on nan auris sigat.
Peter sabu ites mom ato on osi auris iyau, “Israel sabu, omi aibo mes atonio bobo woit on woiror, ato omi aibo mes wei woruruaii? Omi wononosin on wei ai faiwarai a wei on obi wat God matanai, on mes onai ato orot wabogaiai ebibib?
Abraham, Isaac a Jacob asi God a wawat agirit asi God, On an agirotin Iesu Wabin gagamin itai On baifain baiduduranin mes. Omi wobo babadis imasi woyagai, ato omi Pilate nanai On woisisiweiai, baise Pilate on gibui inonotai On ityatetai mes.
On Orot on Kakafotin a an yawas on totorin wat, baise omi woisisiweiai, ato angaramin on omi Pilate woifefeyanai ami gogoi on ifour, orot asububunenotin on irufanai igat weinem.
Ato omi Orot ato sabu ibinetewaris yawas siboai on wasubun. Baise God On rabob emon ibobaimisirai—ato wei On aurin on ato an dura wakurereb.
Iesu Wabin an faiwar emon on ato faiwar orot raguraguin itai. Omi bobo aifan matamui woitai a wosasagob on wei ai baitutum On Wabinai wayein; on mes bobo imatar; wei ai baitutum Iesu aurin wayein on ato omi engon namui ato iyawas.
“Ato yau taitaiu tutuau. Yau asagob omi a omi ami babadis mat on atonio bobo aifan Iesu aurin wofour, yabin omi on men wosagob.
God ainau bag dura ikakafun aubairuruotis engon auris ato osi dura sikurereb, on Keriso arimon inikokosarai; atonio etaiai on bobo engon ifour inat idura bag.
Omi ya baikitabir wonboai ato God aurin wonrutabir, ato On arimon ami bokomas insouen,
ato Bada an Ayu faiwarin on inibobounim, onai Iesu iniyafarai, On ainau omi aurim on sirubinai nono, On min Keriso.
On nan nana safamai inama, ato an wera innat weie bobo engon infouren bobous sinmatar, God atonio dura on ainau bag ikakafun nono, an aubairuruotis kakafotis auris, ato osi sabu sikasones.
Yabin Moses iyau, ‘Bada am God on arimon aubairuruotin tani iniyafarai, ato yau ibiyafareu ba, on orot min arimon omi toum sanamui emon. On dura aifan engon inawurem on aurin wonifonabo.
Iyai iyafan aubairuruotin an dura inbikakafun aurin men inifonabo, on arimon God an sabu emon on inkusebai mabinai nan sinikomasai.’
Aubairuruotin Samuel a aubairuruotis fani mat a aubairuruotis fani iyabon osi gibui si’nat on, engon dura God ites, ato ari ra bobo semamatar auris on ainau dura sikurereb nono.
Omi aurim on God an dura aubairuruotis auris iyaumatan, ato God an dura bobaibasit wawat agirit auris ibiyamai on wobo. On Abraham aurin iyau, ‘Omi wawam agirim emon on Yau sabu engon tutufin tafanamai on animomogines.’
On mes God On an Agirotin irubinai ato ainau omi aurim iyafarai, inimomoginem a omi sabu engon tutufin ami yawas komasis wofofour emon on inibaisim wonikirir mes.”
Peter a John rus on nana sabu auris dura sibikakafun ato priest a tafaror goa kaifarotis asi orot gagamin a Sadducee yangan, osi sinat auris.
Osi babadis on yas sitatab kwakwan yabin baiyoyobotis ruam on Iesu rabob emon imisir men an dura on sabu sibibebeyes, on dura an yabin ebidura bag sabu rabobis on arimon sinmisir men.
On mes Jew asi babadis simisir Peter a John rus sifatumes, ato wera isofafir on mes osi siboes fafatum goai sireberues, ra itatom weie sititetemis.
Baise sabu engon tutufin atonio dura sitatam on situtum; sabu on dura aurin sibitutum on 5,000 nanaba.
Ra itom Jew babadis, sabu kawian, a Baifafaro an baibebeotis, osi engon Jerusalem nan siruayo.
Jew asi Priest Ainauis wabis Annas a Caiaphas, John, Alexander a sabu fani osi on eb Priest Ainauis asi dam turin emon, osi engon tutufin nan mat kaita siruayo.
Osi sabuis on baiyoyobotis ruam siboes nasi sitawaris ato sitetemis siyau, “Omi abi faiwarai a iyafan wabinai, on atonio bobo nanaba wofour?”
Peter Ayu Kakafotin ibonuai ato iyafotes iyau, “Omi sabu asi babadis a sabu kawian:
Wei ari nin namui watatawar on ato bobo obin wafour orot raguraguin aurin a mat on mamaba iyayawas aurin on omi wei wobitetemi,
ato omi babadim a Israel yangan engon wonsagob tiwag. Atonio orot omi namui etatawar on Iesu Keriso Nazareth emon on Wabin an faiwarai iyawas—On Orot min omi nabai wokubarai ato God rabob emon ibobaimisirai.
Iesu aurin on God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau, ‘Omi goa baigoyonotim, matan ainau arir woit wonos on men obin on mes woisisiweiai, baise omi gibui wosagob, on arir on iyobin bag, mat gagamin bag arir engon tefasi.’
Yawas on, On ekesin emon wat tangaturai; men iyafan tani atonio tafanamai On Wabin God itai sabu auris, ab Iesu ekesin mom on ot iniyawasit.”
Jew babadis Rurubinis on siduduran kwakwan ato sit Peter a John rus dura totor wat osi auris sibikakafun on, osi men siber mes, ato osi gibui sisagob ato orot ruam on men sigayam on, osi asir mafam sabu wat. Osi sisagob orot ruam on Iesu tuturan ainau On mat siboen sibib.
Ato osi men fofonin arimon abi dura tani sitikakafun on, yabin osi sit orot raguraguin on iyawas nan Peter a John mat sitatawar.
On mes osi simisir orot ruam siyawures ato Jew babadis Rurubinis asi efan emon on sigat au koun ato osi Jew babadis Rurubinis wat tous amosi sidudurai mamaba on bobo sitiyamai mes.
Osi tous wat sitetemis siyau, “Atonio osi orot ruam on mamaba tanfouris? Sabu engon tutufin nin Jerusalem amonai semama on sisagob mamaba osi bobo buburin gagamin sifour on, ato ot men fofonin dura tanibuni on.
Baise ot atonio bobo on tanyafotai weie dura inarat ingat sabu engon tutufin sinsagob, ot atonio osi orot ruam on dura wawaninai tanawures men gibui Iesu Wabinai dura sinikakafun mes.”
On mes osi orot ruam siyores men sirui ato dura wawaninai siyawures siyau, “Omi men meyan gibui Iesu Wabin aurin on sabu auris dura wonikakafun o wonibebeyes men.”
Baise Peter a John rus on siyafotes siyau, “Omi toum woitetemim tait, bobo menan on obin God matanai, wei omi aurim wanifonabo o wei God aurin wanifonabo.
Wei on bobo aifan toui mataii wait a dura watatam on men meyan wanikirir mes, wei on nana sabu auris dura wanbikakafun.”
Jew babadis Rurubinis simisir dura wawaninai nan orot ruam siyau beberues ato sikirires sinai. Jew babadis Rurubinis on men sisagob mamaba arimon sitimakies, yabin sabu engon tutufin on God sibifain ato bobo aifan imamatar matasi sitai on.
Ato orot raguraguin aurin bobo buburin sifour iyayawas on an kwanda orot ruam nanaba.
Jew babadis Rurubinis on Peter a John rus sikirires sigat mom, osi simatabir men sinai asi kuayo baiyoyobotis tuturas auris nan dura engon sikasones mamaba Jew asi priest aiwabis a sabu kawian osi auris dura siyawures on.
Baiyoyobotis on dura sitatam isawar, osi engon siruayo sikaita ato fonas sibogai God aurin sibayoi siyau, “Bada, Om safam, tafanam, kamit a sawar aifan ato amosi sen on engon ufouren!
Am Ayu Kakafotinai am dura ukakafun wei agiri David aurin, on min Om am agirotin, on ato nanaba ikakafun iyau, ‘Aibo mes sabu men Jew yangan on sebiyatatab kwakwan?; aibo mes sabu bobo komasis Bada aurin sinfouren mes on sebitarasisib, ato baise osi sebitarasisib on yabin ambin.
Tafanam asi aiwabis on sebotitiwag sinigagam mes, ato tafanam asi bainetewarotis on siruayo asi bainonot on sebidudurai mamaba Bada a On an Orot Rurubinin rus auris siniragit mes.’
Dura bag Herod, Pontius Pilate, sabu men Jew yangan a Israel sabu fani osi engon atonio Jerusalem mafam gagaminai siruayo Om am agirotin Iesu Kakafotin, Om ufourai inat Orot Rurubinin imatar, on siniragitai mes.
Om am gogoiai am faiwarai ainau atonio bobo ubotitiwag i’yen, on ari sabu siruayo on bobo sefofour inmatar.
Ato Bada osi asi dura aifan sebikakafun on etatamis, osi dura komasis wei auri sebikakafun sau beberuei, ato wei on Om am agiroti, baibais eitei onai wei Om am dura engon totor faiwarinai wat wankurereb, men wanaber mes.
Ato God Om am faiwar eiyoboei, onai Om am agirotim Iesu Kakafotin Wabinai wei on sabu sawauotis waniyawasis, a bobo baiduduranis a bobo buburis on wanfouren.”
Osi sibayoi isawar ato efan menan siruruayo on nan iyuwe. Ato osi engon tutufin on Ayu Kakafotin ibonues ato osi sibosuruf God an dura on totor wat sikakafun, men siber mes.
Sabu baitutumotis engon tutufin on asi not a nunuas engon kaitamom wat. Men iyafan tani an sawar on toun aurin wat ibo inoanai mes, ab asi sawar aifan auris siyen on engon tutufin siraram bonen.
God an faiwarai, Bada Iesu rabob emon imimisir men aurin on baiyoyobotis on dura nana faiwarinai sikurereb, ato Bada an baimomogin gagamin on osi engon tutufin auris idebur isur.
Osi sabu amosi nan on men iyafan tani sawar aifan auris iyababan mes. Osi sabu iyabon auris motob, o goa si’yen on sabu fani auris sitotobon, ato agim siboai si’nat,
ato baiyoyobotis nasi siyeyeinin, ato osi on agim min siboai sabu iyabon auris sawar ambin on siraramis.
Ato orot wabin Joseph, baiyoyobotis on wabin tani seyoyorai Barnabas (on an yabin min “Orot Kufaiwarotin.”) on orot on Levi an dam emon, on min Cyprus nua on nan irat,
on an motob ibinoanai on sabu fani auris itobon ato agim ibo inat baiyoyobotis nasi iyein.
Baise orot tani wabin Ananias, on awan wabin min Sapphira. Osi rus on asi motob ibinoanis on turin sitobon,
baise Ananias agim turin ibo on noan mes ato awan jever min isagob ato agim turin wat on ibo inai baiyoyobotis nasi iyein.
Peter on aurin iyau, “Ananias, om aibo mes Afaguban uikirir nunuamui irui ato ifourim Ayu Kakafotin uisigoai, om am motob utobon ato agim turin on om ubo inoanim?
Motob on om noam weie ubo utobon, ato on motob utobon gibunai, agim ubo on eb om noam. Ato om aibo mes nunuamui uinonot on bobo nanaba ufour? Om on men orot jever wat uisigoes on—ab om on God mat uisigoai!”
Ananias on dura itatam mom on ra kaita ifeu irabob; ato sabu engon tutufin on dura sitatam on siber kwakwan.
Namon jorig sinat orot usin sikiman ato sibo sinai sigarobai.
Wera ton nanaba isawar gibunai, awan jever ba inat, baise jever on men isagob bobo aifan imatar.
Peter on jever aurin iyau, “Om ekasoneu, awam Ananias rum motob wototobon min ami agim tutufin on nanaba wobo i?” Jever iyafotai iyau, “Dura bag, motob an baiyan tutufin on nanaba wabo.”
On mes Peter on jever aurin iyau, “Om aibo mes awam rum wogogoi Bada an Ayu wotrutobonai mes? Eite! Sabu osi awam sigagarob min ato metewan awanai setatawar, ato osi min arimon om ba sinboem sinan!”
Ra kaita jever on Peter nanai ifeu irabob. Jorig sirui, sit on irabob nono, on mes osi jever sibo sinai awan orot sesebinai sigarobai.
Ekalesia yangan a sabu fani engon on dura sitatam on, men sunub siber.
Baiyoyobotis on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis on sigaraba maiau sabu sanasi sifouren. Baitutumotis engon tutufin on efan wabin seyoyorai, “Solomon An Tebo,” on nan siruayo.
Sabu fani ato kuayo kounai on siber men fofonin arimon baitutumotis amosi sitar on, ab osi auris on sibifais, dura obis wat auris sibikakafun.
Baise sabu sigaraba bag on sirur asi kuayo amonai—orot a jever kuayo gagamin on Bada sibitutumai.
Baiyoyobotis asi bobo sibobo duran sitatam on, osi sabu sawauotis siboes sinat etai nan asi ire siyabaren a enbubur sawar sibotitiwagen nan siyeinis si’yen ato Peter itabib itananan on, an gugubai wat on sabu fani usisi itag.
Ato sabu kuayo sigaraba on mafam gagamis fani ato Jerusalem amonai, on nan sabu sawauotis a sabu osi iyabon ayu komasis tefasi simama on siboen sinat; ato osi engon siyawas.
Namon Priest Ainauin a on tuturan engon mat, Jew asi babadis kuayo fani wabis Sadducee, osi on men sunub siboboar baiyoyobotis auris on; on mes osi sinonot bobo tani sitafour mes.
Osi baiyoyobotis sifatumes ato wasa an fafatum goai nan sireberues.
Baise on fom on Bada an anea on fafatum goa an metewan iruseren ato baiyoyobotis ibonanawaiis sigat au koun, ato osi auris iyau,
“Omi wonan tafaror goai wontawar ato atonio yawas boboun aurin on sabu wonkasones.”
Baiyoyobotis on sifonabo ato fomenei fomenei on tafaror goa amonai sirui, ato baibebe sibosuruf. Priest Ainauin a on tuturan mat on Jew sabu kawian engon siyawures siruayo ato siyamai Jew babadis Rurubinis engon tutufin sikaita; ato sabu siyafares sinai fafatum goai nan baiyoyobotis sitboes sitnat nasi sittawar mes.
Baise babadis sinai on baiyoyobotis men fafatum goai simama sigatures on; on mes osi simatabir men Jew babadis Rurubinis engon auris ato dura ato nanaba sikasones siyau,
“Wei wanai fafatum goai on metewan sikuabinen tiwag si’yen, ato fafatum goa kaifarotis engon on metewan awas on sikakaifaren; baise wei metewan waruruserenen on men iyafan tani wagaturai on!”
Tafaror goa an kaifarotis asi bainetewarotin a priest aiwabis on dura sitatam mom on osi sinonotis, bobo aifan imatar baiyoyobotis auris.
Namon orot irui ato osi auris iyau, “Omi wontatam! Sabu ato woboes fafatum goai worereberues on, nan tafaror goai sitawar sabu sebibebeyes!”
On mes tafaror goa kaifarotis asi bainetewarotin on an sabu mat sinai ato baiyoyobotis siboes simatabir men. Osi men asi faiwar tutufinai nan siboes on, yabin osi siber sabu ari agimai sitborarabis mat.
Osi baiyoyobotis siboes sirui ato Jew babadis Rurubinis on nasi sitawar, ato Priest Ainauin itetemis.
On iyau, “Wei dura wawaninai wawurem men atonio Orot Wabin on sabu auris wonibebeyes mes, baise omi bobo aifan wofofour on woit! Omi ami baibebe wobiyamai on Jerusalem amonai engon ibonu ato omi ami duraiai wobiyamai on, On Orot an rabob aurin on wei ubar wobitei!”
Peter a baiyoyobotis fani on siyafotes siyau, “Wei on God aurin wanifonabo, men orot jever auris.
Omi Iesu wasubun ato nabai wodudun, ato gibui ot tatamat asi God on rabob emon ibobaimisirai.
God ibobaimisirai ato On an asumaiauai emama, ato inat Bainetewarotin a Baiyawasotin imatar, onai Israel sabu iniyames ya baikitabir sinboai ato God asi bokomas innotbur.
Wei atonio osi bobo simatar waiten—Ayu Kakafotin mat ekakasonei on dura bag, ato God atonio siwar sabu ites iyabon On aurin sebifonabo on.”
Jew babadis Rurubinis atonio dura sitatam on, yas sitatab kwakwan ato sigogoi baiyoyobotis sitasububunues mes.
Baise osi amosi orot Pharisee tani wabin Gamaliel, on min Baifafaro an baibebeotin ato sabu engon on sikakafai, on Jew babadis Rurubinis sanasi imisir itawar. On dura wawainai sabu iyawures baiyoyobotis sitboes sitgat mes,
namon on Jew babadis auris iyau, “Israel sabu, omi ami bainonot mamaba atonio osi sabu auris wonfofour on, wonkaifarem tiwag.
Omi wononosin, ainau wera faniai nan Theudas irobotet, on toun aurin ibikakafun on, orot gagamin bag; ato sabu 400 nanaba on, on sibigibubunuai. Baise on siyasubun, ato on an baigibubunuotis on fetag fetag sitagege ato on bobo min irabob isawar.
On gibunai, Judas, Galilee orot ba irobotet, on an wera on bobo tani sibiyamai sabu wabis sibiyab nan; on mat on sabu kuayo iboes on sibigibubunuai, baise on orot mat siyasubun ato an baigibubunuotis on fetag fetag sitagege.
On mes ari awurem, omi men bobo aifan tani atonio osi sabu auris wonafour mes. Omi asir woikirires mom, atonio bobo orot jever tous asi bainonotai sefofour on, basit on bobo on arimon insawar,
baise on bobo on God emon innanat on, omi arimon men fofonin wonbomerubes on. Omi arimon toum wongaturem on God mat wobigagam!” Jew babadis Rurubinis on Gamaliel an dura aurin sifonabo.
Osi baiyoyobotis siyores sirui, ato sabu siyawures urouwawanai siyaswabires ato dura wawaninai siyawures men gibui Iesu Wabinai dura sinikakafun men; namon osi sikirires sigat sinai.
Baiyoyobotis on Jew babadis Rurubinis sikirires mom, on osi siyasisir kwakwan yabin God isagob osi on fofonis arimon Iesu Wabin aurin on mamai a baikokosar sinboai.
Ato osi ra fufur tafaror goai a sabu asi goai nan on sabu auris nana sibibebeyes a Iesu Keriso an Wasagobin aurin on dura sikurereb.
Wera fani sisawar gibunai, sabu baigibubunuotis asi kuayo on nana irarat, ato Jew yangan iyabon Greek fonasi sibikakafun a Jew yangan iyabon men Greek fonasi sibikakafun, osi sanasi on gamo imatar. Jew yangan iyabon Greek fonasi sibikakafun on siyau, ra ra bayu seraram on asi kekena on men senonosis.
On mes baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on sabu baigibubunuotis on engon tutufin siyores siruayo ato siyawures siyau, “Men iyobin wei bobo ato God an dura wakurereb on wanikirir ato wanrutabir ato bayu on wanfasararam.
On mes wei taitai tutuai, omi sanamui sabu engon nimtereban ruam nanaba on wonrubines, ato osi sabu on gigiboanotis bag a Ayu Kakafotinai ebinetewaris semama yangan, ato wei baibad wanites on bobo sinkaifarai.
Wei toui on ai wera tutufinai wanyein wanbayoi a dura wankurereb.”
Sabu kuayo gagamin on siyasisir kwakwan baiyoyobotis asi bainonot aurin; on mes osi sabu sirubinis, Stephen, on orot on an baitutum gagamin a Ayu Kakafotin ebinetewarai emama, a Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, a Nicolaus, on orot on Antioch emon inat ato on men Jew orot on, baise on inat Jew orot mes baitutumotin imatar.
Sabu kuayo ato sirurubines on baiyoyobotis sites, ato osi sabu auris sibayoi a imas tefasi siyagagaien.
Ato God an dura on nana irarat. Sabu baigibubunuotis nan Jerusalem amonai asi kuayo on irat ato irat bag, a priest yangan auman on sigaraba bag situtum.
Stephen, on orot on God an baimomogin tutufin a faiwar tutufin on itai, on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis gagamis sabu sanasi ifouren.
Baise sabu fani on men sigogoiai; osi min bayoi goa an sabu fani (ato seyoyores), Sabu Sirufanis, a Jew yangan mafam gagamin Cyrene a Alexandria emon sinat yangan, osi min mat nan. Osi sabu a Jew yangan ato Cilicia a Asia tafanam emon si’nat, on sibosuruf Stephen mat sigagam.
Baise Ayu ato Stephen gigiboan itai nan auris dura ibikakafun on, osi men fofonin awanai sitiyafotai on.
On mes osi simisir sabu fani auris agimai sitaram mom ato siyawures on nanaba siyau, “Wei on watatamai Moses aurin a God aurin on dura komasis ibikakafun!”
On etaiai on osi sabu a sabu kawian a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on yas sikubogagaien. Osi sinat Stephen aurin ato sifatumai, sibo sinai Jew babadis Rurubinis nasi itawar.
Namon osi sabu fani siboes sirui Stephen aurin dura sitkutabir sitisigo mes. Osi siyau, “Atonio orot on ra fufur ot ati tafaror goa kakafaiin a Moses an baifafaro dura auris ebikakafun.
Wei watatamai on iyau, atonio Iesu Nazareth emon on arimon tafaror goa ingoros insur a Moses an kik ibitet on engon inikitabiren mes!”
Sabu engon Jew babadis Rurubinis asi kuayoai simama on matas siyeit Stephen sit, ato on magin si’tai an itin on anea magin ba.
Priest Ainauin Stephen itetemai iyau, “Sabu ato dura siyawurem min dura bag i?”
Stephen iyafotai iyau, “Yau taitaiu tutuau, tatamau, omi wontatamiu! Ati God Faiwarin on irobotet agirit Abraham aurin, on Mesopotamia tafanamai imama nan, weie itan Haran nan itama,
ato God on Abraham aurin iyau, ‘Om am dam warar a am tafanam unikirir ato unan tafanam aniyoboem on nan ungat.’
On mes on Chaldea tafanam ikirir ato inai Haran ima. Abraham taman irabob weie, God on iyafarai inai atonio efan ari nin womama nan.
God on men atonio motob turin Abraham itai on itinoanai on, men motob kafakakai tani mes; baise God on aurin iyaumatan on tafanam initai, ato on itinoanai a wawan agirin on gibunai senat auris. On an werai Abraham nanatun ambin an rai, on God aurin iyaumatan.
God on dura atonio nanaba on aurin iyau, ‘Om wawam agirim on arimon tafanam toumanai sinama, nan agirotis sinmatar ato kwanda 400 amonai on sabu fani arimon yawas komasis bag on auris sinafour.
Baise Yau arimon sabu ato osi sebiyames sebiagir on animakies, weie gibui osi on tafanam sinikirir singat ato, atonio tafanamai nan Yau sinkwafireu.’
Namon God on Abraham aurin dura bobaibasit iyamai, on dura bobaibasit min askibubu aurin baigube iyamai ato Abraham on askibubu aurin on ibasitai. On mes Isaac irat tafaror kaitamom isawar ato Abraham on natun iaskibubuai; Isaac on natun Jacob iaskibubuai, ato Jacob on nanatun auyotoat sasagis ruam on iaskibubues, ot wawat agirit gagamis on.
“Wawat agirit gagamis on tais Joseph aurin siboboar, ato Egypt yangan auris sitobonai asi agirotin mes imatar. Baise God on Joseph bisinai,
ato on yawas wawanis komasis sigaraba i’gaturen emon on, obinai ikaifarai tiwag. Joseph igai Egypt asi aiwab Pharaoh nanai itatawar on, God an baibais a not gigiboan on itai. Pharaoh on Joseph baibad itai inat tafanam an gawan a aiwab an goa engon auris on kaifarotin imatar.
Namon gomar imatar tafanam Egypt a Canaan engon ibo, on bobo nanaba iyamai on baikokosar gagamin imatar. Wawat agirit on bayu men tani sigaturai on.
Ato Jacob dura itatam on sawareg nan Egypt sen, ato on nanatun iyafares, asi bib ainauin min on nan sinai, osi min ot wawat agirit.
Osi asi bib bairuinai nan on Joseph toun rerebai tutuan auris iyoboes, ato Pharaoh min Joseph tutuan isagobis.
On mes Joseph on dura taman Jacob aurin iyafar, ikasonai on nanatun engon mat sitnat au Egypt; osi dam warar amonai on sabu engon orot ton, auyotoat, sasagis nim nanaba.
Namon Jacob isur inai au Egypt, ato on nan irabob a ot wawat agirit mat nan sirabob.
Osi usis on siboes simatabir men sinai Shechem nan rasiai sigarobis, on rasi on Abraham ato Hamor nanatun auris agim an baiyan gagaminai itotobon on.
“God, ainau Abraham aurin iyaumatan nono on an wera inat ibiufin, ato ati sabu nan Egypt amonai simama on kuayo irat ato irat bag.
Kanfounai on orot tani boboun igai iaiwab, ato on Joseph men isagobai, on orot on ibosuruf Egypt ibinetewar.
On ot ati sabu isigoes a on an yawas komasis on wawat agirit auris ifour, on dura wawaninai iyawures nanatus gugudis siboen sigat goa kounai siya nan sitarab mes.
On an werai on Moses irat ato God matanai on fifi momogin bitan imatar. On sibo sinai goa amonai sikakaifarai mom roke ton nanaba isawar,
ato on an goai emon sibo sigat au koun on, Pharaoh natun jeverei ibo ibobaituai irat on natun mes imatar.
On Egypt yangan asi gigiboan engon sibebeyai, ato on irat orot faiwarin bag imatar, an duraiai a an boboai.
“Moses irat an kwanda orot ruam nanaba, ato on inonot itabib an sabu Israel yangan itfasiues mes.
On iyeit Egypt orot it, on imisir turan Jew orot aurin bobo komasin ifofour, on mes on inai turan ibaisin igaraminai ato imisir Egypt orot iyasubun.
(On inos on toun an sabu on sitsagob God on on orot iniyamai osi sabu inboseiris ingat mes; baise osi on men sisagob.)
Ra itom, on iyeit Israel orot ruam ites sibigagam, ato on igogoi basusi tuf itiyamai mes. On iyau, ‘Omi orot ruam wontatam, omi on ainauan gigiawan; aibo mes toum turam rum wobigagam?’
Baise orot tani imisir orot turan aurin isosowar on Moses irukouai ato iyau, ‘Om iyafan baibad item on wei uninetewari a unigurubabani mes?’
‘Om egogoi yau unasubunueu, ato Egypt orot rarab uyasubun ba?’
Moses atonio dura itatam mom on, Egypt emon iyayai igat inai Midian tafanamai nan imama. On nan itabin ato nanatun ruam sirat.
“Kwanda orot ruam isawar gibunai, Moses on nan efan koiteterinai Sinai Oyau bisinai. Anea on Moses aurin irobotet regai wairaf iyoyour amonai.
Moses ato bobo i’tai on iduduran, ato inai rega bisinai nan auwatin ititai tiwag mes. Baise on Bada fonan itatam, Bada dura ato nanaba iyau:
‘Yau on wawam agirim asi God, Abraham an God, Isaac a Jacob asi God.’ Moses on iber ann iman sibiror ato men igogoi iteit ititai men.
Bada on aurin iyau, “Om amm kikiman on eboseir, efan ato etatawar on motob kakafaiin.
Yau ait au sabu aites Egypt nan, osi sabu yawas komasis auris sefofour sebikokosar on. Yau osi asi tou on atatam ato asur aniyawasis mes. Om enat, Yau aniyafarem unan au Egypt.’
“Moses, min on ainau Israel yangan men sigogoiai. Osi sitetemai siyau, ‘Om iyafan baibad item wei uninetewari a unigurubabani mes?’ On orot on God iyafarai ininetewar a sabu iniyawasis mes, anea mat an baibais emon aurin igat ato wairaf regai iyoyour nan.
Moses on sabu Egypt emon ibonanawaiis sigat, on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis on Egypt a Red Sea nan ifouren, a efan koiteterinai nan kwanda orot ruam amonai on osi bobo ifouren.
Moses min on Israel sabu auris ikakafun iyau, ‘God arimon ami aubairuruotin iniyafarai, ato yau ibiyafareu ba, on orot min arimon omi toum sanamui emon.’
Atonio Moses min on Israel sabu mat nan efan koiteterinai siruayo; on orot on wawat agirit mat nan ato anea on Sinai Oyauai nan aurin ikakafun, on God an dura yayawasin ibo ato ot aurit itet.
“Baise ot wawat agirit on men sigogoi on aurin sitifonabo; osi on Moses men sigogoiai, ato sabu sigogoi on sitmatabir men sitan au Egypt.
On mes osi Aaron aurin siyau, ‘Om god fani efouren weinei osi arimon wei sinbonanawaii. Wei men wasagob bobo aifan imatar Moses aurin, on Egypt emon iboei wa’gat on.’
On mes osi baiyuyur on siyamai foro tona boboun ba imatar, ato on aurin sirifu sikutetai, a bobo aifan ato tous imasi sifourai aurin on sibo sitab siyam sibiyasisir.
On mes God koun on osi auris iyein, ato ifouris safam an siribod on sikwakwafiren, ato mamaba aubairuruotis asi buk amonai sigagayam on nanaba imatar, God iyau, ‘Israel sabu; omi kwanda orot ruam amonai efan koiteterinai nan womama on men Yau auriu bobaitu worou sirifu wokuteten on.
Omi on god Moloch an guwi on wabar, a siribod an itin on god Rephan ba, on wabar wobibib ato osi engon on baiyuyur wofouren, on wokwakwafiren. On mes Yau ankusiweiim wonan Babylon tafanamai wongat.’
“God on Moses iyawur eta mamaba ibiyoboai, on nanaba fofonin on Guwi iyon. Ato wawat agirit nan efan koiteterinai on Guwi ato ebiyoboes God on nan emama, on siyabar sibibib.
Gibui emon, ot wawat agirit, osi tatamas bisisi emon guwi si’boai on siyabar auman Joshua mat sinai ato God on ainau sabu touman asi tafanam emon ifafaitanis si’gat weie osi si’nan tafanam si’boai. Ato on guwi min nan nana i’yen mom inat David an werai igat.
God on David aurin iyasisir, ato David on God ifefeyanai itibasitai Jacob an God on an goa ityon mes.
Baise Solomon on God an goa iyon.
“Baise God Aiyetunenei Bag on men ato orot jever goa seyoyon on nan emama on; ato aubairuruotin i’yau ba,
Bada iyau, ‘Safam on Yau au mamage, ato tafanam on Yau auu on nan antawar. Abi goa on Yau wonyon weineu? Yau auriu efan menan nan anmian?
Yau Tou on atonio osi bobo engon tutufin afouren!’
Stephen an dura nana ikakafun iyau, “Omi sabu on nunuam wawanis! Omi nunuam on ato eteni sabu God men sisasagobai osi nunuas ba, a tainam on fotis, men fofonin God an dura wontatam! Omi sabu on wawam agirim ba: Omi mat on ra fufur Ayu Kakafotin wobisisiweiai!
Omi wawam agirim on aubairuruotis engon tutufin siyames sikokosaris. Osi God an dura bobibotis engon siyasububunues, osi sabu on ainau bag dura sikurereb ato an Agirotin an yawas totorin innanat aurin on. Ato ari on omi wokaseirai ato wasubun.
Omi sabu on God an baifafaro dura wobo, ato anea Moses sibitai on—baise omi men baifafaro dura aurin woifonabo on!”
Jew babadis Rurubinis Stephen an dura sitatamai on yas sitatab kwakwan aurin was sitafoforen.
Baise Stephen, Ayu Kakafotin ibonuai auman, itage au safam ato God an kudidirin it a Iesu mat on nan God an asumaiauai itatawar it.
On iyau, “Woit! Yau safam ait iruseren ato Orot Natun ait God an asumaiauai etatawar!”
Jew babadis Rurubinis on imas siboen tainas sikufofoten ato aumeit bag siyoku. Namon osi engon Stephen aurin on ra kaita siyayai sinai,
ato osi Stephen sibo mafam gagamin emon sirebetet igat au koun ato agimai siborarab. Sabu iyabon Stephen sikukutabirai on asi beber Jorei boboun wabin Saul, on bisinai sikiriren ikakaifaren weines.
Osi sabu on nana Stephen agimai siborarab ato on Bada aurin iyor iyau, “Bada Iesu, yau ayubiu ebo!”
On sindan irou ato Bada aurin fonan aumiet bag iyor iyau, “Bada! Atonio bobo sefofour auriu on asi
Ato Stephen siyasubun aurin on Saul ibasitai. On ra nan on ekalesia nan Jerusalem amonai simama on sibosuruf baikokosar komasin si’boai. Baitutumotis engon on siyames fetag fetag sitagege sinai Judea a Samaria tafanamai nan, baise baiyoyobotis on nan nana Jerusalem sima.
Sabu God sikwakwafirai yangan on Stephen sibo sinai sigarob ato fonas aumiet bag sitotou sibiyababan.
